instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss the shrimp and poblano peppers with olive oil, chili powder, salsa verde, and sea salt. Arrange in a single layer. Add the 3/4 cup pineapple (for the salsa). Roast 6-8 minutes or until the shrimp is cooked. During the last minute, switch the oven to broil. Broil until lightly charred.', '3. Meanwhile, make the salsa. Toss the remaining pineapple with the jalapeños, cilantro, lime juice, and a pinch of salt.', '4. To make the ranch. Combine everything in a blender. Blend until smooth. Season with salt.', '5. Add the cabbage to a large bowl and toss with 1/3 cup of the ranch.', '6. Stuff the avocado, cabbage, salsa, shrimp, and peppers into the warmed tortillas. Top with ranch and additional salsa.']

title: Baked Crunchy Pretzel Honey Balsamic Chicken
ingredients: ['salted mini pretzel twists', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'large eggs, beaten', 'balsamic vinegar', 'chicken breast tenderloins', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'honey', 'balsamic vinegar', 'dried thyme', 'cayenne pepper', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'fresh thyme, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted mini pretzel twists': '6', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'large eggs, beaten': '2', 'balsamic vinegar': '3-4', 'chicken breast tenderloins': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'honey': '1/2', 'dried thyme': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4-1', 'fresh thyme, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. In a food processor, combine the pretzels, parmesan, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, and a pinch of salt. Pulse until you have fine crumbs. Dump the crumbs into a shallow bowl.', '3. Beat the eggs in a bowl, add the balsamic vinegar. Add the chicken and toss well to coat.', '3. Dredge the chicken through the crumbs, covering fully. Place on the prepared baking sheet. For a thicker coating, dip the chicken back through the eggs, then through the crumbs a second time. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 20-25 minutes, until crisp all around.', '4. Just before the chicken is done cooking, make the sauce. In a sauce pot, warm together the honey, balsamic vinegar, dried thyme, cayenne, onion powder, and garlic powder, plus a pinch of salt.', '5. Drizzle the warm sauce over the chicken. Top with fresh thyme. If the sauce thickens, warm for 5 seconds in the microwave. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Honey Garlic Chicken and Feta Potatoes
ingredients: ['baby potatoes, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'skinless chicken thighs or breasts', 'balsamic vinegar', 'honey', 'dried thyme', 'smoked or regular paprika', 'chili flakes', 'garlic cloves, chopped', 'sesame seeds', 'asparagus, ends trimmed', 'mixed fresh parsley, basil, or thyme, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'feta cheese, cubed', 'lemon juice', 'pepperoncini, chopped', 'green olives, torn']
ingredients with measurement: {'baby potatoes, halved': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'skinless chicken thighs or breasts': '6', 'balsamic vinegar': '3', 'honey': '1', 'dried thyme': '2', 'smoked or regular paprika': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'garlic cloves, chopped': '3', 'sesame seeds': '2', 'asparagus, ends trimmed': '1', 'mixed fresh parsley, basil, or thyme, chopped': '2', 'feta cheese, cubed': '6-8', 'lemon juice': '2', 'pepperoncini, chopped': '1-2', 'green olives, torn': '3/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F.', '2. On a large baking sheet, toss the potatoes with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Season with salt and black pepper. Roast for 15 minutes, or until tender.', '3. In a bowl, toss together 2 tablespoons olive oil, the chicken, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, honey, thyme, paprika, garlic, sesame seeds, salt, pepper, and chili flakes.', '4. Remove the potatoes from the oven. Nestle the chicken around the potatoes.Add the asparagus, season with salt and pepper.\xa0Return the pan to the oven for 20-25 minutes more, until the chicken is cooked through, keep an eye on the asparagus.', '5. To make the dressing. Combine the remaining 1/3 cup olive oil, 1-2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, herbs, pepperoncini, and olives.', '6. Remove the chicken from the oven. Break the feta over the chicken, then add the dressing. If desired, drizzle with honey and chili flakes. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Easy Skillet Cheesy Green Chile Enchilada Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken, beef, or pork', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'poblano peppers, chopped', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salsa verde', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh chopped cilantro', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend', 'tortillas, warmed', 'avocado, limes, yogurt/sour cream, green onion, and jalapeños, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken, beef, or pork': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'poblano peppers, chopped': '2', 'chili powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salsa verde': '2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '2', 'fresh chopped cilantro': '1/2', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend': '1 1/2', 'tortillas, warmed': '6', 'avocado, limes, yogurt/sour cream, green onion, and jalapeños, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400°.', '2. In a large oven-safe skillet, combine the olive oil, meat, onion, and peppers. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until browned, about 5 minutes.\xa0Add the chili powder, paprika, and garlic powder, 1 cup water, 1 jar salsa verde, and season with salt. Simmer 5-8 minutes. Mix in the cream cheese until creamy. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro.', '3. Sprinkle the shredded cheese down the center of each tortilla, tuck, and roll. Place the tortillas, seam side down, into the skillet overtop of the meat. Pour over the remaining jar of salsa verde. Top with the remaining shredded cheese. Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '5. Serve warm, drizzled with yogurt mixed with lime and salt. Top with avocado, cilantro, chopped green onions, and jalapeños. Enjoy!']

title: Havarti Avocado Sandwich with Spicy Mayo
ingredients: ['avocado oil mayo', 'pickled or pepperoncini juice', 'hot sauce', 'smoked paprika', 'chipotle chili powder', 'cayenne pepper or to taste', 'kosher salt', 'rye or sourdough bread, toasted', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'Havarti cheese', 'cherry tomatoes, sliced', 'sun-dried tomatoes, sliced', 'sliced dill pickles and or pepperoncini', 'fresh sprouts/microgreens', 'avocado, sliced', 'pickled red onion and/or jalapeños']
ingredients with measurement: {'avocado oil mayo': '1/2', 'pickled or pepperoncini juice': '1-2', 'hot sauce': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper or to taste': '1/4', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'rye or sourdough bread, toasted': '4', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '1', 'Havarti cheese': '2-4', 'cherry tomatoes, sliced': '1/2', 'sun-dried tomatoes, sliced': '1/3', 'sliced dill pickles and or pepperoncini': '1/3', 'fresh sprouts/microgreens': '1', 'avocado, sliced': '1', 'pickled red onion and/or jalapeños': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the mayo. Mix all ingredients in a bowl and season with salt.', '2. To make the sandwich, preheat the broiler to high.', '3. Working on a sheet pan, spread the outside of each piece of bread lightly with butter. Spread the inside with spicy mayo. Place the cheese slices over the mayo, then add the tomatoes – cut side up. Broil 2-4 minutes, until the cheese is bubbling up and the tomatoes begin to char. Watch closely.', '4. Layer the sun-dried tomatoes, pickles, pepperoncini, sprouts, avocado, red onion, and jalapeños. Add the top piece of bread, cheese facing down. Slice and enjoy while warm with lots of extra mayo. YUMMMMMY.']

title: Sesame Chicken Schnitzel Bowls with Feta Tzatziki
ingredients: ['flour', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'sesame seeds', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'eggs, beaten', 'chicken cutlets, or 3 boneless chicken breasts sliced in half horizontally', 'avocado oil, for frying', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'avocado, diced', 'Serrano or jalapeño, seeded and chopped', 'lemon juice', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'Tzakiki sauce', 'lettuce, peperoncini, and pitas, for serving', 'garlic tahini, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'flour': '3/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'Panko bread crumbs': '2', 'sesame seeds': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'garlic powder': '2', 'onion powder': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'eggs, beaten': '3', 'chicken cutlets, or 3 boneless chicken breasts sliced in half horizontally': '4-6', 'avocado oil, for frying': 'seasoning', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '2', 'avocado, diced': '1', 'Serrano or jalapeño, seeded and chopped': '1', 'lemon juice': '2', 'fresh dill, chopped': '1/4', 'crumbled feta cheese': '6', 'Tzakiki sauce': '1-2', 'lettuce, peperoncini, and pitas, for serving': 'seasoning', 'garlic tahini, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Add the flour to a shallow dish. In a separate dish, combine the Panko, sesame seeds, salt, and pepper. Crack the eggs into a separate bowl, then beat.', '2. In a small bowl, combine the paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne, and a pinch of salt. Set the seasoning aside.', '3. Working in an assembly line, dredge the chicken through the flour, then the eggs – allow the excess to drip off into the bowl, then dip through the Panko crumbs. Place on a plate and repeat.', '4. Heat a few tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high. Add the chicken and cook until golden brown, 3-4 minutes. Flip the chicken and cook until golden brown on the other side, about 3-4 minutes. Transfer to a cutting board and immediately sprinkle on the seasoning, using to your taste. Thinly slice the chicken. Season with salt.', '5. In a bowl, toss the cucumbers, avocados, peppers, lemon juice, and dill. Add the feta and toss.', '6. To assemble, add lettuce and peperoncini to a bowl. Top with chicken, and cucumber/avocado salad. Add a few dollops of Tzaziki sauce. Drizzle over the tahini (homemade recipe in notes).']

title: Basil Ranch Chicken and Bacon Quesadilla with Avocado

title: Sheet Pan Honey Buffalo Chicken with Broccoli
ingredients: ['chicken breasts or thighs, cut into cubes', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'flour or all-purpose gluten-free flour', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'broccoli florets', 'hot sauce', 'salted butter', 'seasoned salt', 'cayenne pepper', 'honey', 'blue cheese or ranch dressing, for serving', 'sliced green onions, or serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken breasts or thighs, cut into cubes': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'flour or all-purpose gluten-free flour': '1/4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'broccoli florets': '3', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'salted butter': '6', 'seasoned salt': '1-2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'honey': '1/4', 'blue cheese or ranch dressing, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sliced green onions, or serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or rub with oil.', '2. On the sheet pan, toss together the chicken, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Add the flour and toss again. Add 2 tablespoons olive oil, tossing to coat. Arrange the chicken to one side of the baking sheet. Add the broccoli to the other side. Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Bake 15-20 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.', '3. Meanwhile, make the sauce. In a saucepan set over medium heat, melt together the hot sauce, butter, seasoned salt, and cayenne. Stir until melted and combined. Remove from the heat and mix in the honey.', '4. Remove the broccoli from the sheet pan. Then pour the buffalo sauce over the chicken, toss the chicken up in the sauce. Bake another 5 minutes, until the buffalo sauce is baked onto the chicken.', "5. Serve the chicken, broccoli, and buffalo sauce with green onions and blue cheese or ranch dressing. I love this over rice, but it's also great with french fries too!"]

title: Basil Chicken Fettuccine Alfredo with Prosciutto
ingredients: ['linguine or fettuccini', 'asparagus, cut into 1 inch pieces', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chicken tenders, cubed', 'Italian seasoning', 'basil pesto', 'parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili flakes', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'heavy cream', 'thinly sliced prosciutto', 'fresh basil or micro basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'linguine or fettuccini': '1', 'asparagus, cut into 1 inch pieces': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'chicken tenders, cubed': '1', 'Italian seasoning': '2', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'parmesan cheese': '1 1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '4', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '1', 'heavy cream': '1', 'thinly sliced prosciutto': '3', 'fresh basil or micro basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta al dente, according to package directions. During the last 2-3 minutes of cooking add the asparagus. Drain.', '2. In a large skillet, toss together the chicken, with the olive oil, Italian seasoning, and a big pinch of pepper. Add 2 tablespoons butter, then set over medium-high heat. Cook the chicken until crisp, about 5-8 minutes. Stir in 2 tablespoons of pesto, then cook another 2 minutes. Add the prosciutto to the pan and cook 1 minute to warm through. Turn the heat off and transfer everything to a plate.', '3. To the same pan, add 2 tablespoons butter, the garlic, and chili flakes. Cook 1 minute, until fragrant, then pour in the broth and milk. Whisk until smooth. Bring the sauce to a gentle simmer and cook 5 minutes, until slightly thickened. Stir in the remaining pesto and the parmesan, then toss in the pasta and asparagus. Cook 2 minutes. Stir in the chicken. Remove from the heat and top with fresh basil .', '4. Serve immediately topped with prosciutto and greens.']

title: Hot Italian Stromboli
ingredients: ['pizza dough', 'basil pesto', 'marinara sauce', 'Italian seasoning', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste, or chili flakes, to taste', 'roasted red peppers, drained and sliced', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'thinly sliced pepperoni', 'thinly sliced deli chorizo', 'baby arugula', 'sesame seeds', 'egg, beaten']
ingredients with measurement: {'pizza dough': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/2', 'marinara sauce': '2/3', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste, or chili flakes, to taste': '1-3', 'roasted red peppers, drained and sliced': '1', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1', 'thinly sliced pepperoni': '6', 'thinly sliced deli chorizo': '2-4', 'baby arugula': '1', 'sesame seeds': '1', 'egg, beaten': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. Divide the pizza dough into 2 balls. On a floured surface, roll the dough into a large rectangle, around 9×13 inches. Transfer to the baking sheet.', '3. Spread each piece of dough with pesto, marinara, and then sprinkle on the chilies and Italian seasoning. Arrange the peppers over the sauce. Top with equal amounts of mozzarella and provolone. Pepperoni, then chorizo. Finish with arugula, if desired.', '4. Tuck in two sides of the dough, then roll up into a log (like a cinnamon roll), pinch to seal. Place seam side down.', '5. Brush the tops of the stromboli with the beaten egg, then sprinkle with sesame seeds. Take a sharp knife and cut 2 small slits on the top of the dough.', '6. Bake for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown. Slice, serve, and enjoy!']

title: Hot Honey Crispy Salmon Bowls

title: One Pan Spinach and Artichoke Orzo Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, chopped', 'shallot, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'paprika or smoked paprika', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste, or chili flakes, to taste', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'dry orzo pasta', 'marinated artichokes, quartered', 'basil pesto', 'baby spinach, chopped', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese']

title: 30 Minute Garlic Butter Chicken Pad Thai
ingredients: ['Pad Thai/wide rice noodles', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'real maple syrup', 'fish sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'black pepper and chili flakes, to taste', 'sesame oil', 'ground chicken', 'red bell pepper, thinly slice', 'salted butter', 'shallot, sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'eggs, beaten', 'mung bean sprouts', 'chopped cilantro or Thai basil', 'green onions, chopped', 'roasted peanuts, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'Pad Thai/wide rice noodles': '6', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'real maple syrup': '3', 'fish sauce': '2', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'black pepper and chili flakes, to taste': 'seasoning', 'sesame oil': '3', 'ground chicken': '3/4', 'red bell pepper, thinly slice': '1', 'salted butter': '3', 'shallot, sliced': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4-6', 'eggs, beaten': '2-3', 'mung bean sprouts': '2', 'chopped cilantro or Thai basil': '1/2', 'green onions, chopped': '4', 'roasted peanuts, chopped': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. Soak the rice noodles according to packaged directions. Drain.', '2. To make the sauce. In a bowl, combine the tamari/soy sauce, maple syrup, fish sauce, rice vinegar, black pepper, and chili flakes.', '3. Add the oil, chicken, and red bell pepper to a large skillet set over medium heat. Cook until the chicken is browned all over, about 5 minutes. Add the butter, shallot, garlic, and a pinch of chili flakes and black pepper. Continue to cook the chicken in the butter until the garlic begins to turn golden, 1-2 minutes.', '4. Add the noodles and sauce, tossing to combine. Cook until the noodles are warmed through and begin soaking up the sauce, about 1 minute. Push the noodles to one side of the skillet and add the eggs to the other side. Let cook until the edges start to set, 1 minute. Roughly scramble the egg, then toss it with the noodles. Remove from the heat.', '5. Add the bean sprouts, cilantro, and green onions, and toss again.', '6. Serve warm noodles topped with basil, green onions, peanuts, and chili flakes. Add a squeeze of lime juice.']

title: Sesame Ginger Orange Chicken Salad…with crispy fried wontons
ingredients: ['sesame oil', 'toasted sesame oil', 'honey', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garlic, grated', 'orange zest', 'sesame seeds', 'avocado oil, for frying', 'wonton wrappers, sliced into strips', 'shredded cabbage', 'shredded lettuce', 'cooked shredded chicken', 'slivered almonds or peanuts', 'fresh orange slices', 'avocados sliced', 'chopped green onions', 'chili oil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil': '1/3', 'toasted sesame oil': '1/4', 'honey': '1/3', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'rice vinegar': '3', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'orange zest': '1', 'sesame seeds': '2', 'avocado oil, for frying': 'seasoning', 'wonton wrappers, sliced into strips': '1', 'shredded cabbage': '3', 'shredded lettuce': '3', 'cooked shredded chicken': '1-2', 'slivered almonds or peanuts': '1/3', 'fresh orange slices': '1', 'avocados sliced': '2', 'chopped green onions': '1/3', 'chili oil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar or bowl.', '2. To make the wontons. Heat the oil in a skillet. Add the strips of wontons and let cook, 1-2 minutes, until deeply golden and crisp. Drain on paper towels, then sprinkle with flaky salt.', '3. To make the salad. In a salad bowl, combine the cabbage, lettuce, chicken, almonds, and orange slices. Pour over half the dressing, then toss to coat the greens. Add the avocados, fried wontons, green onions, and chili oil. ENJOY the yumminess.']

title: Broccoli Cheddar Noodle Soup
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chopped carrots', 'all-purpose flour or gluten-free all-purpose flour', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth', 'milk', 'chopped broccoli florets', 'bay leaves', 'garlic powder', 'regular or smoked paprika', 'cayenne', 'grated nutmeg', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fresh thyme', 'egg noodles']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '3', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chopped carrots': '1/2', 'all-purpose flour or gluten-free all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth': '3-4', 'milk': '2', 'chopped broccoli florets': '4', 'bay leaves': '2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'regular or smoked paprika': '1/2', 'cayenne': '1/4', 'grated nutmeg': '1/8', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '3', 'fresh thyme': '2', 'egg noodles': '2-3'}
instructions: ['1. Melt the olive oil and butter together in a large soup pot set over medium heat. Add the onion and carrots and cook until softened, 5 minutes. Whisk in the flour and cook about 2 minutes, then gradually whisk in the broth, and then the milk.', '2. Add the broccoli, bay leaves, garlic powder, paprika, cayenne, nutmeg, and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer, reduce the heat to medium, and cook, uncovered, until the broccoli is tender, about 10 minutes.', '3. Remove the soup from the stove. Remove and discard the bay leaves, then pour about half the soup into a blender or use an immersion blender.\xa0Return the soup to the stove and set over low heat. Stir in the cheese and thyme, cook until melted and creamy.', '4. Meanwhile, cook the noodles according to package directions.', '5. To serve, add the noodles to serving bowls, then pour the soup over the noodles and top with a little extra cheddar and fresh thyme. Enjoy!']

title: Spicy Tuscan Chicken Pasta
ingredients: ['oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'Italian seasoning', 'paprika or smoked paprika', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'salted butter', 'medium shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste', 'short cut pasta', 'heavy cream', 'fresh baby spinach']
ingredients with measurement: {'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed': '1', 'Italian seasoning': '4', 'paprika or smoked paprika': '1', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'medium shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste': '2-3', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'heavy cream': '1', 'fresh baby spinach': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Drain 3 tablespoons of oil from the sun-dried tomato jar into a large pot or skillet with sides. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes and set aside.', '2. Set the pot over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, 3 teaspoons Italian seasoning, the paprika, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook until golden brown, 5 minutes. Add 1/4 cup parmesan, cook another minute, then remove the chicken from the pot.', '3. To the same pot, add a drizzle of oil and the butter. Add the shallot, garlic, Calabrian chili paste, and 1 teaspoon of Italian seasoning. Cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes. Add 3 1/2 cups water. Bring to a boil, add the pasta, and cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, 8 minutes. Stir in the cream, spinach, chopped sun-dried tomatoes, and remaining 3/4 cup parmesan. Slide the chicken in, and any juices left on the plate.', '4. Serve the pasta topped with fresh parmesan and basil.']

title: Crispy Cheesy Sweet Potato Skins
ingredients: ['medium sweet potatoes', 'salted butter, melted', 'garlic, grated', 'seasoned salt', 'chipotle chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'crispy bacon bits, for serving', 'avocado, cilantro, green onions, jalapeños, and sour cream, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium sweet potatoes': '6', 'salted butter, melted': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'seasoned salt': '2', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1/2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'crispy bacon bits, for serving': 'seasoning', 'avocado, cilantro, green onions, jalapeños, and sour cream, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Prick the sweet potatoes with a fork. Bake directly on the rack until tender, 35-40 minutes. Slice in half, then let cool.', '2. Use a fork to scoop most of the flesh out, leaving about 1/4 inch of the sweet potato in the skins. Arrange the skins on a parchment-lined baking sheet.', '3. Mix the melted butter with the seasoned salt, chipotle chili powder, paprika, and a pinch of salt. Spoon the seasoned butter over each potato skin. Sprinkle over the parmesan. Bake 15-20 minutes, until crisp. Add the cheddar cheese. Bake another 10 minutes, until the cheese is melted.', '4. Serve immediately topped with lots of bacon bits and an assortment of your favorite toppings. We love mashed avocado, yogurt/sour cream, green onion, cilantro, and candied jalapeños. ENJOY!!!']

title: Spicy Chicken Yum Yum Rice Bowls
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, thinly sliced', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'black pepper', 'orange juice', 'honey', 'chili paste', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'garlic, chopped', 'cooked rice', 'cucumber, avocado, kimchi, and fried wontons – for serving', 'olive oil mayo', 'ketchup', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'seasoned salt', 'cayenne']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, thinly sliced': '1 1/2', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'orange juice': '2', 'honey': '1/4', 'chili paste': '2-3', 'chopped fresh ginger': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'cooked rice': '3-4', 'cucumber, avocado, kimchi, and fried wontons – for serving': 'seasoning', 'olive oil mayo': '1/3', 'ketchup': '2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '1', 'seasoned salt': '1', 'cayenne': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2 On a large sheet pan, toss the chicken with 1 tablespoon tamari and 1 tablespoon orange juice. Season with pepper. Sprinkle the cornstarch (or arrowroot powder) over the chicken, lightly toss. drizzle with olive oil. Bake 15 minutes.', '3. To make the sauce. In a bowl, whisk 1/3 cup tamari, 2 tablespoons orange juice, honey, chili paste, garlic, and ginger.', '4. When the chicken is ready, pour two-thirds of the sauce over the chicken. Toss and bake another 5 minutes, or until cooked through. Switch the oven to broil. Broil 1-2 minutes, until the chicken chars on the edges. If desired, spoon over the remaining sauce.', '5. Meanwhile, make the yum yum sauce. Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Taste and season with cayenne and salt.', '6. To assemble, add the rice to bowls, top with cucumber, avocado, chicken, kimchi, green onions, and a big handful of fried wontons. Spoon over the yum yum.']

title: 30 Minute Coconut Curry Noodle Soup with Chili Crisp Chickpeas
ingredients: ['extra-virgin olive oil', 'fresh chopped ginger', 'shallot, chopped', 'Thai red curry paste', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'low-sodium broth', 'fish sauce', 'creamy peanut butter', 'broccolini (or 3 cups spinach)', 'fresh cilantro or Thai basil, chopped', 'egg or rice noodles', 'limes and peanuts, for serving', 'chickpeas, drained, plus patted dry', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'pure maple syrup', 'flaked unsweetened coconut', 'sesame seeds', 'chili oil']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra-virgin olive oil': '2', 'fresh chopped ginger': '1', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'full-fat coconut milk': '2', 'low-sodium broth': '2-3', 'fish sauce': '3', 'creamy peanut butter': '3', 'broccolini (or 3 cups spinach)': '1', 'fresh cilantro or Thai basil, chopped': '1/4', 'egg or rice noodles': '8', 'limes and peanuts, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chickpeas, drained, plus patted dry': '1', 'tamari/soy sauce': '1/4', 'pure maple syrup': '1', 'flaked unsweetened coconut': '1/2', 'sesame seeds': '3', 'chili oil': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. To make the chickpeas. Preheat oven to 425° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss the chickpeas with olive oil, tamari, maple syrup, and pepper. Bake for 15 minutes. Add the coconut and sesame seeds, toss and bake 5-10 minutes, until extra crisp. Remove and toss with chili oil.', '3. To make the soup. In a large pot, set over medium heat, cook the olive oil with the shallots, ginger, and red curry paste. Cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Stir in the coconut milk, broth, fish sauce, peanut butter, and a pinch of black pepper. Simmer over medium heat, 5-8 minutes. Stir in the broccoli or spinach, and the cilantro.', '4. Meanwhile, cook the noodles according to package directions.', '5. Divide the noodles between bowls and ladle the soup over. Top each bowl with chickpeas, limes, and herbs.']

title: Crispy Cauliflower Tacos with Candied Jalapeño Pineapple Salsa
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'chopped cauliflower florets', 'poblano pepper, chopped', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chipotle chili powder', 'all-spice', 'ground ginger', 'cinnamon', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'red enchilada sauce', 'hard shell tacos', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'avocado, shredded lettuce, and cilantro', 'diced pineapple', 'diced mango', 'cilantro, chopped', 'candied or pickled jalapeños', 'pickled ginger']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chopped cauliflower florets': '6', 'poblano pepper, chopped': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'all-spice': '1', 'ground ginger': '1/2', 'cinnamon': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'red enchilada sauce': '1/2', 'hard shell tacos': '12', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '1', 'avocado, shredded lettuce, and cilantro': 'seasoning', 'diced pineapple': '1', 'diced mango': '1', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'candied or pickled jalapeños': '1/2', 'pickled ginger': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. Add the cauliflower, poblano pepper, and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower is soft, about 3 minutes. Add the chipotle chili powder, all-spice, ginger, cinnamon, and salt. Cook another 2 minutes, then pour in the enchilada sauce and 1/3 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '3. Line the taco shells up on a sheet pan or in a 9×13 inch baking dish. Spoon the cauliflower into each taco shell and top with cheese. Bake 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '4. Meanwhile, make the salsa. Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Season with salt.', '5. Serve the tacos topped with avocado, lettuce, cilantro, and lots of salsa. ENJOY!']

title: Sheet Pan Honey Mustard Salmon with Caesar Roasted Potatoes
ingredients: ['potatoes, cut into 1/2 inch chunks', 'brussels sprouts, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salmon fillets', 'honey', 'grainy dijon mustard', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili powder', 'cayenne', 'salted butter', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'tahini', 'lemon juice', 'dijon mustard', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'potatoes, cut into 1/2 inch chunks': '1/2', 'brussels sprouts, halved': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salmon fillets': '4', 'honey': '2', 'grainy dijon mustard': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'chili powder': '1', 'cayenne': '1/2', 'salted butter': '3', 'tahini': '1/2', 'lemon juice': '1/4', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'Worcestershire sauce': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 450° F. On a baking sheet, toss the potatoes and brussels sprouts with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Roast for 15 minutes, or until tender.', '2.\xa0Meanwhile, whisk together the honey, mustard, garlic, chili powder, cayenne, and 2 tablespoons olive oil. Season with salt. Place the salmon on a plate and spoon the sauce evenly overtop.', '3. Remove the vegetables from the oven. Add the salmon to the baking sheet. Add the butter to each filet.\xa0Bake for 10 minutes, or until the salmon reaches your desired doneness. During the last minute, switch the oven to broil and broil until lightly charred.\xa0Watch close.', '4. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Add 1/4 to 1/2 cup water to thin the dressing. Taste and adjust the salt.', '5. As soon as you pull everything out, drench the vegetables in dressing, then top with extra parmesan. Serve the salmon and any sauce left on the pan over the potatoes. Add more dressing. Enjoy!']

title: Crispy Sesame Ginger Chicken Tacos
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'egg white', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'orange zest', 'cornstarch', 'sesame or olive oil, for drizzling', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest', 'honey or maple syrup', 'chili paste', 'creamy peanut butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh grated ginger', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'hard shell tacos', 'nori sheets, lettuce, kimchi, cilantro, green onion, and queso fresco or your favorite cheese, for serving', 'yum yum style sauce, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '1 1/2', 'egg white': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/2', 'orange zest': '1', 'cornstarch': '1/3', 'sesame or olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest': '1/3', 'honey or maple syrup': '2', 'chili paste': '1-3', 'creamy peanut butter': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '2-4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'hard shell tacos': '12', 'nori sheets, lettuce, kimchi, cilantro, green onion, and queso fresco or your favorite cheese, for serving': 'seasoning', 'yum yum style sauce, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 475° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease with oil.', '2. In a bowl, combine the chicken, egg white, tamari/soy sauce, and orange zest. Toss well to coat. In a separate bowl, add the cornstarch.', '3. Dredge the chicken through the cornstarch to coat. Place the chicken on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with oil. Bake for 8 minutes. Flip the chicken and bake another 3-5 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Switch the oven to broil.', '4. Meanwhile, whisk together the tamari/soy sauce, orange juice, honey/maple, chili paste, peanut butter, garlic, and ginger. Pour the sauce over the chicken, then toss to coat. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Broil 1-3 minutes, until the sauce begins to stick to the chicken and thicken.', '5. Stuff the nori into shells (if desired). Add the chicken, then top as desired. Serve with any extra sauce from the sheet pan and/or yum yum style sauce (homemade in notes).']

title: Crispy Cauliflower Tzatziki Bowls with Sweet Potato Fries
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'cauliflower florets', 'garlic, chopped', 'shallots, chopped', 'smoked paprika', 'chili powder', 'dried oregano', 'ground turmeric', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'sweet potatoes, cut into matchsticks', 'seasoned salt (or paprika)', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'avocado, diced', 'lemon juice', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'Tzatziki sauce', 'lettuce, peperoncini, and pitas, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '6', 'cauliflower florets': '4', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'chili powder': '2', 'dried oregano': '2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'sweet potatoes, cut into matchsticks': '2', 'seasoned salt (or paprika)': '1', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '2', 'avocado, diced': '1', 'lemon juice': '2', 'fresh dill, chopped': '1/4', 'crumbled feta cheese': '6', 'Tzatziki sauce': '1-2', 'lettuce, peperoncini, and pitas, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F.', '2. Serve with pitas.']

title: BBQ Salmon Bowls with Mango Jalapeño Sauce
ingredients: ['salmon filets', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey or brown sugar', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'dried thyme', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt', 'garlic, chopped', 'salted butter', 'chili flakes', 'rice for, serving', 'diced mango', 'avocado, cubed', 'jalapeños, seeded – if desired, and chopped', 'cilantro, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'lime juice']
ingredients with measurement: {'salmon filets': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'honey or brown sugar': '1', 'chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'dried thyme': '2', 'onion powder': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'salted butter': '4', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'rice for, serving': '3-4', 'diced mango': '1 1/2', 'avocado, cubed': '1', 'jalapeños, seeded – if desired, and chopped': '1-2', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/2', 'lime juice': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, rub the salmon with olive oil, honey, chili powder, paprika, dried thyme, onion powder, and a pinch of salt. title: Spicy Short Rib Peanut Ramen
ingredients: ['beef short ribs, bone-in or out, fat trimmed', 'low sodium beef or chicken broth', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'chili paste, to taste', 'creamy peanut butter', 'shallots, sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh chopped ginger', 'bay leaves', 'cinnamon stick', 'baby spinach', 'dry ramen noodles', 'kimichi, cilantro, and green onion, for serving', 'chili oil, nori sheets, and sesame seeds, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'beef short ribs, bone-in or out, fat trimmed': '3-5', 'low sodium beef or chicken broth': '8', 'full-fat coconut milk': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'chili paste, to taste': '2-4', 'creamy peanut butter': '1/4', 'shallots, sliced': '6', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'fresh chopped ginger': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'cinnamon stick': '1', 'baby spinach': '3', 'dry ramen noodles': '4-6', 'kimichi, cilantro, and green onion, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chili oil, nori sheets, and sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of the crockpot, season the short ribs with pepper. Pour over the broth, coconut milk, and tamari. Add the chili paste, peanut butter, shallots, garlic, ginger, bay leaves, and cinnamon stick. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 4-6 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the short ribs from the crockpot and place onto a baking sheet. Break into a few chunks and discard any bones. Broil until caramelized on top, about 3-5 minutes, but watch closely.', '3. Meanwhile, crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Stir in the spinach and noodles and let cook, uncovered, for about 5 minutes. Stir in the short ribs.', '4. Ladle the broth, short ribs, spinach, and noodles into bowls. Top as desired with kimchi, cilantro, green onions, chili oil, and sesame seeds. Serve immediately.']

title: Baked Crunchy Hot Honey Chicken
ingredients: ['cornflakes', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'large eggs, beaten', 'hot sauce', 'chicken breast tenderloins', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'honey', 'hot sauce', 'cayenne pepper', 'chipotle chili powder', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'sea salt', 'fresh thyme, cilantro, or parsley, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'cornflakes': '6', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'large eggs, beaten': '2', 'hot sauce': '2-3', 'chicken breast tenderloins': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'honey': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1-3', 'chipotle chili powder': '3/4', 'sea salt': 'seasoning', 'fresh thyme, cilantro, or parsley, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. In a food processor, combine the cornflakes, parmesan, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, and a pinch of salt. Pulse until you have fine crumbs. Alternatively, you can crush the crumbs in a ziplock bag by stepping on them. Dump the crumbs into a shallow bowl.', '3. Beat the eggs in a bowl, add the hot sauce and chicken, and toss well to coat.', '3. Dredge the chicken through the crumbs, covering fully. Place on the prepared baking sheet. For a thicker coating, dip the chicken back through the eggs, then through the crumbs a 2nd time. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 20-25 minutes, until crisp all around.', '4. Just before the chicken is done cooking, make the sauce. In a sauce pot, warm together the honey, hot sauce, cayenne, chili powder, onion powder, and garlic powder, plus a pinch of salt.', '5. Drizzle the warm sauce over the chicken. Top with herbs. If the sauce thickens, warm for 5 seconds in the microwave. Enjoy!']

title: Salsa Verde Chicken and Rice Tortilla Soup.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'poblano peppers, chopped', 'salsa verde', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'black beans, drained', 'lime juice', 'cilantro, chopped', 'cooked rice', 'tortilla chips, for serving', 'yogurt, avocado, cheese, and green onions, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts': '1', 'chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'dried oregano': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'poblano peppers, chopped': '1-2', 'salsa verde': '2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '6', 'black beans, drained': '1', 'lime juice': '2', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'cooked rice': '3', 'tortilla chips, for serving': 'seasoning', 'yogurt, avocado, cheese, and green onions, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until fragrant, 5 minutes. Stir in the poblano peppers, chicken, chili powder, paprika, oregano, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes, until you smell the seasonings.', '2. Stir in the broth and salsa verde. Season with salt and pepper. Partially cover and simmer over medium-low heat for 15 minutes, until the chicken is cooked.', '3. Shred the chicken using 2 forks, then stir back into the soup. Add the beans, lime juice, and cilantro. Cook 10 minutes, to warm through, or up to 3 hours over the lowest heat possible. If needed, thin with additional broth.', '4. Stir the rice into the soup, then ladle into bowls. Top, as desired, with yogurt, cheese, avocado, cilantro, and green onions. Grab a handful of tortilla chips, and serve crushed over the soup or alongside the soup for scooping. Zest lime over each bowl. Enjoy!']

title: Saucy Braised Garlic Butter Meatballs with Orzo
ingredients: ['ground chicken, pork, or beef', 'spicy Italian chicken sausage', 'Italian seasoning', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'poblano pepper, chopped', 'egg', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'garlic', 'marinara sauce', 'diced tomatoes', 'fresh basil leaves', 'salted butter', 'fresh sage or rosemary', 'orzo pasta, cooked']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken, pork, or beef': '1 1/2', 'spicy Italian chicken sausage': '3/4', 'Italian seasoning': '1-2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'poblano pepper, chopped': '1', 'egg': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic': '4-6', 'marinara sauce': '6', 'diced tomatoes': '1', 'fresh basil leaves': '1/2', 'salted butter': '8', 'fresh sage or rosemary': '6', 'orzo pasta, cooked': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Add the chicken, sausage, Italian seasoning, parmesan, poblano pepper, and egg to a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Mix to combine. Coat your hands with oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (around 22 meatballs).', '2. Heat a large braiser with sides over medium-high heat. Add olive oil, then add the meatballs and lightly sear, about 5 minutes. Add 2 tablespoons butter. Let the butter brown around the meatballs, another 2 minutes.', '3. Reduce the heat to medium. Pour in the marinara sauce, tomatoes, and add 3/4 cup water. Season with salt and pepper. Add the garlic and basil. Reduce the heat to low. Partially cover and simmer 20 minutes, until cooked through, or up to 3-4 hours, stirring every hour.', '4. Remove the garlic cloves from the meatballs. Add both the butter, sage, and garlic to a skillet set over medium heat. Mash the garlic into the butter, allowing the butter to brown and some of the garlic to get crispy.', '5. Before serving, cook the orzo. Toss the orzo in the garlic butter.', '6. Serve the meatballs and sauce over the orzo. Top with parmesan and basil.']

title: Crockpot Sun-Dried Tomato Chicken with Creamy Polenta
ingredients: ['oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breast', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'Italian seasoning', 'paprika or smoked paprika', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'dijon mustard', 'grainy dijon mustard', 'dry white wine', 'lemon juice', 'heavy cream', 'grated parmesan cheese + the rind', 'fresh baby spinach']
ingredients with measurement: {'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breast': '2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'paprika or smoked paprika': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'grainy dijon mustard': '1', 'dry white wine': '1/2', 'lemon juice': '2', 'heavy cream': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese + the rind': '3/4', 'fresh baby spinach': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Drain 2 tablespoons of oil from the sun-dried tomato jar into the crockpot. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes and set aside.', '2. In the crockpot, rub the chicken with the shallot, garlic, Italian seasoning, and the mustards. Season with salt, pepper, and chili flakes. Add the sun-dried tomatoes. Pour over the wine. Add the lemon juice and parmesan rind (if using). Cover and cook on low for 2-4 hours or on high for 1-2 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the chicken from the slow cooker and place on a baking sheet.', '3. Crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Stir in the cream, spinach, and parmesan.', '4. Rub the chicken with the reserved oil, then broil 2-5 minutes, until crisp. Serve the chicken and sauce over creamy polenta, rice, or with crusty bread.']

title: Crockpot Crispy Pork Ramen
ingredients: ['medium yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'pork butt or 6 chicken thighs/breast', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'white miso paste', 'chili paste', 'Chinese 5 spice', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'sliced cremini mushrooms', 'honey or brown sugar', 'canned coconut milk', 'toasted sesame oil', 'ramen noodles', 'soft or hard boiled eggs, for serving', 'toasted nori sheets, candied jalapeños, green onions, and chili oil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2-3', 'pork butt or 6 chicken thighs/breast': '2-3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '6-8', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/4', 'white miso paste': '2', 'chili paste': '2-4', 'Chinese 5 spice': '1', 'chopped fresh ginger': '1', 'sliced cremini mushrooms': '2', 'honey or brown sugar': '2-3', 'canned coconut milk': '1', 'toasted sesame oil': '1', 'ramen noodles': '4', 'soft or hard boiled eggs, for serving': 'seasoning', 'toasted nori sheets, candied jalapeños, green onions, and chili oil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. \xa0Layer the onions on the bottom of your crockpot. Add the pork butt/chicken, broth, tamari, miso paste, chili paste, Chinese 5 spice, ginger, and mushrooms. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 4-6 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the pork and place it onto a baking sheet. Break into a few chunks. Drizzle each chunk with honey. Broil until caramelized on top, about 5-8 minutes, but watch closely.', '3. Meanwhile, crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Stir in the coconut milk and toasted sesame oil. Add the noodles and let cook, uncovered, for about 5 minutes.', '4. Ladle the broth, mushrooms, and noodles into bowls. Top with crispy pork. Top as desired with eggs, green onions, jalapeños, and chili oil. Serve immediately.']

title: Creamy Gnocchi Chicken Soup
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'celery stalks, chopped', 'salted butter', 'all-purpose flour', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs', 'garlic, chopped', 'Italian seasoning (see note)', 'paprika or smoked paprika', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low sodium vegetable broth', 'chopped sun-dried tomatoes', 'baby spinach', 'canned coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk', 'grated parmesan', 'fresh potato gnocchi']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '6', 'celery stalks, chopped': '4', 'salted butter': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '2', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs': '3/4', 'garlic, chopped': '2-4', 'Italian seasoning (see note)': '1', 'paprika or smoked paprika': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chili flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1', 'low sodium vegetable broth': '4-6', 'chopped sun-dried tomatoes': '1/2', 'baby spinach': '4-6', 'canned coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan': '1/2', 'fresh potato gnocchi': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a large soup pot set over medium heat, combine the olive oil and onion. Cook 5 minutes, until fragrant. Add the carrots and celery. Cook another 3 minutes.', '2. Stir in the butter and flour, cook 1 minute. Add the chicken, garlic, Italian seasoning, paprika, thyme, and a pinch each of chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat in spices. Add 4 cups broth. Simmer over medium heat for 20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.', '3. Pull the chicken out and shred using 2 forks. Add back to the soup.', '4. Stir in the spinach, sun-dried tomatoes, cream/milk, parmesan, and gnocchi. Cook until warmed throughout, about 5 minutes. If the soup is too thick, add additional broth.', '5. Serve the soup topped with parmesan. Enjoy warm, preferably with a crusty piece of bread.']

title: Spicy Buffalo White Chicken Chili Tacos
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'poblano pepper, seeded and chopped', 'dried parsley', 'dried chives', 'dried dill', 'dried garlic', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'buffalo sauce', 'salsa verde', 'hard shell tacos', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped + 2 tablespoons brine', 'lime juice']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'ground chicken': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'poblano pepper, seeded and chopped': '1', 'dried parsley': '2', 'dried chives': '2', 'dried dill': '1', 'dried garlic': '1', 'smoked paprika': '3/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'buffalo sauce': '1/2', 'salsa verde': '1/2', 'hard shell tacos': '12', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '2', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '3/4', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped + 2 tablespoons brine': '1/4', 'lime juice': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil, chicken, and onion over medium heat. Cook the meat, breaking it up as it cooks, until the chicken is browned, about 5 minutes. Add the poblano pepper, parsley, chives, dill, garlic powder, paprika, and a pinch of salt. Add 1/3 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly around the chicken, 5 minutes. Stir in the buffalo sauce and salsa verde. Cook until most of the sauce coats the chicken, 5 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '3. Line the taco shells up on a sheet pan or in a 9×13 inch baking dish. Transfer to the oven and bake 5 minutes. Evenly divide the meat among each taco shell and top with cheese. Bake 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '4. Meanwhile, make the "ranch". Combine all ingredients in a bowl and stir until creamy.', '5. Serve the tacos topped with the ranch, avocado, candied jalapeños, and any other desired toppings.']

title: Easy Spicy Baked Potato Soup
ingredients: ['thick cut bacon, chopped', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'all-purpose or gluten free flour', 'low sodium vegetable broth', 'Russet potatoes, peeled and chopped', 'milk', 'salsa verde', 'plain greek yogurt or sour cream', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'chopped green onion, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick cut bacon, chopped': '6', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'all-purpose or gluten free flour': '1/4', 'low sodium vegetable broth': '4', 'Russet potatoes, peeled and chopped': '4', 'milk': '2', 'salsa verde': '1/3', 'plain greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/3', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'chopped green onion, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ["1. Cook the bacon in a large dutch oven over medium heat until crisp, about 5 minutes. Remove from the pot and reserve. If there's excess bacon grease, drain off all but 1 tablespoon.", '2. To the same pot, add the onion and cook 5 minutes, until fragrant. Add the garlic. Stir in the butter and flour, cook 1 minute. Pour over broth and stir in the potatoes. Partially cover and simmer over medium heat for 15-20 minutes, until the potatoes are very soft. Use a potato masher or fork to mash the potatoes. I like to leave my soup chunky and do 1/3 of the potatoes.', '3. Stir in the milk, salsa verde, yogurt/sour cream, and cheddar cheese. Cook 5-10 minutes, until the cheese is melted. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro. If needed, thin with additional broth.', '4. Ladle the soup into bowls. Top, as desired, with yogurt/sour cream, cheese, cilantro, and green onions. Adds lots of bacon. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Sticky Ginger Soy Chicken and Broccoli
ingredients: ['chicken breasts or thighs, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'broccoli florets', 'honey', 'ketchup', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'pomegranate juice', 'garlic, chopped', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'chili flakes', 'jasmine rice, for serving', 'sliced green onions and pomegranate']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken breasts or thighs, cut into 2 inch cubes': '2', 'broccoli florets': '3', 'honey': '1/2', 'ketchup': '1/2', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'pomegranate juice': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'chopped fresh ginger': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'jasmine rice, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sliced green onions and pomegranate': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Rub a baking sheet with oil.', '2. Arrange the chicken and broccoli in the prepared baking dish.', '3. In a bowl, whisk together the honey, ketchup, tamari, pomegranate juice, garlic, ginger, and a good pinch of chili flakes. Pour the sauce over the chicken and toss to coat. Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbling.', '5. Turn the oven to broil and broil 3-5 minutes, until the chicken caramelizes on top. WATCH CLOSELY, the broiler works fast. Serve the chicken, broccoli, and sauce over bowls of rice topped with green onions and pomegranate, if desired.']

title: Sweet Potato Cheddar Pierogi with Bacon Bits
ingredients: ['all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt', 'salted butter, melted', 'plain full fat greek yogurt', 'large egg', 'sweet potatoes', 'salted butter', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'thick cut bacon, finely chopped', 'salted butter', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'chili flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'all-purpose flour': '2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'salted butter, melted': '2', 'plain full fat greek yogurt': '1', 'large egg': '1', 'sweet potatoes': '2', 'salted butter': '6', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'thick cut bacon, finely chopped': '6', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dough. In a medium bowl, combine the flour, salt, butter, yogurt, and egg, and mix until combined. Knead the dough for 2-3 minutes. Cover and let sit 30 minutes.', '2. To make the filling. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Prick the sweet potatoes all over with a fork. Bake directly on the rack until tender, 50-60 minutes. Allow to cool.', '3. Once cool use your hands to peel away the sweet potato skins. They should just easily slip off. Place the potatoes in a bowl and mash well. Stir in the cheddar cheese, garlic powder, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '4. Roll the dough out onto a floured surface to 1/8 inch thickness. Using a biscuit cutter, cut out 3-inch circles.\xa0Spoon 2 teaspoons of filling into the center of each round. Brush the edges with water and fold half of the dough over the filling to enclose it. Press down the edges to seal, pressing out all the air. Keep the dough covered as you work to prevent it from drying out. At this point, the\xa0pierogi can be flash-frozen on a baking sheet for 30 minutes, then transferred to a freezer bag and frozen for up to 3 months.', '5. When ready to cook, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pierogi in batches for 2-3 minutes, or until they float. Drain.', '6. Cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Pull it out, and drain the excess fat. Add the butter and rosemary. Cook 2-3 minutes, until the butter is brown and the rosemary is crisp.\xa0Remove from the heat and add the chili flakes.', '7. Drop the pierogi into the sauce, gently tossing to combine. Serve in the sauce, and top with cheddar cheese and bacon bits. EAT!']

title: Crockpot Creamy Coconut Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garam masala', 'ground turmeric', 'kosher salt', 'full-fat plain Greek yogurt', 'tomato paste', 'full-fat unsweetened coconut milk', 'cilantro, chopped', 'salted butter', 'sesame seeds', 'chili flakes', 'paprika']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'garam masala': '2', 'ground turmeric': '1 1/2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'full-fat plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'tomato paste': '1', 'full-fat unsweetened coconut milk': '1', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/3', 'salted butter': '6', 'sesame seeds': '2', 'chili flakes': '1-2', 'paprika': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the chicken, yogurt, onion, shallot, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and a pinch of chili flakes. Let sit 10 minutes. Add the tomato paste and 1/3 cup water. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or on high for 3-4 hours.', '2. Crank the heat to high. Stir in the coconut milk and cook, uncovered, 10 minutes until warmed. Stir in the cilantro.', '3. Meanwhile, melt together the butter, sesame seeds, chili flakes, and paprika. Cook until the butter is browning. Remove from the heat.', '4. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of rice with fresh naan. Enjoy!']

title: Crockpot Coq au Vin Meatballs
ingredients: ['ground turkey or chicken', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'chopped fresh sage', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'tomato paste', 'carrots, chopped', 'sliced cremini mushrooms', 'thick-cut bacon, halved', 'onion, quartered', 'garlic, top trimmed off to reveal the cloves', 'bay leaves', 'thyme', 'salted butter', 'fresh parsley, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground turkey or chicken': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'chopped fresh thyme': '2', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon': '3/4', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3/4', 'tomato paste': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '4', 'sliced cremini mushrooms': '1', 'thick-cut bacon, halved': '2', 'onion, quartered': '1', 'garlic, top trimmed off to reveal the cloves': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'thyme': '4', 'salted butter': '6', 'fresh parsley, chopped': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Add the chicken, 3/4 cup parmesan, sage, thyme, onion powder, garlic powder, chili flakes, salt, and pepper to a bowl. Mix to combine. Roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 16-18 meatballs).', '2. Pour over the wine and broth. Add the tomato paste, carrots, mushrooms, and bacon. Season with salt and pepper. Arrange the onion, garlic, bay leaves, and thyme around the meatballs. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or on high for 1-2 hours.', '3. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the meatballs and garlic from the slow cooker and place onto a baking sheet. Remove and discard the bacon and bay leaves. Crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Let cook, uncovered, 10-30 minutes.', '4. Sprinkle the meatballs with 1/4 cup parmesan. Arrange the butter around the meatballs and garlic, then broil 1-3 minutes, until crisp. Peel away the garlic skin, then chop the garlic and mix with the butter on the sheet pan. Toss the meatballs in the butter.', '5. Serve the meatballs in the sauce with parsley and parmesan.']

title: Pull Apart Roasted Garlic Spinach and Artichoke Dip Sliders
ingredients: ['garlic', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'dinner rolls, halved lengthwise', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'sour cream', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed, and squeezed dry of excess water', 'marinated artichokes, chopped', 'shredded fontina or mozzarella cheese', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chili flakes', 'pickled jalapeños', 'salted butter, at room temp or melted', 'dried oregano', 'dried parsley']
ingredients with measurement: {'garlic': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': 'seasoning', 'dinner rolls, halved lengthwise': '1', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '6', 'sour cream': '1/4', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed, and squeezed dry of excess water': '10', 'marinated artichokes, chopped': '1', 'shredded fontina or mozzarella cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese': '1/3', 'onion powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'pickled jalapeños': 'seasoning', 'salted butter, at room temp or melted': '3', 'dried oregano': '1', 'dried parsley': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. Slice off the top portion of the garlic head to expose some of the cloves. Place the garlic on a piece of foil. Drizzle with olive oil, wrap it up, and bake for 40-55 minutes, until deeply golden and very soft.', '3. Meanwhile, in a bowl mix together the cream cheese, sour cream, spinach, artichokes, half of the mozzarella, half of the parmesan, and the onion powder. Season with salt, pepper, and chili flakes (to taste).', '4. Place the bottom half of the dinner rolls\xa0onto a baking sheet lined with parchment. Top with spinach dip, then the remaining mozzarella. Arrange the jalapeños on top. Place the top half of the roll over the cheese.', '5. Let the garlic cool, then squeeze the cloves out into a bowl. Add the butter, remaining parmesan, oregano, parsley, and chili flakes (to taste). Mash the cloves into the butter with a fork. Spread the butter over the top of the rolls. Cover the rolls and bake 10 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking another 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '6. Brush with any remaining garlic butter, serve immediately.']

title: Easiest No-Boil Brie Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['dry shells or elbow macaroni', 'shredded Havarti cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'whole milk', 'sour cream', 'ground mustard', 'cayenne', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'brie, rind removed, and cubed', 'crushed Ritz Crackers', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'paprika']
ingredients with measurement: {'dry shells or elbow macaroni': '1', 'shredded Havarti cheese': '1 1/4', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1 1/4', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'whole milk': '3', 'sour cream': '1/2', 'ground mustard': '1/4', 'cayenne': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'brie, rind removed, and cubed': '6', 'crushed Ritz Crackers': '1 1/2', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'paprika': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375° F. Butter a 9×13-inch baking dish.', '2. To the baking dish, add the dry pasta, half of each shredded cheese, the milk, sour cream, ground mustard, cayenne, and 1/3 cup water. Season with salt and pepper. Stir to combine. Push the cubes of brie into the pasta. Tightly cover the baking dish with the foil. Bake for 25 minutes.', '3. Meanwhile, in a bowl, mix the Ritz with the butter, onion powder, garlic powder, and paprika.', '4. Uncover the pasta and sprinkle over the remaining shredded cheese. Top evenly with the Ritz.
