title: Crockpot Herb Butter Chicken and Wild Rice
ingredients: ['wild rice blend', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'dried parsley', 'carrots, cut into 1 inch pieces', 'sliced cremini mushrooms', 'chopped celery', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'dried thyme', 'dried rosemary', 'paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'garlic, smashed', 'salted butter', 'fresh sage', 'parmesan rind (optional)']
ingredients with measurement: {'wild rice blend': '1 1/2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'dried parsley': '1', 'carrots, cut into 1 inch pieces': '2', 'sliced cremini mushrooms': '1', 'chopped celery': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3 1/2', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'dried thyme': '2', 'dried rosemary': '1', 'paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'garlic, smashed': '6', 'salted butter': '4', 'fresh sage': '8', 'parmesan rind (optional)': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the wild rice, onion, carrots, mushrooms, celery, and dried parsley. Season well with salt and pepper. Add 1 tablespoon olive oil and toss. Pour over the chicken broth.', '2. In a bowl, toss the chicken with 1 tablespoon olive oil, thyme, rosemary, paprika, cayenne, and season with salt and pepper. Place the chicken in the crockpot. Add the garlic cloves. If you have one, add a parmesan rind. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or on high for 2-3 hours.', '3. Before serving, preheat the broiler to high. Remove the chicken and garlic from the crockpot and place on a baking sheet. Arrange the butter and sage around the chicken and garlic, then broil 1-3 minutes, until crisp. Peel away the garlic skin, then chop, and mix with the butter on the sheet pan. Toss the chicken in the butter.', '4. To serve, fluff the rice with a fork and serve the chicken, rice, and veggies together.\xa0If there is any butter left on the pan, drizzle it over the chicken.']

title: Creamy Tortellini French Onion Soup
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'garlic, chopped', 'sliced cremini or wild mushrooms', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'parmesan cheese rind', 'heavy cream or whole milk', 'fresh cheese tortellini', 'french bread', 'shredded Gruyère cheese', 'chopped rosemary or thyme']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '4', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'sliced cremini or wild mushrooms': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'black pepper': '1', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '6-8', 'parmesan cheese rind': '1', 'heavy cream or whole milk': '1/2', 'fresh cheese tortellini': '1', 'french bread': '6', 'shredded Gruyère cheese': '2', 'chopped rosemary or thyme': '1'}
instructions: ["1. Melt together the butter and onions in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring occasionally until softened, about 10 minutes. Add the wine, 1/4 cup at a time, until the wine cooks into the onions. Continue to cook another 10-15 minutes until you've used all of the wine and the onions are deeply caramelized.", '2. Add the garlic, mushrooms, thyme, and sage. Season with salt and pepper, cook another 3-4 minutes. Add the broth, parmesan rind, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Increase the heat to medium-high and return the soup to a simmer, simmer 10 minutes, then stir in the cream and tortellini. Cook another 3-5 minutes. Remove the parmesan rind and discard. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', '3. Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 400° F. Arrange the bread on a baking sheet and toast for 10-15 minutes, until very dry. Switch the oven to broil.', '4. Ladle the soup into oven safe bowls. Add a slice of bread to each, and top evenly with cheese. Add rosemary, or thyme if desired. Place each soup bowl on a baking sheet and transfer to the oven, broil until bubbly and golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Eat!']

title: One Pot Stove-Top Pumpkin Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'garlic, smashed', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh sage', 'short-cut pasta', 'canned coconut milk or whole milk', 'cream cheese, cubed', 'pumpkin puree', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded creamy gouda cheese', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'nutmeg', 'Kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '2', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'fresh sage': '9', 'short-cut pasta': '1', 'canned coconut milk or whole milk': '1', 'cream cheese, cubed': '3', 'pumpkin puree': '1', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded creamy gouda cheese': '1 1/2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'nutmeg': '1/4', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Melt the butter with the garlic, thyme, and sage in a large pot set over medium heat. Allow the butter to brown around the garlic, 3-5 minutes. Once browned, remove the sage leaves and set aside.', '2. To the pot, add the pasta and toss with the butter. Add 4 cups of water and bring to a boil over high heat. Add 1 1/2 teaspoons salt. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes. Do not drain the water. Stir in the milk, cream cheese, and pumpkin, and cook until the cream cheese has melted and the pasta is al dente, about 4-5 minutes more.', '4. Pick out the garlic cloves and set aside. Add the cheddar and Gouda, onion powder, paprika, cayenne, and nutmeg, and stir until melted and creamy. Remove from the heat.', '5. If desired, chop or mash the garlic and stir in the pasta. Season with salt and pepper. If the sauce feels thick, add ¼ cup milk or water to thin.', '6. Divide the mac and cheese between bowls. Top with black pepper, the reserved sage, and grated nutmeg.']

title: Crockpot Sunday Sauce
ingredients: ['bone in beef short ribs', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper', 'crushed san Marzano tomatoes', 'tomato paste', 'chopped oil packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'red wine', 'carrots, cut into large pieces', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'pickled jalapeños', 'Italian seasoning', 'chili flakes', 'parmesan rind, plus grated parmesan, for serving', 'garlic, top portion trimmed off', 'salted butter', 'pasta, plus fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'bone in beef short ribs': '5', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'crushed san Marzano tomatoes': '2', 'tomato paste': '1', 'chopped oil packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1/2', 'red wine': '1 1/2', 'carrots, cut into large pieces': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/3', 'Italian seasoning': '2', 'chili flakes': '1/2 -1', 'parmesan rind, plus grated parmesan, for serving': 'seasoning', 'garlic, top portion trimmed off': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'pasta, plus fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Season the short ribs with salt and pepper. Heat a large skillet over high heat, sear the ribs on both sides. Place the ribs in the slow cooker.', '2. To the slow cooker, add the tomatoes, tomato paste, sun-dried tomatoes, wine, carrots, onion, pickled jalapeños, Italian seasoning, and season generously with salt, pepper, and chili flakes. Stir the sauce to combine.', '3. Place the parmesan rind in the sauce. Add the garlic head. Cover and cook on low for 7-8 hours or on high for 5-6 hours. During the last hour of cooking, remove the garlic.', '4. Squeeze the garlic cloves out of their skins. Add both the butter and cloves to a skillet set over medium heat. Mash the garlic into the butter, allowing the butter to brown and some of the garlic to get crispy. Remove from the heat.', '5. Remove the parmesan rind. Shred the ribs and add them to the sauce. Stir the garlic butter into the sauce. Serve over pasta. Top with parmesan and basil. Enjoy!']

title: Super Easy Homemade Cheesy Spaghetti O’s
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, chopped', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'chili flakes', 'tomato paste', 'Anellini or other small pasta', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'onion powder', 'paprika', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'grated pecorino cheese', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'tomato paste': '1/3', 'Anellini or other small pasta': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'onion powder': '1', 'paprika': '1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'grated pecorino cheese': '1/2', 'fresh basil': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Melt together the butter, olive oil, garlic, oregano, and chili flakes in a large pot over medium heat. Cook until the butter turns golden, about 5 minutes.', '2. Reduce the heat to low, stir in the tomato paste. Cook 1-2 minutes, then pour over 3 cups of water. Bring to a boil over high heat. Add the pasta, onion powder, paprika, and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, about 12 minutes.', '3. Stir in the parmesan, pecorino, and basil until the cheese is melted.', '4. Serve immediately topped with fresh basil. Eat!']

title: Chili Crisp Peanut Noodles with Crispy Halloumi
ingredients: ['rice noodles or long cut pasta', 'creamy peanut butter', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'honey', 'Thai red curry paste', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'carrots, shredded', 'bell peppers, thinly sliced', 'sesame oil', 'halloumi cheese, cubed and patted dry', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'green onions, thinly sliced', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'chopped peanuts', 'lime juice']
ingredients with measurement: {'rice noodles or long cut pasta': '8', 'creamy peanut butter': '1/2', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'honey': '2', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'carrots, shredded': '2', 'bell peppers, thinly sliced': '2', 'sesame oil': '1 tablespoon, plus 1/4', 'halloumi cheese, cubed and patted dry': '8', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'green onions, thinly sliced': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': '3', 'chopped peanuts': '3', 'lime juice': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the noodles according to package directions. Drain and add to a large bowl with the carrots and peppers.', '2. Meanwhile, in a food processor, combine the peanut butter, soy sauce, honey, curry paste, ginger, and 1/3 cup water. Pulse until combined and smooth. Pour the sauce over the warm noodles. Tossing well.', '3. Heat 1 tablespoon sesame oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the Halloumi and cook until golden, about 5 minutes. Remove from the skillet.', '4. To the skillet, add 1/4 cup sesame oil, the garlic, and a pinch of chili flakes. Cook until the garlic crisps, about 5 minutes. Toss the Halloumi with 1/2 of the garlic oil, cilantro, basil, peanuts, and sesame seeds. Add the lime juice.', '5. Divide the noodles between bowls and top with the halloumi, herbs, and additional chili garlic oil. Enjoy!']

title: One Skillet Street Corn Chicken Enchilada Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs, sliced', 'fajita seasoning', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'enchilada sauce or salsa verde', 'fresh corn', 'cream cheese, room temp', 'plain greek yogurt', 'chili powder', 'chopped fresh chives', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend', 'tortillas, warmed', 'mayo', 'avocado, cotija cheese, limes, cilantro, and Tajin for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs, sliced': '1 1/2', 'fajita seasoning': '2', 'yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'enchilada sauce or salsa verde': '2 1/2', 'fresh corn': '2', 'cream cheese, room temp': '4', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/4', 'chili powder': '1', 'chopped fresh chives': '2', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend': '1 1/2', 'tortillas, warmed': '6', 'mayo': '1/4', 'avocado, cotija cheese, limes, cilantro, and Tajin for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400°.', '2. In a large oven-safe skillet, combine the olive oil, chicken, 1-2 tablespoons fajita seasoning, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat. Set the skillet over high heat. Cook until seared all over, minutes. Add the onion and peppers. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the salsa verde or enchilada sauce.', '3. In a bowl, combine the corn, cream cheese, yogurt, chili powder, chives, and salt. Stir in half the cheese.', '4. Spoon the corn down the center of each tortilla, tuck, and roll. Place the tortillas seam side down over the chicken. Top with the remaining cheese. Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '4. Serve warm, drizzled with mayo, then sprinkle with Tajin or cayenne. Top with avocado, cilantro, and cotija cheese. Enjoy!']

title: Heirloom Tomato Cheddar Tart with Everything Spice.
ingredients: ['frozen puff pastry', 'basil pesto', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'heirloom tomatoes', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'toasted white sesame seeds', 'toasted black sesame seeds', 'poppy seeds', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'frozen puff pastry': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/2', 'heirloom tomatoes': '4-6', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'toasted white sesame seeds': '2', 'toasted black sesame seeds': '1', 'poppy seeds': '2', 'onion powder': '2', 'garlic powder': '2', 'kosher salt': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. Lay the pastry on the prepared baking sheet and prick the pastry with a fork. Spread the pesto over the dough, leaving a 1/4-inch border, then top with cheddar. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the pastry is golden and the cheese has melted.', '3. title: Crispy BBQ Salmon Bowls with Roasted Jalapeño Peach Salsa
ingredients: ['salmon filets', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'cinnamon', 'kosher salt', 'peaches, quartered', 'corn', 'jalapeños', 'shallot, halved', 'avocado, cubed', 'cilantro, chopped', 'lime zest, plus 1/4 cup lime juice', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'rice, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'salmon filets': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'honey': '1', 'chili powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'cinnamon': '1/8', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'peaches, quartered': '2', 'corn': '1', 'jalapeños': '1-2', 'shallot, halved': '1', 'avocado, cubed': '1', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'lime zest, plus 1/4 cup lime juice': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'rice, for serving': '3-4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. Place the salmon on a baking sheet and rub with olive oil, honey, chili powder, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt. To the pan, add the peaches, corn, jalapeños, and shallots. Roast 10-15 minutes or until the fish is cooked to your liking. During the last minute, switch the oven to broil and broil until lightly charred.\xa0Set the fish aside.', '3. To make the salsa.\xa0Dice the peaches, remove the corn kernels from the cob, and chop the jalapeños and shallot. Add everything to a bowl with the avocado, cilantro, lime zest, and lime juice.', '4. Melt together the butter and garlic. Cook until the butter is browning and the garlic crisps. Add chili flakes and salt, to taste.', '5. Serve the salmon and salsa over bowls of rice. Drizzle the butter over the salmon and top with basil or cilantro.']

title: 20 Minute Thai Basil Beef and Lemongrass Rice Bowls.
ingredients: ['shredded carrots', 'bell pepper, sliced', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'green onions, chopped', 'toasted sesame oil', 'lime juice', 'rice vinegar', 'fish sauce or tamari', 'honey', 'lean ground beef', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh grated ginger', 'black pepper', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'Thai or sweet Italian basil, chopped', 'sesame seeds and peanuts, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'shredded carrots': '1', 'bell pepper, sliced': '1', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '1/2', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'toasted sesame oil': '2', 'lime juice': '2', 'rice vinegar': '1', 'fish sauce or tamari': '1', 'honey': '2', 'lean ground beef': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1/3', 'Thai or sweet Italian basil, chopped': '2', 'sesame seeds and peanuts, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the salad. Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Toss well and set aside.', '2. To make the beef. In a large skillet, cook the beef with black pepper over medium heat, breaking up the meat as it cooks until browned, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and ginger and cook another minute. title: Creamy Roasted Tomato Ricotta Pasta with Crispy Prosciutto
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, smashed', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'prosciutto', 'ricotta cheese', 'long or short cut pasta', 'salted butter', 'shredded gouda cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'cherry tomatoes': '3', 'garlic, smashed': '6-10', 'fresh thyme leaves': '3', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'prosciutto': '8', 'ricotta cheese': '1/2', 'long or short cut pasta': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'shredded gouda cheese': '1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/3', 'fresh basil': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss together the olive oil, tomatoes, garlic, 2 tablespoons thyme, rosemary, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Arrange the prosciutto on top of the tomatoes. Bake 15-20 minutes, until the prosciutto is crisp and the tomatoes are bursting.', "3. Add 2/3's of the tomatoes, the garlic, and the ricotta to a food processor. Puree until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.", '4. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, remove 1 cup of the pasta cooking water. Drain.', '5. In the same pot, melt together the butter and 1 tablespoon of thyme. Cook until the butter is browning, then add the tomato puree and 1/2 cup pasta cooking water, stirring until combined. Melt in the gouda and parmesan.', '6. Add the pasta and remaining tomatoes to the sauce, tossing to combine. If needed, thin the sauce with a little of the reserved pasta cooking water.', '7. Divide the pasta between plates. Top with parmesan, prosciutto, and fresh basil. EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Sweet and Spicy Sesame Meatball Bowl with Mango Cucumber Salad
ingredients: ['ground chicken or pork', 'green onions chopped', 'garlic, grated', 'grated ginger', 'cilantro, chopped', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'black pepper', 'sesame oil', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'chili sauce', 'honey', 'sesame seeds', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder', 'steamed rice', 'Persian cucumbers, sliced', 'mango, peach, or a mix, chopped', 'Gochugaru flakes', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'sesame seeds']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken or pork': '1', 'green onions chopped': '2', 'garlic, grated': '3', 'grated ginger': '2', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'sesame oil': '2', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1', 'chili sauce': '1-2', 'honey': '2', 'sesame seeds': '1', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder': '1', 'steamed rice': '3', 'Persian cucumbers, sliced': '2', 'mango, peach, or a mix, chopped': '1', 'Gochugaru flakes': '1'}
instructions: ['1. To make the meatballs. Add the chicken, green onions, 1 clove grated garlic, 1 tablespoon grated ginger, cilantro, Worcestershire sauce, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Mix until just combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-20 meatballs).', '2. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the meatballs and sear until crisp and mostly cooked through, about 5-8 minutes, turning them 2-3 times.', '3. Meanwhile, make the sauce. In a glass jar, combine the tamari, 1/3 cup water, 3 cloves grated garlic, 1 tablespoon grated ginger, chili sauce, honey, and sesame seeds. In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch with 1 tablespoon water.', '4. Pour the sauce over the meatballs. Simmer 2-3 minutes, then add the cornstarch, and cook until the sauce lightly coats the meatballs.', '5. Add the cucumbers to a bowl and toss with 1 tablespoon of salt. Let sit 5 minutes, then drain out the water. Add the mango, gochugaru flakes, tamari, and sesame seeds.', '6. Spoon the rice into bowls. Add the salad, the meatballs, and a handful of green onions and basil.']

title: Easiest One Pan Corn and Zucchini Pesto Orzo Casserole
ingredients: ['zucchini or yellow summer squash, sliced', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, chopped', 'shallot, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'Italian seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fresh corn', 'chili flakes', 'dry orzo pasta', 'basil pesto', 'shredded Havarti or mozzarella cheese', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'zucchini or yellow summer squash, sliced': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh corn': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'basil pesto': '1', 'shredded Havarti or mozzarella cheese': '3/4', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '3/4', 'fresh basil': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. In a 9×13 inch baking dish, combine the zucchini, olive oil, garlic, shallots, thyme, Italian seasoning, chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Roast 15 minutes. Pull the zucchini out of the oven. To the same pan, add the corn, orzo, and pesto. Pour over 2 1/2 cups of water and stir to combine. Return the dish to the oven and bake for 12-15 minutes, until most of the water has cooked into the pasta, but not all of it.', "3. Stir the pasta around, then sprinkle over the cheeses. Bake another 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted and the sauce is bubbling. If there's a lot of oil from the pesto on top, drain off the excess. Top with fresh basil!"]

title: Caprese Garlic Bread with Crispy Prosciutto
ingredients: ['prosciutto, torn', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'champagne or apple cider vinegar', 'honey or maple', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chili flakes', 'burrata cheese', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'fresh basil, thinly sliced', 'salted butter', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'chopped fresh parsley', 'ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise', 'garlic, halved']

Break the burrata cheese over the warm grilled bread. Spoon over the tomatoes, top with fresh basil and crumbled prosciutto. Slice and serve!']

title: Pull Apart Italian Sub Sliders
ingredients: ['dinner rolls, halved lengthwise', 'dijon mustard', 'fig preserves', 'roasted red pepper sauce, or 2 roasted red peppers, sliced', 'mixed pitted Italian olives, chopped', 'chopped pepperoncini', 'assorted deli meat', 'fresh basil leaves', 'whole milk deli mozzarella cheese', 'deli provolone cheese', 'baby arugula', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'garlic, chopped', 'Italian seasoning', 'grated parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'dinner rolls, halved lengthwise': '1', 'dijon mustard': '1/4', 'fig preserves': '1', 'roasted red pepper sauce, or 2 roasted red peppers, sliced': '1/2', 'mixed pitted Italian olives, chopped': '1/2', 'chopped pepperoncini': '2', 'assorted deli meat': '9-12', 'fresh basil leaves': '1/2', 'whole milk deli mozzarella cheese': '4-6', 'deli provolone cheese': '4-6', 'baby arugula': '1', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4-6', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. Place the bottom half of the dinner rolls\xa0onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Spread the dijon over the bottom half of the roll. Add the fig preserves and red pepper sauce (or red peppers). Layer on the olives,  pepperoncini, deli meats, basil, mozzarella, provolone, and then arugula. Place the top half of the roll over the cheese.', '3. In a bowl, mix together the butter, garlic, Italian seasoning, and parmesan. Spread the butter over the top of the rolls, reserving extra for serving. Cover the rolls with tin foil and bake 10-15 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking another 10-15 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '4. Brush with any remaining garlic butter, serve immediately with additional red pepper sauce on the side.']

title: Grilled Caprese Pesto Chicken Skewers
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'basil pesto', 'balsamic vinegar', 'honey', 'lemon juice', 'kosher salt, black pepper, and chili flakes', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size chunks', 'cherry tomatoes', 'mozzarella balls', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh basil leaves']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'basil pesto': '2/3', 'balsamic vinegar': '1/3', 'honey': '3', 'lemon juice': '2', 'kosher salt, black pepper, and chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size chunks': '2', 'cherry tomatoes': '2', 'mozzarella balls': '1/2', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'fresh basil leaves': '2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the vinaigrette. In a glass jar, combine the pesto, balsamic vinegar, honey, and lemon. Season with chili flakes, salt, and pepper.', '2. In a bowl, toss the chicken with half of the vinaigrette and 1 tablespoon olive oil. In a separate bowl toss the tomatoes with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper.', '3. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat. Take skewers and thread the chicken with the tomatoes. If you have additional tomatoes, thread them on additional skewers and grill them up with the chicken.', '4. Grill the skewers until lightly charred and cooked through, turning them occasionally throughout cooking, about 10 to 12 minutes total.', '5. To serve, toss the mozzarella balls with a couple tablespoons of the vinaigrette. Arrange the mozzarella and burrata on a serving plate. Place the skewers over the cheese. Spoon the remaining vinaigrette over everything. I usually add additional olive oil + balsamic too. Top with basil. Enjoy!']

title: Chicken Fajita Tortilla Bowls
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs, thinly sliced', 'smoked paprika', 'chili powder or Tajin', 'cumin', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'garlic, chopped', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'cooked rice', 'grilled corn kernels', 'crumbled cotija cheese', 'shredded lettuce, mashed/whipped avocado, jalapeños, and cilantro, for serving', 'tortillas, for serving', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salsa verde', 'lime juice', 'spicy honey', 'cilantro, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs, thinly sliced': '1 1/2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'chili powder or Tajin': '2', 'cumin': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'bell peppers, sliced': '3', 'cooked rice': '3-4', 'grilled corn kernels': '3', 'crumbled cotija cheese': '1/2', 'shredded lettuce, mashed/whipped avocado, jalapeños, and cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning', 'tortillas, for serving': 'seasoning', 'salsa verde': '1/3', 'lime juice': '1/4', 'spicy honey': '2', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, combine the olive oil, chicken, paprika, chili powder (or Tajin), cumin, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat. Set the skillet over high heat. Cook until seared all over and cooked through, 8-10 minutes. During the last 2 minutes of cooking, add the garlic. Cook 1 minute, then remove everything from the skillet.', '2. In the same skillet, add the onions and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Toss in the bell peppers. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until the peppers are tender, another 5 minutes.', '3. Add the chicken to the peppers and toss to combine.', '4. To make the vinaigrette, combine all ingredients in a glass jar. Season with salt.', '5. Spoon the chicken and peppers over the bowls of rice. Top with lettuce and grilled corn. Sprinkle the corn with chili powder or Tajin, then pour over the vinaigrette. Crumble the cheese over each bowl. Top with avocado, jalapeños, and cilantro. Serve with tortillas. Enjoy!']

title: Summer Chicken Salad with Hot Bacon Dressing
ingredients: ['thick-cut slices of bacon, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'shallot, thinly sliced', 'garlic, grated', 'apple cider vinegar', 'fig preserves', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'torn ciabatta bread', 'clove garlic, grated', 'mixed salad greens', 'grilled chicken, cubed or shredded', 'roasted/grilled bell peppers, sliced', 'grilled corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'avocado, sliced', 'crumbled blue cheese or feta cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick-cut slices of bacon, chopped': '6', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'shallot, thinly sliced': '1', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'apple cider vinegar': '3', 'fig preserves': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'torn ciabatta bread': '1', 'clove garlic, grated': '1', 'mixed salad greens': '6', 'grilled chicken, cubed or shredded': '2', 'roasted/grilled bell peppers, sliced': '1-2', 'grilled corn, kernels removed from the cob': '3', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '2', 'avocado, sliced': '1', 'crumbled blue cheese or feta cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients except the bacon in a glass jar and whisk until smooth.', '2. Cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain onto a paper towel. Stir the bacon into the dressing.', '3. To make the croutons. Heat the same skillet used to cook the bacon over medium heat. Add the bread and toss in the bacon grease. If needed add 1-2 tablespoons olive oil. Cook until toasted, 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the garlic, then remove from the heat and season with salt.', '4. To assemble the salad. In a large salad bowl, combine the greens, chicken, peppers, corn, tomatoes, avocado, cheese, and croutons. Toss well with the dressing. Enjoy!']

title: Lemon Pesto Burrata and Brown Butter Gnocchi
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'asparagus, ends trimmed', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili flakes', 'lemon zest', 'fresh potato gnocchi', 'basil pesto', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh parmesan, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'asparagus, ends trimmed': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '6', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'lemon zest': '2', 'fresh potato gnocchi': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'fresh parmesan, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the asparagus and cook until tender, 3-5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Add 1 tablespoon butter, 1 clove garlic, lemon zest, and chili flakes. Cook until the butter browns, 1-2 minutes. Remove from the skillet.', '2. To the same skillet, add the gnocchi and 5 tablespoons butter. Allow the gnocchi to get crispy, about 4-5 minutes, then toss with the butter and add the garlic. Cook another 2 minutes, then stir in the pesto and remove from the heat. Season with salt and pepper.', '3. Break the burrata into serving bowls. Add the asparagus, then spoon over the gnocchi. Top with parmesan and extra pesto.']

title: Jalapeño Cream Cheese Chicken Taquitos with Buffalo Sauce
ingredients: ['cooked shredded chicken', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'buffalo sauce', 'shredded pepper jack or cheddar cheese', 'corn tortillas, warmed', 'olive oil, for rubbing', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream', 'buttermilk', 'fresh parsley, chopped', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'cooked shredded chicken': '1 1/2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '4', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped': '1', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped': '2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh dill, chopped': '2', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'buffalo sauce': '1/3', 'shredded pepper jack or cheddar cheese': '1', 'corn tortillas, warmed': '16-20', 'olive oil, for rubbing': 'seasoning', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/2', 'buttermilk': '1/2', 'fresh parsley, chopped': '1/4', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'kosher salt': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a bowl, combine the chicken, cream cheese, jalapeño, pickled jalapeños, cilantro, dill, and green onions. Stir in the cheese and buffalo sauce.', '3. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds to 1 minute in the microwave, until pliable. On a baking sheet, rub the tortillas with olive oil. title: One Pot Sun-Dried Tomato Pasta with Whipped Ricotta
ingredients: ['oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'small shallots, sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'spanish or smoked paprika', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'short cut pasta', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'lemon juice', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'salted butter', 'chopped fresh basil', 'chopped fresh parsley', 'chopped fresh dill']
ingredients with measurement: {'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1', 'small shallots, sliced': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'spanish or smoked paprika': '1 1/2', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1', 'lemon juice': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'chopped fresh basil': '1/3', 'chopped fresh parsley': '1/3', 'chopped fresh dill': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Drain the oil from the sun-dried tomato jar into a large pot or skillet with sides. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes.', '2. Set the pot over medium-high heat. Add the shallots and garlic, cook until fragrant, 2 minutes. Stir in the sun-dried tomatoes, paprika, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook until the tomatoes turn deep red and are crisping, 3-5 minutes. Add 3 1/2 cups water. Bring to a boil, add the pasta, and cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, 8 minutes.', '3. Meanwhile, whip the ricotta and lemon in a food processor until creamy. Season with salt.', '4. To the pasta, stir in in the parmesan and butter until very creamy. Remove from the heat and stir in the basil, parsley, and dill.', '3. Swirl the ricotta into a large pasta bowl or individual bowls. Add the hot pasta and lightly toss with the ricotta. title: Sheet Pan Chipotle Salmon Tacos with Pineapple Jalapeño Salsa
ingredients: ['salmon filets, cut into bite size chunks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chopped chipotle in adobo', 'honey', 'smoked or regular paprika', 'dried thyme', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'warm tortillas, shredded cabbage/lettuce, and avocado, for serving', 'crumbled cotija cheese', 'jalapeños', 'diced pineapple', 'diced mango', 'cilantro, roughly chopped', 'ginger, grated', 'juice of a lime (about 2 tablespoons)']

title: 20 Minute Red Curry Basil Garlic Oil Noodles
ingredients: ['sesame or peanut oil', 'green onions, sliced', 'Thai red curry paste', 'garlic, grated', 'ginger, grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes, to taste', 'chopped fresh Thai or regular basil', 'chopped fresh cilantro', 'brown rice ramen noodles, or 6 ounces rice noodles', 'tamari or soy sauce']

title: Spicy Orange Sesame Chicken
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'egg white', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'orange zest', 'black pepper', 'cornstarch', 'avocado oil', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'fresh orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh grated ginger', 'chili flakes', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'green onions and sesame seeds, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '1 1/2', 'egg white': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'orange zest': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'cornstarch': '1/3', 'avocado oil': '1/3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '1/3', 'fresh orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest': '1', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'honey': '3', 'garlic, grated': '4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'chili flakes': '1/2-1', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'green onions and sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the chicken, egg white, tamari/soy sauce, orange zest, and pepper. Toss well to coat. In a separate bowl, add the cornstarch.', '2. Dredge the chicken through the cornstarch to coat.', '3. In a glass jar, whisk together the broth, orange juice, tamari/soy sauce, rice vinegar, and honey.', '4. Heat the avocado oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken, working in batches, cook until golden all around, about 5 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet.', '5. To the skillet, add the garlic, ginger, and chili flakes. Cook 1-2 minutes. Pour in the orange sauce. Bring to a boil, boil 3-4 minutes, then add the chicken. Toss with the sauce and cook until the sauce thickens around the chicken, about 5 minutes.', '6. Serve the chicken and sauce over steamed rice with sesame seeds and green onions.']

title: Crockpot Crispy Chicken Tinga Tacos with Jalapeño Avocado Crema
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'red enchilada sauce', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped', 'dried oregano', 'ground cumin', 'kosher salt', 'corn tortillas, warmed', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded lettuce and pickled onions, for serving', 'large avocados, halved', 'pickled jalapeños', 'fresh cilantro', 'honey', 'garlic, grated', 'limes (juice from)', 'flaky salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '1 1/2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'red enchilada sauce': '3/4', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped': '2-3', 'dried oregano': '1', 'ground cumin': '1', 'kosher salt': '1', 'corn tortillas, warmed': '12-16', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'shredded lettuce and pickled onions, for serving': 'seasoning', 'large avocados, halved': '2', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/4-1/2', 'fresh cilantro': '1/2', 'honey': '1-2', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'limes (juice from)': '2', 'flaky salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the chicken, onion, enchilada sauce, chipotle, oregano, cumin, and salt. Cover and cook on LOW for 4-5 hours or on HIGH for 2-3 hours.', '2. When finished cooking, shred the meat and toss with the sauce. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '3. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds to 1 minute in the microwave, until pliable. Transfer to the oven and bake for 5-8 minutes, then flip and cook another 5 minutes, or until the cheese has melted and the tortillas are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile, make the Avocado Crema. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt.', '5. Serve the tacos topped with avocado, lettuce, limes, and any other desired toppings.']

title: Roasted Cauliflower Pitas with Zhug and Garlic Tahini

title: Simple Thai Yellow Chicken Curry with Spicy Garlic Butter
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'baby potatoes, cubed', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless chicken breasts, cubed', 'Thai red curry paste', 'yellow curry powder', 'lemongrass paste', 'canned full-fat coconut milk', 'fish sauce or tamari', 'chopped fresh cilantro', 'juice and zest of 1 lime', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili flakes', 'honey']

instructions: ['1. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onion and potatoes. Cook 10 minutes, until soft. title: Sheet Pan Greek Garlic Butter Chicken and Potatoes
ingredients: ['baby potatoes, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'lemons, 1 halved, and 1 sliced', 'chicken thighs or breasts', 'dried oregano', 'smoked or regular paprika', 'shallot, chopped', 'red pepper flakes', 'garlic cloves, lightly smashed', 'mixed fresh parsley, oregano, and dill, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'feta cheese, cubed', 'salted butter, sliced into 6 pieces', 'red wine vinegar', 'pepperoncini, chopped', 'Greek olive mix, or green olives, torn']
ingredients with measurement: {'baby potatoes, halved': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'lemons, 1 halved, and 1 sliced': '2', 'chicken thighs or breasts': '6', 'dried oregano': '2', 'smoked or regular paprika': '1', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'garlic cloves, lightly smashed': '6-8', 'mixed fresh parsley, oregano, and dill, chopped': '2', 'yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'feta cheese, cubed': '6-8', 'salted butter, sliced into 6 pieces': '4', 'red wine vinegar': '2', 'pepperoncini, chopped': '1-2', 'Greek olive mix, or green olives, torn': '3/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F.', '2. On a large baking sheet, toss the potatoes with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Season with salt and black pepper. Add the lemon halves. Roast for 20 minutes, or until tender.', '3. In a bowl, toss together 2 tablespoons olive oil, the chicken, dried oregano, paprika, shallot, salt, pepper, and chili flakes.', '4. Remove the potatoes from the oven and nestle the chicken around the potatoes.\xa0Arrange the onions, garlic, and lemon slices around the chicken. Add 1 slice of butter to each piece of chicken. Return the pan to the oven for 20-25 minutes more, until the chicken is cooked through.', '5. To make the dressing. Combine the remaining 1/3 cup olive oil, red wine vinegar, herbs, pepperoncinis, and olives.', '6. Remove the charred lemon slices and garlic cloves from the baking sheet. Finely chop the lemon slices, rind and all, discarding any seeds. Add half of the lemon to the dressing. Chop/mash the garlic into a paste, stir the garlic into the dressing. Season with red pepper and salt. Taste adding more of the lemon as desired.', '7. Break the feta over the chicken, then add the dressing. Top with fresh herbs. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Red’s Favorite Spicy Tuna Poke Bowl
ingredients: ['sushi grade tuna steaks, cubed', 'soy sauce or tamari', 'sesame chili oil', 'grated ginger', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'chopped green onions', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'Persian cucumbers, sliced', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'sushi rice, cooked', 'avocado, pickled ginger, and nori sheets – for serving', 'fried shallot crumbs', 'olive oil mayo', 'sriracha', 'soy sauce or tamari', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'sushi grade tuna steaks, cubed': '2', 'soy sauce or tamari': '2', 'sesame chili oil': '1', 'grated ginger': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1 to 2', 'chopped green onions': '1/4', 'toasted sesame seeds': '1', 'Persian cucumbers, sliced': '1', 'rice vinegar': '1', 'honey': '1', 'sushi rice, cooked': '3-4', 'avocado, pickled ginger, and nori sheets – for serving': 'seasoning', 'fried shallot crumbs': 'seasoning', 'olive oil mayo': '1/3', 'sriracha': '1 to 2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the poke. In a medium bowl, combine the tuna, soy sauce (or tamari), sesame chili oil, ginger, red pepper flakes, green onion, and sesame seeds. Toss to mix.', '2. To make the cucumber salad. Toss together the cucumbers, rice vinegar, honey, and a pinch each of chili flakes and salt.', '3. To make the Spicy Mayo. In a small bowl, stir together the mayo, sriracha, honey, and soy sauce (or tamari).', '4. To assemble, add the rice to bowls, top with avocado, cucumber salad, poke, pickled ginger, green onions, and nori. Spoon over the spicy mayo. Sprinkle on the crumbs. title: Bang Bang Shrimp and Fried Avocado Tacos
ingredients: ['olive oil mayo', 'sweet Thai chili sauce, or to taste', 'hot sauce', 'flaky sea salt', 'lime, zested + quartered', 'shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'all-purpose flour, or use gluten-free', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'mixed white and black sesame seeds', 'egg, beaten', 'avocados, sliced', 'avocado oil, or peanut oil, for cooking', 'warm tortillas, for serving', 'shredded cabbage and cilantro, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'olive oil mayo': '1/2', 'sweet Thai chili sauce, or to taste': '1/3', 'hot sauce': '3', 'flaky sea salt': 'seasoning', 'lime, zested + quartered': '1', 'shrimp, peeled and deveined': '1', 'all-purpose flour, or use gluten-free': '1/3', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '1/2', 'mixed white and black sesame seeds': '3', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'avocados, sliced': '2', 'avocado oil, or peanut oil, for cooking': '4', 'warm tortillas, for serving': '12', 'shredded cabbage and cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the sauce. Combine mayo, chili sauce, hot sauce, and lime zest in a bowl. Season with salt.', '2. To make the tacos. In a bowl, combine the flour, onion powder, and garlic powder. Dredge the shrimp through the flour to coat. Place on a plate.', '3. In a bowl, combine the Panko and sesame seeds. Add the egg to another bowl. Toss the avocado slices with lime juice. Dip the avocado in the egg, then dredge through the Panko crumbs.', '4. Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the avocado slices, in batches if needed, and cook until golden, 1-2 minutes per side. Repeat with the remaining avocado. Season with salt.', '5. In the same skillet, heat 1 tablespoon oil over high heat. Add the shrimp and sear until pink on both sides, 3-4 minutes. Remove from the heat and toss with half the sauce.', '6. Stuff the greens/cilantro, fried avocado, and shrimp into the warmed tortillas. Serve with the remaining sauce.']

title: Creamy White Bean Lemon Pesto Orzo Soup
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, smashed', 'red pepper flakes', 'salted butter', 'dry orzo pasta', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'white beans', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'kale, finely shredded', 'basil pesto', 'whole milk or canned full fat coconut milk', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, smashed': '4-6', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '2', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '6', 'white beans': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'kale, finely shredded': '1/2', 'basil pesto': '1/2', 'whole milk or canned full fat coconut milk': '1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add the shallot, garlic, and chili flakes and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes.\xa0Drop in the butter, then stir in the orzo. Cook until golden, 1-3 minutes. Pour in the broth and bring to a boil over high heat. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in the beans and kale. Season with salt and pepper. If you have one, add a parmesan rind. Simmer 8-10 minutes until the orzo is al dente, stirring often. It should become very creamy.', '2. Stir in the pesto, milk, parmesan, and lemon, cook another few minutes until warmed through.', '3. Divide the orzo and broth among bowls and add additional parmesan and black pepper. I like to add some fresh dill, parsley, or basil too!']

title: Folded Crispy Chicken and Cheese Wraps
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion chopped', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'garlic, chopped', 'dried oregano', 'ground cumin', 'cayenne pepper, using more or less to taste', 'Kosher salt and black pepper', 'whole wheat, or gluten-free, tortillas', 'shredded romaine lettuce', 'chopped pickles', 'chopped cilantro', 'mustard', 'very thin slices deli ham', 'shredded swiss cheese', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'avocado, halved', 'fresh cilantro', 'pickled jalapeños, use to your taste', 'lime juice', 'cumin', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'mayo']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion chopped': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'dried oregano': '2', 'ground cumin': '1', 'cayenne pepper, using more or less to taste': '1/2', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'whole wheat, or gluten-free, tortillas': '4', 'shredded romaine lettuce': '2', 'chopped pickles': '1/2', 'chopped cilantro': '1/2', 'mustard': '4', 'very thin slices deli ham': '4', 'shredded swiss cheese': '1/2', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2', 'avocado, halved': '1', 'fresh cilantro': '1', 'pickled jalapeños, use to your taste': '1/4- 1/2', 'lime juice': '2', 'cumin': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'mayo': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. Add the onion and chicken and cook 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic, oregano, cumin, cayenne, and season with salt and pepper. Cook another 5 minutes until the chicken is browned.', '2. To assemble, cut down from the center of the tortilla to the edge (see above photo). Spread the chicken in the bottom left corner, then add a handful of the lettuce, pickles, and cilantro on the top left corner. Spread the mustard on the top right corner, add the cheese, and ham (see photos for visuals). Fold the chicken over the lettuce. Then, working clockwise, fold that quarter over the ham. And finally, fold that quarter over the bottom corner with cheese.', '3. To make the jalapeño sauce, combine all ingredients except the mayo in a blender. Blend until smooth. Now add the mayo and season with salt. Pulse to combine.', '4. Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a skillet, add 1 wrap and cook 2-3 minutes per side until crisp and golden brown. Serve warm with jalapeño sauce.']

title: Garlic Miso Butter Grilled Cheese

Place the sandwiches in the skillet and cook until golden on each side, about 3-5 minutes per side. Drizzle with honey.']

title: Baked Sesame Orange Cauliflower
ingredients: ['cauliflower, cut into florets', 'eggs, beaten', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'cornstarch', 'sesame oil', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh grated ginger', 'chili flakes', 'fresh orange juice + 1 tablespoon orange zest', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'green onions, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'eggs, beaten': '3', 'Panko bread crumbs': '1 1/4', 'cornstarch': '2', 'sesame oil': '1', 'garlic, grated': '4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'chili flakes': '1/2-1', 'fresh orange juice + 1 tablespoon orange zest': '1', 'tamari/soy sauce': '1/3', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'honey': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'green onions, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. Beat the eggs in a large bowl, add the cauliflower and toss well to coat. In a separate bowl add the Panko.', '3. Dredge the cauliflower through the crumbs, covering fully. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat with the remaining cauliflower. Bake for 15 minutes, then switch the oven to broil and broil until crisp, 2-3 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, whisk together the corn starch and 2 tablespoons water.', '5. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the oil, garlic, ginger, and chili flakes. Cook 1-2 minutes. Add the orange juice, tamari/soy sauce, rice vinegar, and honey. Bring to a boil, then whisk in the cornstarch and cook until slightly thickened. Remove from the heat. Toss the cauliflower with the sauce.', '6. title: One Pot Stove-Top Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['short-cut pasta', 'broccoli, chopped', 'canned coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk', 'cream cheese, cubed', 'medium zucchini, grated', 'dijon mustard', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded monterey jack cheese', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'salted butter', 'Kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'short-cut pasta': '1', 'broccoli, chopped': '1', 'canned coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk': '3/4', 'cream cheese, cubed': '3', 'medium zucchini, grated': '1', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '2', 'shredded monterey jack cheese': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'salted butter': '1-2', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large pot, bring 4 cups of water to a boil over high heat. Add 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, the pasta, and broccoli. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes. Do not drain the water. Stir in the milk, cream cheese, and mustard, and cook until the cream cheese has melted and the pasta is al dente, about 4-5 minutes more. Stir in the zucchini.', '2.\xa0Add the cheeses, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, cayenne, and butter (if using), and stir until melted and creamy. Remove from the heat. Season with salt and pepper. If the sauce feels thick, add ¼ cup milk or water to thin.', '3. Divide the mac and cheese between bowls. Top with black pepper.']

title: 25 Minute Chili Oil Egg Ramen
ingredients: ['butter', 'garlic, finely chopped', 'fresh chopped ginger', 'chili oil, plus more for serving', 'low sodium chicken ore vegetable broth', 'coconut milk', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'chopped baby bok choy or spinach', 'white miso paste', 'ramen noodles', 'eggs', 'green onions, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'butter': '2', 'garlic, finely chopped': '4', 'fresh chopped ginger': '1', 'chili oil, plus more for serving': '2-3', 'low sodium chicken ore vegetable broth': '6', 'coconut milk': '1/3', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'chopped baby bok choy or spinach': '3', 'white miso paste': '1/4', 'ramen noodles': '3', 'eggs': '3-4', 'green onions, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Melt together the butter, garlic and ginger in a large pot over medium heat. Cook, until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Add the chili oil, cook another minute. Pour in the broth, milk, and soy sauce, stir in the bok choy and miso, bring everything to a boil. Add the ramen, let cook until just soft, about 1-2 minutes.', "2. Crack the egg/eggs into small bowl, I wouldn't cook more than 2 eggs at a time. Pour the egg over the noodles, do not stir. Cook 30 seconds, then cover the pot and remove from the heat. Let the eggs poach 2-3 minutes, until the yolk is your desired consistency.", '3. Ladle the soup and noodles into bowls, top with an egg. Spoon over some chili oil. Top with green onions. Serve immediately.']

title: Crispy Parmesan and Pesto Egg in a Bagel
ingredients: ['bagel, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'basil pesto', 'eggs', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'arugula', 'avocado, diced', 'fresh dill', 'juice from 1/2 a lemon', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'chili flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'bagel, halved': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/3', 'basil pesto': '3', 'eggs': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'arugula': '2', 'avocado, diced': '1', 'fresh dill': '1/4', 'juice from 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'toasted sesame seeds': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ["1. Make sure the bagel's hole is 3/4 inch wide. Use your fingers to pull the hole bigger, if needed.", '2. Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the the top bagel half, cut side facing up, to one side of the skillet. To the other side, sprinkle 1/2 of the cheese in a circle the size of your bagel. Spoon 1/2 the pesto over the cheese. When the cheese melts, about 1 minute, flip the bagel, cut side facing down, onto the cheese. Crack 1 egg into the bagel hole. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and cook, until the whites are set, but the yolk is still runny, 6 to 8 minutes, or to your preference. Repeat with the remaining bagel half.', '3. In a bowl toss together the avocado, arugula, dill, lemon, sesame, chili flakes, and salt. Serve with the bagel.']

title: Sheet Pan Lemon Chicken with Sweet Potatoes and Avocado Goddess Sauce
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, chopped', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'chili powder', 'chili flakes', 'sea salt and black pepper', 'lemon, quartered', 'sweet potatoes, cut into 1/4 inch matchsticks', 'seasoned salt', 'hummus, herbs, and cucumbers, for serving', 'garlic tahini, for serving', 'avocados, halved', 'fresh cilantro', 'fresh basil', 'jalapeños, halved, and seeded, if desired', 'lemon juice', 'cumin']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'chili powder': '1/2', 'chili flakes': '1/2', 'sea salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'lemon, quartered': '1', 'sweet potatoes, cut into 1/4 inch matchsticks': '2', 'seasoned salt': '1', 'hummus, herbs, and cucumbers, for serving': 'seasoning', 'garlic tahini, for serving': 'seasoning', 'avocados, halved': '2', 'fresh cilantro': '1', 'fresh basil': '1/2', 'jalapeños, halved, and seeded, if desired': '1-2', 'lemon juice': '1/4', 'cumin': '1'}

title: Cajun Garlic Butter Shrimp with Creamy Pesto Pasta
ingredients: ['fresh basil', 'baby arugula', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired', 'garlic, chopped', 'toasted nuts', 'grated parmesan cheese, or nutritional yeast', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'pasta', 'salted butter', 'raw shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'cajun seasoning', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'canned full fat coconut milk']
ingredients with measurement: {'fresh basil': '1 1/2', 'baby arugula': '1', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'toasted nuts': '1/4', 'grated parmesan cheese, or nutritional yeast': '1/3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4 cup + 2', 'pasta': '1', 'salted butter': '1', 'raw shrimp, peeled and deveined': '1 1/2', 'cajun seasoning': '1', 'juice from 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'canned full fat coconut milk': '1/4-1/3'}
instructions: ['1. To make the pesto. In a food processor, combine the basil, arugula, jalapeño, 1 clove of garlic, the nuts, parmesan, and 1/4 cup olive oil. Season with salt. Pulse until a sauce forms, adding 1-2 tablespoons water if needed to thin.', '2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, remove 1/2 cup of the pasta cooking water. Drain and add the pasta right back into the hot pot.', '3. Add the pesto and coconut milk, tossing to combine. Thin the pasta as desired with the reserved pasta cooking water.', '4. Meanwhile, make the shrimp. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the butter, shrimp, cajun seasonings, and a big pinch of pepper. Cook on both sides until seared, about 2-3 minutes per side.\xa0Stir in the garlic, cook until fragrant. Remove from the heat, stir in the lemon juice.', '5. Toss the shrimp with the pasta. Grab a fork and enjoy!']

title: One Skillet Lemon Butter Dijon Chicken and Orzo with Feta Sauce
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'Dijon mustard', 'garlic, chopped', 'shallots, chopped', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'salted butter', 'lemon, sliced', 'orzo pasta', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'chopped kale', 'chopped fresh dill, for serving', 'feta cheese', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'garlic, grated', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'smoked paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'Dijon mustard': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'salted butter': '3', 'lemon, sliced': '1', 'orzo pasta': '1 1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3', 'chopped kale': '2', 'chopped fresh dill, for serving': 'seasoning', 'feta cheese': '4-6', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'juice from 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 400° F.', '2. In a bowl, mix 2 tablespoons olive oil, Dijon mustard, 3 cloves garlic, 1 shallot, rosemary, paprika, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Add the chicken and toss well to combine.', '3. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken. Sear on both sides until golden, 3-5 minutes. During the last 2 minutes of cooking, add the butter and lemon slices. Remove everything from the skillet.', '4. Add the orzo, 1 shallot, and 1 clove of garlic. Cook until the orzo is toasted, about 2 minutes. Add the broth, kale, and 2 tablespoons lemon juice.\xa0Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil over high heat. Slide the chicken, lemon slices, and any juices left on the pan back into the skillet.\xa0Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '5. Meanwhile, make the\xa0feta sauce.\xa0Combine the feta, yogurt, garlic, and lemon juice in a blender and blend until creamy. Stir in the paprika, and a pinch of red pepper flakes. If desired, thin with additional lemon juice.', '6. Serve the chicken and orzo topped with the feta sauce and dill.']

title: Honey Garlic Salmon Soba Noodle Bowls
