ingredients with measurement: {'soy sauce or tamari': '1/2', 'honey': '1/3', 'Gochujang': '1', 'grated ginger': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'salmon filets': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'Brussels sprouts, halved': '1/2', 'broccoli, cut into florets': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'soba noodles': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'tahini': '1/4', 'toasted sesame oil': '2', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'green onions, sliced': '4', 'toasted sesame seeds and pickled ginger, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.  In a square baking dish, whisk together the soy sauce, honey, Gochujang, ginger, and garlic. Add the salmon and let sit.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss together the brussels sprouts, broccoli, olive oil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Bake 20 minutes, until the brussels sprouts are charring.', '3. Meanwhile, make the noodles. Bring a pot of water to a boil, scoop out 1/4 cup hot water, reserve. Cook the noodles according to package directions. Drain.', '4. In a glass jar or measuring cup, whisk together the soy sauce, tahini, sesame oil, ginger, chili, and a 1/4 cup hot water until combined. Toss the noodles with the sauce.', '5. Put the salmon in the oven and bake for 5-15 minutes, until the salmon reaches desired doneness. Remove the vegetables, spoon the sauce over the salmon. Switch the oven to broil. Broil the salmon until crisping on top and the sauce is thickening. Watch close.', '6. Divide the noodles between bowls. Top with salmon, vegetables, green onions, pickled ginger, and sesame seeds. Spoon any remaining sauce over the salmon.']

title: Crockpot Korean Inspired Tacos with Yum Yum Yummm Sauce
ingredients: ['boneless short ribs or 2 pounds flank steak', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'Gochujang', 'fresh ginger peeled', 'garlic', 'small pear, cored and quartered', 'corn or flour tortillas, warmed', 'sesame salsa verde, for serving', 'avocado, sesame seeds, queso, for serving', 'shredded green cabbage', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'fresno peppers, seeded, if desired, and sliced', 'lime juice', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'olive oil  mayo', 'Gochujang', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'juice from 1/2 a lime']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless short ribs or 2 pounds flank steak': '3', 'low sodium soy sauce': '2', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'honey': '1/4', 'Gochujang': '1-2', 'fresh ginger peeled': '1', 'garlic': '4', 'small pear, cored and quartered': '1', 'corn or flour tortillas, warmed': '8-10', 'sesame salsa verde, for serving': 'seasoning', 'avocado, sesame seeds, queso, for serving': 'seasoning', 'shredded green cabbage': '3', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1', 'green onions, chopped': '6', 'fresno peppers, seeded, if desired, and sliced': '1-2', 'lime juice': '1/4', 'olive oil  mayo': '1/2', 'juice from 1/2 a lime': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a blender, combine the soy sauce, vinegar, honey, Gochujang, ginger, garlic, and pear. Blend until mostly smooth, then pour the sauce into the bowl of your crockpot. Stir in 1/2 cup water. Add the meat, then cover and cook on LOW for 6-8 hours or on HIGH for 3-4 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the meat from the sauce to a baking sheet and lightly shred. Add 1/2 cup of the cooking liquid. Broil for 2-5 minutes, until the meat caramelizes. Watch closely! Toss with additional cooking liquid, if desired.', '3. To make the slaw. In a bowl, mix the cabbage, cilantro, green onions, peppers, lime juice, soy sauce, and rice vinegar.', '4. To make the sauce. Combine all ingredients in a bowl.', '5. Stuff the meat, slaw, and avocado, into the warmed tortillas. Top with sauces, sesame seeds, and cheese.']

title: Coconut Milk Braised Black Pepper Chicken with Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: ['boneless, skinless, chicken thighs or breasts, cut into 2-inch chunks', 'ground turmeric', 'ground ginger', 'ground cumin', 'black pepper', 'kosher salt', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'medium shallots, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili flakes, or more', 'cubed sweet potatoes', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'fish sauce', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'steamed rice, for serving', 'Thai basil leaves', 'limes', 'roasted peanuts']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless, skinless, chicken thighs or breasts, cut into 2-inch chunks': '2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'ground ginger': '1', 'ground cumin': '1', 'black pepper': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'medium shallots, chopped': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'chili flakes, or more': '1/2', 'cubed sweet potatoes': '2', 'full-fat coconut milk': '2', 'fish sauce': '2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'steamed rice, for serving': 'seasoning', 'Thai basil leaves': '1/2', 'limes': '2', 'roasted peanuts': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Toss the chicken with the turmeric, ginger, cumin, pepper, a pinch of salt, and 1 tablespoon oil. Let sit 5 minutes or up to overnight in the fridge.', '2. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large Dutch oven set over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and sear on both sides until browned, about 2 minutes. Pull the chicken out of the pan.', '3. To the pot, add 1 tablespoon olive oil, the peppers, shallots, garlic, and chili flakes, cook 3 minutes, then toss in the sweet potatoes. Reduce the heat to low.\xa0Pour in the coconut milk and fish sauce. Slide the chicken and any juices on the plate into the milk. Cover and simmer for 20-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.\xa0If the sauce is too thick, add a splash of water. Stir in the cilantro and season with salt.', '4. Divide rice between bowls, then spoon the chicken and sauce over the rice. Top with basil, peanuts, and lime juice.']

title: Creamy Sun-Dried Tomato Chicken Pasta
ingredients: ['oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'Italian seasoning', 'paprika or smoked paprika', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'salted butter', 'medium shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'short cut pasta', 'heavy cream', 'Dijon mustard', 'fresh baby spinach', 'juice of 1 lemon']
ingredients with measurement: {'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed': '1', 'Italian seasoning': '4', 'paprika or smoked paprika': '1', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'grated parmesan cheese': '3/4', 'salted butter': '2', 'medium shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'heavy cream': '1', 'Dijon mustard': '2', 'fresh baby spinach': '2', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Drain 3 tablespoons of oil from the sun-dried tomato jar into a large pot or skillet with sides. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes and set aside.', '2. Set the pot over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, 3 teaspoons Italian seasoning, the paprika, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook until golden brown, 5 minutes. Add 1/4 cup parmesan, cook another minute, then remove the chicken from the pot.', '3. To the same pot, add the butter, shallot, garlic, and 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning. Cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes. Add 3 1/2 cups water. Bring to a boil, add the pasta, and cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, 8 minutes. Stir in the cream, mustard, parmesan, spinach, and chopped sun-dried tomatoes. Slide the chicken and any juices left on the plate.', '4. Serve the pasta topped with lemon juice and fresh parmesan.']

title: Crispy Sesame Ginger Egg Rolls with Sweet Chili Sauce
ingredients: ['sesame oil, plus more for cooking', 'ground chicken', 'black pepper', 'shallot, chopped', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garlic, chopped', 'mixed chopped vegetables', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'sesame seeds', 'square egg roll wrappers', 'green onions, for serving', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'pomegranate juice', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'pomegranate arils, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil, plus more for cooking': '2', 'ground chicken': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'mixed chopped vegetables': '2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '2', 'sesame seeds': '2', 'square egg roll wrappers': '20-22', 'green onions, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1/2', 'pomegranate juice': '1/4', 'pomegranate arils, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a large skillet, add the oil and chicken. Season with pepper. Cook until browned all over, about 5 minutes. Add the shallot, ginger, and garlic. Cook 2 minutes, then stir in the vegetables and cook 5 minutes, until wilted. Add the soy sauce and let the sauce caramelize around the meat. Stir in the sesame seeds, then remove from the heat.', 'note: if making vegetarian, just omit the chicken and start the cooking process with the oil and shallot. Cook the vegetables down until caramelized.', '3. \xa0To assemble, spoon 2 tablespoons of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edges of the wrapper, then roll up and place on a baking sheet. Brush each roll lightly with olive oil. Bake for 10-12 minutes, then flip and cook another 8-10 minutes more, or until the rolls are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile,\xa0make the sauce, combine all ingredients in a medium bowl.', '5. Serve the rolls warm, topped with green onions, and the sauce on the side for dipping.']

title: My Family’s Favorite Pesto Pasta Bolognese
ingredients: ['pancetta, chopped', 'yellow onions. chopped', 'chopped carrots', 'chopped celery', 'red bell pepper, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'ground beef', 'ground bison', 'ground pork', 'fish sauce', 'tomato paste', 'vodka', 'crushed tomatoes', 'fresh thyme', 'bay leaf', 'parmesan rind', 'milk', 'basil pesto', 'cooked pasta, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'pancetta, chopped': '4', 'yellow onions. chopped': '1', 'chopped carrots': '1', 'chopped celery': '1/2', 'red bell pepper, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'ground beef': '1', 'ground bison': '1', 'ground pork': '1', 'fish sauce': '1', 'tomato paste': '2', 'vodka': '1/2', 'crushed tomatoes': '1', 'fresh thyme': '3', 'bay leaf': '1', 'parmesan rind': '1', 'milk': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'cooked pasta, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large dutch oven, cook the pancetta over medium heat, until crispy, 5 minutes. Add the onion, carrots, celery, and red pepper, and cook until the veggies are softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and cook 1 minute.', '2. Add the beef, bison, and pork. Season with salt and pepper. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until browned all over, 10 minutes. Add the tomato paste and cook 5 minutes, then pour in the vodka. Add the crushed tomatoes, 3 cups water, and fish sauce. Stir in the thyme, bay leaf, and parmesan rind. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and simmer over low heat, stirring occasionally, until thickened, 2-3 hours or up to all day. If the sauce seems dry at any point, add up to 1 cup water.', '3. Discard the thyme, bay leaf, and parmesan rind. Stir in the milk and pesto, cook until warmed through, 10-15 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, boil the pasta until al dente. Drain and add back to the pot. Ladle the sauce over the pasta and toss to combine. Divide the pasta among bowls and ladle the bolognese over top. Serve topped with parmesan, and fresh herbs. Enjoy!']

title: Crispy Sesame Chicken and Ginger Rice
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'egg, beaten', 'all-purpose flour (or gluten free all-purpose flour)', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'broccoli florets', 'shallots, sliced', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil', 'pomegranate juice', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'honey', 'rice vinegar', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh grated ginger', 'crushed red pepper flakes, use more or less to taste', 'star anise', 'bay leaf', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'green onions, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes': '1 1/2', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'all-purpose flour (or gluten free all-purpose flour)': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'broccoli florets': '2', 'shallots, sliced': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil': '6', 'pomegranate juice': '1/2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/3', 'honey': '2', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'garlic, grated': '4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes, use more or less to taste': '1', 'star anise': '1', 'bay leaf': '1', 'toasted sesame seeds': '1/4', 'green onions, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 475° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease with oil.', '2. Add the chicken, egg, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Toss to combine. Add the flour to another bowl. Dredge the chicken in batches through the flour, tossing to coat. Place the chicken on one side of the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with 2 tablespoons of oil. Add the broccoli and shallots to the other side of the pan and toss with 2 more tablespoons of oil, salt, and pepper. Bake for 12 minutes. Toss the broccoli, flip the chicken, and return to the oven another 3-5 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.', '3. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, combine the pomegranate juice, soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, garlic, ginger, star anise, bay leaf, and red pepper flakes. Set over medium-high heat and bring the sauce to a boil. Boil 5-8 minutes, until the sauce thickens and reduces by about 1/3. Stir in the chicken, broccoli, and sesame seeds. Cook until the sauce coats the chicken.', '4. Serve the chicken, broccoli, and sauce over bowls of ginger rice (recipe in notes) topped with green onions.']

title: Crispy Chipotle Sweet Potato Tacos with Lime Crema
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'sweet potatoes, cubed', 'chipotle or regular chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'garlic powder', 'crushed red pepper, use to your taste', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt', 'poblano pepper, seeded and chopped', 'canned black beans, drained', 'grain-free hard shell tacos (if preferred)', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired, and chopped', 'mashed avocado, for serving', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream', 'mayonnaise', 'zest of 1 lime', 'sea salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'sweet potatoes, cubed': '2', 'chipotle or regular chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'ground cumin': '1 1/2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'crushed red pepper, use to your taste': '1/4-1/2', 'dried oregano': '1/2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'poblano pepper, seeded and chopped': '1', 'canned black beans, drained': '1', 'grain-free hard shell tacos (if preferred)': '8', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '1 1/2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired, and chopped': '1', 'mashed avocado, for serving': 'seasoning', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/2', 'mayonnaise': '3', 'zest of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'sea salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. Place the sweet potatoes on a baking sheet and toss with olive oil, chili powder, paprika, cumin, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, oregano, and salt.\xa0Add the poblano and toss to combine. Arrange in an even layer. Bake 35 to 40 minutes, until the potatoes are tender and beginning to char on the edges.\xa0Remove from the oven and stir in the black beans.', '3. Meanwhile, make the crema. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and shake or stir until creamy.', '4. Line the taco shells up on a sheet pan or in a 9×13 inch baking dish. Transfer to the oven and bake 5 minutes. Evenly divide the sweet potatoes among each taco shell and top with cheese. Bake 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '5. Mix the cilantro and jalapeño in a small bowl. Serve the tacos topped with crema, avocado, and the spicy cilantro. Enjoy!']

title: Roasted Garlic Potato Cheddar Pierogi with Rosemary Butter
ingredients: ['all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt', 'melted salted butter', 'plain full fat greek yogurt', 'large egg', 'leftover roasted garlic mashed potatoes', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'thick cut slices bacon chopped', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'shredded cheddar cheese and yogurt, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'all-purpose flour': '2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'melted salted butter': '2', 'plain full fat greek yogurt': '1', 'large egg': '1', 'leftover roasted garlic mashed potatoes': '2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1', 'thick cut slices bacon chopped': '6', 'salted butter': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '1-2', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '1', 'shredded cheddar cheese and yogurt, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dough. In a medium bowl, combine the flour, salt, butter, yogurt, and egg, and mix until combined. Knead the dough for 2-3 minutes. Cover and let sit 20 minutes.', '2. In a bowl, mix the potatoes with the cheddar cheese.', '3. Roll the dough out onto a floured surface to 1/8 inch thickness. Using a biscuit cutter, cut out 3-inch circles.\xa0Spoon 2 teaspoons of the mashed potatoes into the center of each round. Brush the edges with water and fold half of the dough over the filling to enclose it. Press down the edges to seal. At this point, the\xa0pierogi can be flash-frozen on a baking sheet for 30 minutes, then transferred to a freezer bag and frozen for up to 3 months.', '4. When ready to cook, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pierogi in batches for 2-3 minutes, or until they float, then drain.', '5. To make the butter sauce, cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain. Wipe the skillet clean, then set back over medium-high heat add the butter and and cook 2-3 minutes, until the butter is browned.\xa0Stir in the garlic and rosemary. Remove from the heat.', '6. Drop the pierogi into the sauce, gently tossing to combine. Spoon the pierogi and sauce onto plates. Top with cheddar and bacon. EAT!']

title: Creamy White Chicken Chili
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'medium yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired and chopped', 'ground cumin', 'smoked paprika', 'chili powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'boneless, skinless, chicken breasts or thighs', 'low-sodium chicken broth', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'white beans, drained', 'salsa verde', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'avocado, cheddar cheese, and yogurt, for serving', 'lime zest and juice, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped': '2', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired and chopped': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chili powder': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless, skinless, chicken breasts or thighs': '1', 'low-sodium chicken broth': '4-6', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '4', 'white beans, drained': '1', 'salsa verde': '1/2', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'avocado, cheddar cheese, and yogurt, for serving': 'seasoning', 'lime zest and juice, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic, poblano peppers, cumin, paprika, chili powder, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook 5-10 minutes, until very fragrant. Add the chicken, then stir in 4 cups broth. Season with more salt and pepper. Partially cover and simmer over medium-low heat for 20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.', '2. Melt the cream cheese in the microwave for 10-15 seconds.', '3. Pull the chicken out and shred using 2 forks. Stir in the cream cheese until smooth, then stir in the shredded chicken, white beans, salsa verde, and cheddar cheese. Cook 5-10 minutes, until the cheese is melted. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro. If needed, thin with additional broth.', '4. Ladle the chili into bowls. Top, as desired, with yogurt/sour cream, cheese, avocado, cilantro, and green onions. Zest lime over each bowl. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Creamy White Wine Mushroom Stuffed Shells
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced', 'dried thyme', 'garlic, chopped', 'dried basil', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'milk', 'dry white wine or chicken broth', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'jumbo pasta shells', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'shredded provolone', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '1', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced': '3', 'dried thyme': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'dried basil': '2', 'dried oregano': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'milk': '2', 'dry white wine or chicken broth': '2', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '3/4', 'jumbo pasta shells': '1', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '2', 'shredded provolone': '2', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 350° F. Grease a 9×13 inch pan.', '2. Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a medium pot. Add the mushrooms. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden.\xa0Add the thyme, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook 4-5 minutes, until fragrant. Remove the mushrooms from the skillet.', '3. To the skillet, add the reaming 6 tablespoons butter, the garlic, basil, oregano, and cook 30 seconds or until fragrant. Whisk in the flour and cook for about 1 minute. Add the wine, then the milk. Bring to a boil and stir for 1 minute. Remove from heat and stir in 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese and 1/2 cup of parmesan cheese. Stir until the cheese is fully melted and the sauce is smooth. Set the cheese sauce aside.', '4. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat and boil the pasta until al dente according to package directions.', '5. In a bowl combine the ricotta, provolone, and spinach.', '6. Spread 1/3 of the cheese sauce in the bottom of the prepared baking dish. Working with one pasta shell at a time, spoon 1 tablespoon of the ricotta mix into each shell, placing the filled shell into the baking dish as you go. Sprinkle over 1/2 cup mozzarella, pour the remaining cheese sauce over top. Top with a 1/4 cup of parmesan and then the mushrooms. Cover and bake 25 minutes or until the top has bubbled up. Remove the foil and bake another 15-20 minutes. Serve with fresh thyme.']

title: Baked French Onion Meatballs
ingredients: ['ground chicken', 'soft whole grain bread', 'egg, beaten', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'garlic, chopped', 'cremini or wild mushrooms, sliced', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'whole milk, cream, or canned coconut milk', 'french bread', 'shredded gruyere cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken': '1 1/4', 'soft whole grain bread': '1', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '6', 'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced': '3-4', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '3/4', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'cremini or wild mushrooms, sliced': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '2 1/2', 'whole milk, cream, or canned coconut milk': '1/4', 'french bread': '6', 'shredded gruyere cheese': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Grease a 9×13 inch baking dish with olive oil.', '2. Take the bread and run it under water until dampened but not soaked. Gently squeeze the excess water out of the bread and then crumble the dampened bread into pieces.', '3. In a bowl, combine the chicken, bread crumbles, egg, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Coat your hands with olive oil, then roll the meat into balls about the size of 2 tablespoons, and place them into the prepared baking dish. Bake for 15 minutes or until the meatballs are crisp on the outside, but not yet cooked through on the inside.', "4. Meanwhile, melt together the butter and onions in a large oven safe skillet over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring occasionally until softened, about 10 minutes. At this point, you'll want to slowly add 3/4 cup of the wine, 1/4 cup at a time, until the wine cooks into the onions. Continue to cook another 10-15 minutes until you've used all of the 3/4 cup of wine and the onions are deeply caramelized.", '5. Add the garlic, mushrooms, thyme, and sage. Season with salt and pepper, cook another 3-4 minutes. Add the the broth and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Increase the heat to high and bring to a low boil. Add the meatballs and simmer 10 minutes, until cooked through. Stir in the cream.', '6. Arrange the bread on a baking sheet and toast for 10 minutes, until very dry. Switch the oven to broil. Place the bread on/around the meatballs. Top evenly with cheese. Broil until bubbly and golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Top with fresh thyme. Eat!']

title: Homestyle Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'shallots, sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'celery, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'bay leaf', 'dry sherry', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'egg noodles', 'shaved parmesan cheese', 'chopped parsley']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'shallots, sliced': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'celery, chopped': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '6', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '1', 'bay leaf': '1', 'dry sherry': '1/3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '8', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '1', 'egg noodles': '2-3', 'shaved parmesan cheese': '1/3', 'chopped parsley': '1/4'}

title: One Pot French Onion Pasta with Crispy Prosciutto

title: Brown Butter Pumpkin Alla Vodka Tortellini
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'fresh sage leaves', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'shallot chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'dried oregano', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'tomato paste', 'vodka', 'pumpkin puree', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk', 'cheese tortellini', 'grated parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '3', 'fresh sage leaves': '8', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'shallot chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'dried oregano': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1-2', 'tomato paste': '2', 'vodka': '1/4', 'pumpkin puree': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk': '1/2', 'cheese tortellini': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, melt together 2 tablespoons butter and the sage. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the butter is browning and the sage is crisp, 4 minutes. Remove the sage leaves from the butter and set aside.', '2. To the skillet, add the olive oil, shallot, garlic, and oregano. Cook until the shallots begin to caramelize, about 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the tomato paste, pumpkin, and red pepper flakes, cook 4-5 minutes, until thickened. Stir in the vodka, cook another 2 minutes. Stir in the cream, 1 tablespoon butter, and the parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Keep warm over low heat.', '3. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the tortellini and cook according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, remove 1 cup of the pasta cooking water. Drain.', '4. Add the tortellini to the vodka sauce, tossing to coat. If needed, thin the sauce with pasta cooking water.', '5. Divide the tortellini among plates and top with crispy sage and parmesan. Enjoy!']

title: Cider Braised Short Ribs with Caramelized Onions
ingredients: ['bone in beef short ribs', 'all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'apple cider', 'chicken broth or dry white wine', 'carrots, chopped', 'garlic, smashed', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'apple, quartered', 'bay leaves']
ingredients with measurement: {'bone in beef short ribs': '5', 'all-purpose flour': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '1', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '4', 'apple cider': '2', 'chicken broth or dry white wine': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '6', 'garlic, smashed': '6', 'chopped fresh thyme': '2', 'apple, quartered': '1', 'bay leaves': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 325° F.', '2. Season the short ribs with salt and pepper, then rub with flour to coat. Heat a large oven-safe Dutch Oven over high heat, sear the ribs on both sides. Remove the ribs to a plate, wipe the pot clean of grease.', '3. Add the butter and onions and cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add a 1/2 cup apple cider, season with salt and pepper, and continue cooking another 5-8 minutes, until the cider has evaporated and the onions are lightly golden. Add the thyme, then add the short ribs back to the pot. Add the remaining 1 1/2 cups cider, broth or wine, carrots, garlic, and bay leaves. Arrange the apples around the meat. Cover and roast in the oven for 2 1/2 to 3 hours or until the short ribs are tender and falling off the bone.', '3. Remove the bay leaves. Serve the ribs over a bed of mashed potatoes. Drizzle with the pan sauce and onions. Enjoy!']

title: Easy Ginger Chicken and Spinach Ramen
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'red curry paste', 'dried porcini mushrooms', 'fresh grated ginger', 'Chinese 5 spice', 'black pepper', 'honey', 'canned coconut milk', 'ramen noodles', 'baby spinach', 'acorn squash – cubed, or 3 cups cubed butternut squash', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'spicy curry powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'soft or hard boiled eggs, for serving', 'carrots, green onions, chilies, and cilantro, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts': '3/4', 'low sodium chicken broth': '4', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/3', 'red curry paste': '1/4', 'dried porcini mushrooms': '1', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'Chinese 5 spice': '1', 'black pepper': '1', 'honey': '2', 'canned coconut milk': '3/4', 'ramen noodles': '4', 'baby spinach': '3', 'acorn squash – cubed, or 3 cups cubed butternut squash': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'spicy curry powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'soft or hard boiled eggs, for serving': 'seasoning', 'carrots, green onions, chilies, and cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of the crockpot, combine the chicken, chicken broth, 4 cups water, soy sauce, curry paste, dried mushrooms, ginger, Chinese 5 spice, pepper, and honey, stir well. Cover and cook on low for 4-6 hours or on high for 2-4 hours.', '2. Before serving, preheat the oven to 425° F. On a baking sheet, toss together the squash, olive oil, curry powder, salt, and pepper. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until tender.', '3. Crank the crockpot up to high. Shred the chicken. Stir in the coconut milk, and spinach. Then submerge the noodles in the broth. Let sit 8-10 minutes or until the noodles are soft.', '4. Ladle the soup into bowls and top with roasted squash and other desired toppings. Enjoy!']

title: Simple Baked Cheesy Italian Chicken Meatballs
ingredients: ['ground spicy Italian chicken sausage', 'ground chicken', 'soft whole grain bread', 'eggs', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'small shallots, grated', 'garlic, grated', 'chopped pepperoncinis', 'marinara sauce', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone', 'fresh oregano']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground spicy Italian chicken sausage': '1', 'ground chicken': '1', 'soft whole grain bread': '2', 'eggs': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/3', 'small shallots, grated': '2', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'chopped pepperoncinis': '1-2', 'marinara sauce': '1', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1', 'shredded provolone': '1', 'fresh oregano': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Grease a 9×13 inch baking dish with olive oil.', '2. Take the bread and run it under water until dampened but not soaked. Gently squeeze the excess water out of the bread and then crumble the dampened bread into pieces.', '3. In a bowl, combine the sausage, chicken, bread crumble, eggs, parmesan, shallots, garlic, pepperoncinis, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Coat your hands with olive oil, then roll the meat into 2 tablespoon size balls, and place them into the prepared baking dish. Bake for 15 minutes or until the meatballs are crisp on the outside, but not yet cooked through on the inside.', '4. Remove from the oven and pour the marinara over top the meatballs. Cover the pan with foil and bake for 15 minutes longer, or until the meatballs are cooked through. Remove the foil and add the cheeses and oregano. Bake until the cheese is melted and golden, about 10 minutes. Serve topped with fresh oregano and your favorite pasta!']

title: Rosemary Roasted Butternut Squash Pizza
ingredients: ['pizza dough', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'medium butternut squash, seeded, skin removed, and sliced', 'Rosemary Herb Seasoning Mix', 'honey', 'red pepper flakes', 'basil pesto', 'crispy bacon, crumbled', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'pizza dough': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'medium butternut squash, seeded, skin removed, and sliced': '½', 'Rosemary Herb Seasoning Mix': '1 1/2', 'honey': '1', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'crispy bacon, crumbled': '3', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella': '1', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Position the oven rack in the upper 1/3 portion of your oven. Preheat the oven to 425° F. If you have a baking stone, start preheating it.', '2. Place the pizza dough on a lightly oiled quarter sheet pan. Gently press the dough until it covers most of the sheet pan. Cover and let sit while you prep the pizza.', '3. On another baking sheet, toss together the olive oil, butternut squash, Rosemary Herb Seasoning Mix, honey, and a pinch of crushed red pepper flakes (if desired). Roast for 15-20 minutes, until the squash is just tender, then remove from oven. Increase the heat to 500° F.', '4. To assemble. Take the sheet pan with the dough and spread on the pesto. Next, layer on the butternut squash and bacon. Then top with the cheeses.', '5. Slide into the preheated oven and bake for 10 minutes, rotate the pizza, and bake another 3-5 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. Top with basil. Enjoy!']

title: Brie and Cheddar Apple Beer Soup
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'small yellow onion, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'all-purpose flour', 'whole milk', 'low sodium veggie or chicken broth', 'pumpkin beer', 'apple cider', 'Honeycrisp apple, chopped', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'creamy brie, cubed', 'cayenne, more or less to taste', 'kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'small yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'whole milk': '2', 'low sodium veggie or chicken broth': '2', 'pumpkin beer': '1', 'apple cider': '1/2', 'Honeycrisp apple, chopped': '1', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '2-3', 'creamy brie, cubed': '4', 'cayenne, more or less to taste': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Melt together the butter and olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion, thyme, and sage, cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Whisk in the flour and cook until golden, about 1 minute, gradually whisk in the milk until smooth. Add the broth, beer, cider, apple, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer, reduce the heat to medium and cook, uncovered, until the apple is tender, about 10 minutes.', '2. Remove the soup from the stove. Puree in a blender or use an immersion blender.', '3. Return the soup to the stove and set over low heat. Stir in the cheddar cheese and brie until melted and creamy. Add the cayenne.', '4. Ladle the soup into bowls and top with a little extra cheddar and fresh thyme. Enjoy…preferably with soft pretzels on the side.']

title: Slow Cooker Mustard Herb Chicken and Creamy Orzo
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'dijon mustard', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped sage', 'garlic, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'shallots, quartered', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'apple cider or chicken broth', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'salted butter', 'dry orzo pasta', 'chopped broccoli', 'heavy cream or canned full fat coconut milk', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'dijon mustard': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh chopped sage': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shallots, quartered': '2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'apple cider or chicken broth': '1', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '2', 'chopped broccoli': '1 1/2', 'heavy cream or canned full fat coconut milk': '1/3', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your slow cooker,\xa0rub the chicken with the olive oil, mustard thyme, sage, garlic, salt, and pepper. Pour over the wine, cider and lemon juice. Add the shallots. Cover and cook on low for 3- 4 hours or on high for 1-2 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the chicken from the slow cooker place it on a baking sheet.', '3. Crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Stir in the orzo, broccoli, and 1 cup water. Cover and cook 20-30 minutes, or until the orzo is al dente. If the orzo needs more liquid, add additional water. Stir in the cream and parmesan.', '4. Place the butter on the chicken, then broil 1-3 minutes, until crisp. Serve the chicken over the orzo. Enjoy!']

title: Sesame Ginger Dumplings in Chili Oil
ingredients: ['small acorn squash, sliced, or 4 cups cubed butternut squash', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'ground ginger', 'ground cinnamon', 'cayenne pepper', 'honey', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'round dumpling or wonton wrappers', 'toasted sesame seeds, for serving', 'ground chicken or pork', 'ground ginger', 'garlic, grated', 'chopped green onions', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'black pepper', 'sesame oil', 'garlic, smashed', 'shallot, quartered', 'bay leaf', 'crushed red pepper flakes, to taste']
ingredients with measurement: {'small acorn squash, sliced, or 4 cups cubed butternut squash': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground ginger': '1', 'ground cinnamon': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'honey': '2', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '1/3', 'round dumpling or wonton wrappers': '24-26', 'toasted sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning', 'ground chicken or pork': '1', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'chopped green onions': '4', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'sesame oil': '3/4', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'shallot, quartered': '1', 'bay leaf': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes, to taste': '1-3'}
instructions: ['1. To make the Squash Dumplings: Preheat the oven to 425° F. On a baking sheet, toss together the squash, olive oil, ginger, cinnamon, cayenne, and honey. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until tender.', '2. Peel the squash skin away from the acorn squash and add the squash to a bowl. Add the soy sauce to the squash and mash together.', '3. To make the Chicken Dumplings: combine all ingredients in a bowl.', '4. To assemble the Dumplings: spoon 2 teaspoons of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edges of the wrapper.\xa0Fold the edges of the wrapper up and around the filling and pinch to seal.\xa0Repeat with the remaining filling.', '5. To make the chili oil. In a medium skillet, combine the sesame oil, garlic, shallot, and bay leaf. Cook over medium heat until the garlic turns golden. Remove from the heat and stir in the chili flakes. Season with salt.', '6. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the dumplings until they float, 3-4 minutes. Toss the warm dumplings in the chili oil. title: 4 Cheese Roasted Garlic Alfredo Stuffed Spaghetti Squash
ingredients: ['whole milk or heavy cream', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry', 'chopped fresh sage', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'shredded mozzarella or creamy gouda', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'medium spaghetti squash, halved and seeds removed', 'grated parmesan', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'garlic', 'olive oil', 'salted butter, at room temperature']
ingredients with measurement: {'whole milk or heavy cream': '1 1/4', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry': '6', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'shredded mozzarella or creamy gouda': '1/2', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1', 'medium spaghetti squash, halved and seeds removed': '2', 'grated parmesan': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic': '1', 'olive oil': 'seasoning', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a medium bowl, mix together the milk, spinach, sage, thyme, fontina, and mozzarella. Season with red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.', '3. Place the squash in a baking dish and season the cut sides with salt and pepper. Sprinkle 1/2 of the provolone cheese into the bottom of each squash, then evenly divide the milk/cheese mix among the squash cavities. Top with the remaining provolone and parmesan. Cover the squash with foil.', '4. Slice off the top portion of the garlic head to expose some of the cloves. Place the garlic on a piece of foil. Drizzle with olive oil and wrap it up.', '5. Bake the squash and garlic for 30 minutes. Remove the foil from both and continue baking the squash and garlic another 15-20 minutes or until the squash is tender and the cheese is golden brown on top.', '6. Let the garlic cool, then squeeze the cloves out into a bowl. Add the butter and 1 tablespoon sage. Mash the cloves into the butter with a fork. Spread the butter over the squash, then use a fork to scrape the squash into strands, mixing the cheese with the squash. Enjoy!']

title: Butternut Squash and Cheese Stuffed Pasta Shells
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'cubed butternut squash', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'prosciutto', 'jumbo shells', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'shredded fontina or provolone cheese', 'Mezzetta Artisan Ingredients Marinara Sauce', 'mozzarella, torn', 'fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'cubed butternut squash': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1', 'prosciutto': '3', 'jumbo shells': '1', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded fontina or provolone cheese': '2', 'Mezzetta Artisan Ingredients Marinara Sauce': '4', 'mozzarella, torn': '8', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F. On a baking sheet, toss together the olive oil, butternut squash, thyme, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Lay the prosciutto over the squash. Bake for 15-25 minutes, until the prosciutto is crispy. Remove the prosciutto and set aside. If squash needs more time, return to the oven for another 10 minutes, or until the squash is tender.', '2. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pasta until al dente according to package directions. Drain.', '3. In a medium bowl, combine the ricotta, fontina, and roasted butternut squash. Season with salt and pepper.', '4. To assemble, spoon 2-3 cups marinara sauce into the bottom of a 9×13 inch baking dish. Stuff each shell with 1 tablespoon of the cheese and place into the baking dish with sauce. Top with the remaining marinara sauce and mozzarella. Bake 20-25 minutes or until the cheese has melted and is lightly browned on top.', '5. Serve the shells topped with prosciutto and basil. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Hot Honey Mustard Chicken and Crispy Brussels Sprouts.
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'egg', 'finely crushed corn flakes', 'whole wheat flour', 'kosher sale', 'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling', 'Brussels sprouts, halved', 'shallots, quartered', 'fresh thyme', 'salted butter, melted', 'honey', 'dijon mustard', 'lemon juice', 'smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'egg': '1', 'finely crushed corn flakes': '2', 'whole wheat flour': '2', 'kosher sale': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling': '2', 'Brussels sprouts, halved': '1', 'shallots, quartered': '2', 'fresh thyme': '2', 'salted butter, melted': '4', 'honey': '1/4', 'dijon mustard': '1/4', 'lemon juice': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1-2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease with oil.', '2. Add the chicken and egg to a bowl. Toss to combine. Add the cornflakes, flour, and a pinch of salt to another bowl. Dredge the chicken in batches through the crumbs, tossing to coat. Place the chicken on one side of the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil.', '3. Add the Brussels sprouts and shallots to the other side of the pan and toss with 2 tablespoons oil, salt, and pepper. Bake for 20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Reduce the oven temp to 400° F.', '4. Meanwhile, make the sauce. Combine all ingredients in a bowl until smooth and creamy. If the sauce stiffens, warm in the microwave or on the stove.', '5. Spoon the sauce over the chicken, coating each piece. Toss the sprouts with 1 tablespoon oil. Return everything to the oven for 3-5 minutes.', 'Roast again in hot oven until sauce starts to bubble, 1-2 minutes.', 'Plate dish add seasoning with a pinch of\xa0salt\xa0(to taste).']

title: Sheet Pan Sticky Sweet and Sour Chicken
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'egg, beaten', 'all-purpose flour, or gluten-free all-purpose flour', 'ground ginger', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'broccoli florets', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'shallots, quartered', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'apple juice', 'rice vinegar', 'ketchup', 'creamy peanut butter', 'jalapeño, sliced, and seeded if desired', 'garlic, grated', 'rice and cilantro, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes': '1 1/2', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'all-purpose flour, or gluten-free all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'ground ginger': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1', 'broccoli florets': '1', 'bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'shallots, quartered': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil': '4', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/3', 'apple juice': '1/2', 'rice vinegar': '1/4.', 'ketchup': '1', 'creamy peanut butter': '1', 'jalapeño, sliced, and seeded if desired': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'rice and cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 475° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease with oil.', '2. Add the chicken, egg, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Toss to combine. Add the flour and ginger to another bowl. Dredge the chicken in batches through the flour, tossing to coat. Place the chicken on one side of the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with 2 tablespoons oil. Add the broccoli, peppers, and shallots to the other side of the pan and toss with 2 tablespoons oil. Bake 15 minutes.', '3. Reduce the oven temp to 400° F.', '4. Meanwhile, combine the sweet Thai chili sauce, soy sauce, apple juice, rice vinegar, ketchup, peanut butter, jalapeño, and garlic in a medium saucepan. Pour half the sauce over the chicken, tossing to combine. Toss the vegetables. Return everything to the oven for 3 minutes, until the sauce coats the chicken. title: Easy Baked Cheesy Cauliflower Pizzas

title: Spicy Lemon Butter Shrimp Scampi with Herbed Corn

title: Cheesy Buffalo Chicken Strombolis
ingredients: ['pizza dough', 'cooked shredded chicken', 'buffalo sauce', 'fresh cilantro or parsley, chopped', 'chopped fresh chives', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped', 'ranch dressing', 'crumbled blue cheese', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese', 'sesame seeds', 'Italian seasoning', 'egg, beaten']
ingredients with measurement: {'pizza dough': '1', 'cooked shredded chicken': '1', 'buffalo sauce': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro or parsley, chopped': '1/2', 'chopped fresh chives': '2', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped': '1', 'ranch dressing': '1/2', 'crumbled blue cheese': '1/2', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella': '1', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese': '1/2', 'sesame seeds': '1', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'egg, beaten': '1'}

Place seam side down on the prepared baking sheet.', '4. In a bowl, combine the parmesan, sesame seeds, and Italian seasoning. title: 25 Minute Black Pepper Jalapeño Basil Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced', 'cornstarch', 'ground turmeric', 'ground ginger', 'black pepper', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'honey', 'rice vinegar', 'fish sauce', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'jalapeños, seeded, if desired, and sliced', 'shallot, sliced', 'fresh Thai or regular basil chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced': '1 1/2', 'cornstarch': '1', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'ground ginger': '1', 'black pepper': '1-2', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/3', 'honey': '1/4', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'fish sauce': '1', 'bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'jalapeños, seeded, if desired, and sliced': '1-2', 'shallot, sliced': '1', 'fresh Thai or regular basil chopped': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a medium bowl, toss together the chicken, cornstarch, turmeric, ginger, and black pepper.', '2. In a glass jar, combine the honey, soy sauce, rice vinegar, fish sauce (if using) and 1/4 cup water.', '3. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the bell peppers, jalapeños, and shallots, cook 2-3 minutes, until the peppers are charring. Stir in the chicken, tossing to combine with the peppers, cook 2 minutes.', '4. Pour in the honey/soy sauce mix. Bring the sauce to a boil over medium-high heat and cook until the sauce coats the chicken, about 8-10 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the basil.', '5. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of coconut lemongrass rice (recipe in notes). Top with plenty of fresh basil.']

title: Peach Burrata Crostini with Burst Cherry Tomato Vinaigrette
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'small cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh thyme', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'champagne or white balsamic vinegar', 'sourdough or french baguette, sliced', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'peaches, sliced', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'small cherry tomatoes': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'fresh thyme': '2', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'champagne or white balsamic vinegar': '2', 'sourdough or french baguette, sliced': '1', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'peaches, sliced': '2', 'fresh basil': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the vinaigrette. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the olive oil, tomatoes, garlic, thyme, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook until the tomatoes just begin to burst about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and let cool slightly, then stir in the vinegar.', '2. Preheat your grill to high heat or preheat your oven to 400° F.', '3. Place the bread on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil on both sides of each slice, season with salt. Place the bread on the grill and grill both sides for about 2-3 minutes per side or until lightly toasted. Remove from the grill.', "4. Break the burrata over the bread. Top with a layer of peaches, then spoon over the tomato vinaigrette. Top with fresh basil and enjoy! We love these warm, but they're great at room temp too."]

title: BBQ Chicken Ranch Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken, cut into bite size chunks', 'BBQ sauce', 'short cut pasta', 'cubed cheddar cheese', 'shredded romaine lettuce', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'grilled or steamed corn', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired, and chopped', 'fresh cilantro and or basil, chopped', 'avocado, diced', 'plain greek yogurt or sour cream', 'olive oil mayo', 'buttermilk', 'fresh chopped chives', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken, cut into bite size chunks': '1', 'BBQ sauce': '1/2', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'cubed cheddar cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded romaine lettuce': '3', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '1', 'grilled or steamed corn': '3', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired, and chopped': '1', 'fresh cilantro and or basil, chopped': '1/2', 'avocado, diced': '1', 'plain greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/2', 'olive oil mayo': '1/4', 'buttermilk': '1/4-1/2', 'fresh chopped chives': '2', 'dried parsley': '1', 'dried dill': '1', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning'}

title: Spicy Garlic Lemon Butter Shrimp with Parmesan Corn Polenta
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'corn – kernels removed from the cob', 'milk', 'dry polenta', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'raw shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'cajun seasoning', 'garlic chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '4', 'corn – kernels removed from the cob': '3', 'milk': '2', 'dry polenta': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'raw shrimp, peeled and deveined': '1 1/2', 'cajun seasoning': '1', 'garlic chopped': '3', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'juice from 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the polenta. In a medium pot, melt together the butter and corn. Cook 5-8 minutes, until the butter browns around the corn. Add 2 cups water and the milk. Bring to a low boil, then whisk in the polenta, stirring until the polenta is soft and thick, about 3-5 minutes. Stir in the parmesan and season with salt and pepper. Turn the heat off, cover the pot, and let the polenta sit 5 minutes.', '2. Meanwhile, make the shrimp. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the butter, shrimp, cajun seasonings, and a big pinch of pepper. Cook on both sides until seared, about 2-3 minutes per side.\xa0Stir in the garlic and thyme and continue to cook until the garlic is fragrant. Remove from the heat, stir in the lemon juice and basil.', '3. Spoon the polenta into bowls, then spoon the shrimp and sauce over the polenta. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Spicy Oregano Meatballs with Grilled Vegetables and Tzatziki
ingredients: ['ground chicken, pork, or a mix', 'shallot, chopped', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'smoked paprika', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'zucchini or yellow squash, sliced into rounds', 'bell peppers, quartered', 'tzatziki', 'crumbled feta', 'naan, for serving', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'red wine vinegar', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'fresh thyme, chopped', 'garlic, grated']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken, pork, or a mix': '1 1/2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'fresh oregano, chopped': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'zucchini or yellow squash, sliced into rounds': '2', 'bell peppers, quartered': '2', 'tzatziki': '1', 'crumbled feta': '1/2', 'naan, for serving': 'seasoning', 'honey': '2', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'red wine vinegar': '2', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh thyme, chopped': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Add the meat, shallot, oregano, paprika, chili flakes, and a pinch of salt, and pepper to a bowl. Mix until combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil and roll the meat into rounded tablespoon-size balls (will make 16-18 meatballs). Set aside.', '2. In a bowl, toss the zucchini and peppers with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper. Preheat the grill or grill pan to high.', '3. Meanwhile, make the vinaigrette. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and whisk until smooth. Taste and adjust the salt and pepper.', '5. Grill the peppers and zucchini until softened, 3-4 minutes per side. Remove from the grill to a serving plate and toss with half the vinaigrette.', '6. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add 2 tablespoons of oil. Add the meatballs and sear until crisp and cooked through, about 8-10 minutes, turning them 2-3 times. Transfer to a plate.', '7. Serve the meatballs warm, tossed with the vegetables. Add a large dollop of tzatziki to each plate, then crumble the feta over top. Enjoy with naan and/or french fries.']

title: One Pot Lemon Butter Ricotta and Zucchini Pasta
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'small shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'lemon zest', 'red pepper flakes', 'short cut pasta', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, grated', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'shredded gouda or fontina cheese', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '3', 'small shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'lemon zest': '2', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, grated': '2', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1', 'shredded gouda or fontina cheese': '1/2', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a large pot set over medium heat, melt together the butter, shallot, garlic, thyme, lemon zest and a big pinch of red pepper flakes. Cook until the butter is browning and the garlic is fragrant, about 3 minutes. Stir in the pasta and toss to coat in the lemony butter. Stir in the zucchini and broth. Season with salt and pepper.', '2. Bring to a boil over high heat. Simmer 5-8 minutes until the pasta is al dente, stirring often.', '3. Stir in the ricotta, fontina, and basil. Cook another few minutes until very creamy and the basil is wilted. It should be creamy, but with just a touch of liquid.', '4. Divide the pasta among bowls and top with fresh thyme, basil, and chili flakes. Enjoy immediately!']

title: Crispy Chipotle BBQ Chicken Tacos with Creamy Charred Corn Salsa
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless skinless chicken tenders or cubed thighs', 'smoked paprika', 'chipotle chili powder', 'garlic powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'kosher salt', 'ketchup', 'honey', 'dijon mustard', 'your favorite beer, or use chicken broth', 'corn tortillas', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'avocados, halved', 'juice from 2 limes', 'grilled or roasted corn', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired, and chopped', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'chopped fresh chives']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken tenders or cubed thighs': '1 1/2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4-1/2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'kosher salt': '1 1/2', 'ketchup': '1', 'honey': '1/3', 'dijon mustard': '2', 'your favorite beer, or use chicken broth': '3/4', 'corn tortillas': '8-12', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '1', 'avocados, halved': '2', 'juice from 2 limes': 'seasoning', 'grilled or roasted corn': '2', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired, and chopped': '1', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'chopped fresh chives': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In a large pot, combine the olive oil, chicken, chili powder, garlic powder, paprika, cayenne, thyme, and salt. Set over medium-high heat and cook until the spices are fragrant, about 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, then add the ketchup, honey, dijon, and beer. Stir to combine and bring the sauce to a simmer.', '2. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes. If the sauce gets too thick, add additional beer to thin. Once the chicken is cooked, shred with two forks. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '3. Meanwhile, make the crema. Combine the avocado and lime juice in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt.', '4. To make the salsa. In a bowl, combine the corn, jalapeño, cilantro, chives, and 1-2 spoonfuls of the avocado crema. Season with salt.', '5. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds in the microwave, until pliable. On a baking sheet, rub the tortillas with olive oil. Lay each flat and then layer evenly with cheese and bbq chicken. Fold the other half of the tortilla over the filling, gently pushing to adhere (see above photo). Transfer to the oven and bake for 5-8 minutes, then flip and cook another 5 minutes more, or until the cheese has melted and the tortillas are crisp.', '6. Serve the tacos with a dollop of the avocado crema, the corn salsa, lime, and fresh cilantro. Enjoy!']

title: Creamy Corn, Zucchini, and Bacon Chowder
ingredients: ['thick cut bacon, chopped', 'salted butter', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'zucchini or yellow squash, chopped', 'yellow corn kernels', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh thyme', 'smoked paprika', 'red pepper flakes, to your taste', 'russet potatoes, peeled and chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'whole milk or heavy cream', 'honey', 'shredded gouda cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'chopped chives']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick cut bacon, chopped': '5', 'salted butter': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'zucchini or yellow squash, chopped': '1-2', 'yellow corn kernels': '5', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'fresh thyme': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1/2', 'red pepper flakes, to your taste': 'seasoning', 'russet potatoes, peeled and chopped': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '4', 'whole milk or heavy cream': '1', 'honey': '1', 'shredded gouda cheese': '1', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'chopped chives': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In a large pot over medium heat, cook the bacon until crispy. Remove the bacon and reserve for topping. If there is an excess amount of bacon grease, remove all but 1 tablespoon of grease.', '2. To the pot, add the butter, onion, and zucchini and cook another 5 minutes or until fragrant. Add the corn, garlic, thyme, paprika, and a big pinch of red pepper flakes. Cook another 2 minutes. Add the potatoes and broth. Cover, and bring the soup to a boil, simmer 10-15 minutes, until the potato is soft.', '3. Transfer 1/2 of the chowder to a blender and blend until mostly smooth. Return to the pot. Stir in the cream, honey, and both cheeses, and cook 5 minutes or until the cheese has melted and the chowder thickens slightly. Stir in the chives and remove from the heat.', '4. Ladle the chowder into bowls and top with bacon, additional cheese, and any fresh herbs you love most. I use basil, thyme and oregano. Enjoy!']

title: Arugula Tomato Cheese Pizza
ingredients: ['cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, smashed', 'fresh thyme', 'fresh oregano', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought', 'basil pesto', 'shredded Italian cheese', 'prosciutto', 'baby arugula', 'grated parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'cherry tomatoes': '3', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'fresh thyme': '2', 'fresh oregano': '2', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'basil pesto': '1/4', 'shredded Italian cheese': '2', 'prosciutto': '2-3', 'baby arugula': '3', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet set over medium heat, toss together the olive oil, tomatoes, garlic, thyme, oregano, chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook until the tomatoes begin to pop, about 4-5 minutes. Remove from the heat and smash the tomatoes down with a fork.', '2. Position the oven rack in the upper 1/3 portion of your oven. Preheat the oven to 500° F. for at least 30 minutes before baking, preferably 1-2 hours ahead. If you have a baking stone, start preheating it.', '3. On a lightly floured surface, push/roll the pizza dough out until it is pretty thin (about a\xa012-14 inch circle). Place the pizza dough on a lightly oiled sheet pan. Spread the tomatoes and pesto over the dough. Sprinkle on the shredded cheese and add the prosciutto.', '4. Slide into the preheated oven and bake for 10 minutes, rotate the pizza, and bake another 3-5 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. Meanwhile, toss together the arugula, olive oil, parmesan, salt, and pepper. Top the pizza with arugula and basil.']

title: 30 Minute Pineapple Chicken with Coconut Rice
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite size pieces', 'low-sodium soy sauce', 'pineapple juice', 'brown sugar', 'ketchup', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'grated ginger', 'red pepper flakes', 'sesame oil, or extra virgin olive oil', 'chopped cilantro', 'fresh pineapple chunks', 'small shallot, finely chopped', 'jalapeño, seeded (if desired) and chopped', 'juice of 1 lime', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'avocado, diced']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite size pieces': '1 1/2', 'low-sodium soy sauce': '1/3', 'pineapple juice': '1/3', 'brown sugar': '2', 'ketchup': '2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'grated ginger': '1', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'sesame oil, or extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chopped cilantro': '1/4', 'fresh pineapple chunks': '2', 'small shallot, finely chopped': '1/2', 'jalapeño, seeded (if desired) and chopped': '1', 'juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'avocado, diced': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a glass jar, whisk together the soy sauce, pineapple juice, brown sugar, ketchup, shallots, garlic, ginger, and a pinch of chili flakes. Pour 1/3 of the sauce over the chicken and let sit 15 minutes or up to overnight in the fridge.', '2. Meanwhile, make the salsa: combine all ingredients in bowl.', '3. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, cook 5 minutes until cooked through on both sides. Reduce the heat to medium and pour in the remaining soy sauce mix. Cook until the sauce glazes the chicken and begins to caramelize, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro.', '4. Serve the chicken over rice and spoon the salsa over the chicken. Sprinkle on the diced avocado and a squeeze of lime.']

title: Creamed Feta Garlic Herb Butter Salmon
ingredients: ['salmon filets, skin on or off', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'medium zucchini, sliced', 'small shallot, thinly sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'canned full-fat coconut milk or heavy cream', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'fresh basil and thyme, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'salmon filets, skin on or off': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '2', 'medium zucchini, sliced': '1', 'small shallot, thinly sliced': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'chopped fresh thyme': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'canned full-fat coconut milk or heavy cream': '1', 'crumbled feta cheese': '3/4', 'juice from 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'fresh basil and thyme, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Season the salmon with salt and pepper.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the salmon, skin side down, and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the salmon is crisp. Flip and continue cooking for another 2-3 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked to your liking. Remove from the skillet. If desired, peel away the skin and discard.', '3. To the same skillet, add the butter, zucchini, and shallots and cook until the shallot is fragrant, about 2 minutes. Add the garlic, thyme, and crushed red pepper flakes, cook another 1-2 minutes. Stir in the cream and feta. Season the sauce with salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring constantly until smooth and creamy, about 5 minutes. Stir in the lemon juice. Remove from the heat and slide the salmon back into the sauce.', '4. To serve, plate each piece of salmon, then spoon the sauce and zucchini over top. Serve topped with fresh basil.']

title: One Pot Melty Burrata Lemon Pesto Pasta
ingredients: ['pasta', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'small shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'basil pesto', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'balsamic vinegar', 'fresh basil, torn', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon']

title: 30 Minute Crispy Cheese Chicken Tinga Tacos with Pineapple Salsa
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil, plus more for rubbing', 'boneless skinless chicken tenders', 'yellow onion chopped', 'chipotle peppers in adobo', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt', 'red enchilada sauce', 'corn tortillas', 'shredded mexican cheese', 'shredded lettuce, smashed avocado, crema, or sour cream', 'ears grilled corn, kernels removed', 'chopped pineapple', 'serrano peppers, seeded, if desired, chopped', 'juice of 1 lime', 'fresh cilantro, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for rubbing': '2', 'boneless skinless chicken tenders': '1', 'yellow onion chopped': '1', 'chipotle peppers in adobo': '2-3', 'dried oregano': '1', 'kosher salt': '1', 'red enchilada sauce': '1/2', 'corn tortillas': '8-12', 'shredded mexican cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded lettuce, smashed avocado, crema, or sour cream': 'seasoning', 'ears grilled corn, kernels removed': '2', 'chopped pineapple': '1 1/2', 'serrano peppers, seeded, if desired, chopped': '1-2', 'juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/3'}

title: Pesto Cheese Zucchini Ravioli with Burst Tomatoes
ingredients: ['cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'balsamic vinegar', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'medium zucchini or summer squash', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'basil pesto', 'fresh basil and thyme, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'cherry tomatoes': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling': '1/4', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/3', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'medium zucchini or summer squash': '3-4', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '3/4', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1/2', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'fresh basil and thyme, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a baking dish, toss together the tomatoes with the garlic, olive oil, wine, balsamic vinegar, thyme, and a pinch each of crushed red pepper, salt, and pepper. Bake 10-15 minutes or until the tomatoes begin to burst.', '3. Meanwhile, make the ravioli. Using a mandolin or sharp knife, peel the zucchini into 1/4 inch ribbons and lay them flat on a kitchen towel. Sprinkle the zucchini with salt.\xa0Let sit 5-10 minutes, then blot away the excess water.', '4. in a bowl, combine the ricotta, provolone, and pesto.\xa0Grab 3-4 zucchini ribbons and layer them to make a star. Start with 1 ribbon, then add another to make an X. Now make another X with the remaining 1-2 noodles that will overlap with the current X (see above photo). Spoon 1 tablespoon of filling onto the center of the zucchini. Bring the ends of the zucchini together, laying them over the cheese. Repeat with remaining zucchini and filling.', '5. Remove the tomatoes from the oven and lay the ravioli seam side down in the sauce. Drizzle the ravioli lightly with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Bake for 15 minutes or until the ravioli is warmed through. Serve with fresh basil and thyme. Enjoy!']

Pour over the remaining dressing and toss well to combine. Serve warm or cold. The salad will develop more flavor as it sits.']

title: Picnic Style Brie and Prosciutto Sandwich.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'fig preserves', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'chopped fresh basil', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'garlic, grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'loaf ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise', 'pitted mixed olives, chopped', 'roasted bell peppers, sliced', 'assorted deli meat', 'Brie, sliced', 'baby arugula']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'balsamic vinegar': '3', 'fig preserves': '1', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh basil': '2', 'chopped fresh thyme': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'loaf ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise': '1', 'pitted mixed olives, chopped': '1/2', 'roasted bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'assorted deli meat': '9-12', 'Brie, sliced': '1', 'baby arugula': '2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the vinaigrette. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and whisk until smooth. Taste and adjust the salt and pepper.', '2. Lay the bread cut side up on a cutting board. Working with the top piece of ciabatta, pull out some of the insides to create a space for the filling. Drizzle both cut sides of bread with vinaigrette. Then, layer on the olives, bell peppers, assorted meats, and Brie. Sprinkle the arugula over the brie and drizzle generously with the vinaigrette. title: BLT Corn Fritter Stacks
ingredients: ['thick-cut bacon', 'bourbon', 'maple syrup', 'cayenne pepper', 'yellow corn', 'all purpose flour', 'baking powder', 'chopped  fresh chives.', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'milk', 'shredded gouda or cheddar cheese', 'avocado oil, for cooking', 'small head romaine lettuce, separated into leaves', 'small tomatoes, thickly sliced', 'avocado oil mayo', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped', 'juice from 1/2 a lemon']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick-cut bacon': '8', 'bourbon': '1', 'maple syrup': '1', 'cayenne pepper': 'seasoning', 'yellow corn': '1 1/2', 'all purpose flour': '3/4', 'baking powder': '1/2', 'chopped  fresh chives.': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'milk': '3/4', 'shredded gouda or cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'avocado oil, for cooking': 'seasoning', 'small head romaine lettuce, separated into leaves': '1', 'small tomatoes, thickly sliced': '2', 'avocado oil mayo': '1/2', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped': '1-2', 'juice from 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400℉. Line a baking sheet with foil or parchment.', '2. Arrange the bacon on the baking sheet. Mix the bourbon, maple syrup, and a good pinch of cayenne together. Drizzle the maple mix over the slices. Bake for 15 minutes. Use tongs to flip the bacon and bake until crispy, 5-8 minutes more.', '3. Meanwhile, make the fritters. Combine the corn, flour, baking powder, chives, and a pinch each of salt and pepper in a bowl. Stir in the milk and cheese. The batter should be the consistency of a thick pancake batter.', '4. Heat a few tablespoons oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add about 1/4 cup of batter to the skillet and then quickly smooth the batter out to a circle. Cook for 2 to 3 minutes, flip and cook another 2 minutes, or until brown and crisped all over. Remove and repeat with the remaining batter.', '5. To make the aioli, combine all ingredients in a bowl. Season with salt.', '6. To assemble, spread one side of half the fritters with aioli. Layer the lettuce, tomato, and bacon on top, then top the with remaining fritters. Serve with the aioli on the side.']

title: Taco Stuffed Avocados with Chipotle Sauce and Cilantro Lime Ranch
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'poblano pepper, chopped', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'garlic powder', 'dried oregano', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'avocados, halved and pitted', 'shredded Mexican or cotija cheese', 'tortilla chips/strips for serving', 'ranch or sour cream, for serving', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chipotle peppers in adobo', 'mango jam', 'apple cider vinegar', 'zest and juice from 1/2 an orange']
