title: Panini Style Chicken Gyro
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs', 'plain full-fat Greek yogurt', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'red wine vinegar', 'garlic cloves, chopped or grated', 'smoked paprika', 'dried oregano', 'cumin', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt', 'green bell peppers, quartered', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'mixed fresh herbs, chopped', 'shredded gouda or mozzarella', 'fresh pitas or naan', 'Tzatziki and pickled onions, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs': '1 1/2', 'plain full-fat Greek yogurt': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'juice from 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'red wine vinegar': '2', 'garlic cloves, chopped or grated': '4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'dried oregano': '1', 'cumin': '2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'green bell peppers, quartered': '2', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '1', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '2', 'mixed fresh herbs, chopped': '1/2', 'shredded gouda or mozzarella': '1 1/2', 'fresh pitas or naan': '6', 'Tzatziki and pickled onions, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. in a bowl, toss the chicken with the yogurt, 2 tablespoons olive oil, lemon juice, vinegar, garlic, paprika, oregano, cumin, and 1 teaspoon salt. Marinate 15-30 minutes or up to 12 hours in the fridge.', '2. Meanwhile, toss together the tomatoes, cucumbers, 1 tablespoon olive oil, herbs, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Toss the bell peppers with 1 tablespoon olive oil.', '3. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat.\xa0Grill the chicken until lightly charred and cooked through, about 10 to 12 minutes total. During the same time, grill the peppers until light char marks appear, about 5 minutes. Remove the chicken from the grill and let cool for 5 minutes, then thinly slice.', "4. Cut open one side of the pita, creating a small opening. Stuff the chicken, cheese, and peppers, evenly between each pita. If your pitas don't have a pocket, just make quesadilla style and fold 1 half over the other.", '5. Heat a panini press or large skillet over medium-high heat. Rub both sides of the pita with olive oil. Place one at a time, into the panini press and cook until the cheese is melted. Alternately, you can cook the sandwiches in a skillet as you would a grilled cheese.', '6. Serve each pita with Tzatziki, tomatoes, and cucumber slices on top. Eat!']

title: Pesto Chicken, Corn, and Avocado Bacon Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken, cut into bite size chunks', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'tahini or avocado oil mayo', 'dijon mustard', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'grated parmesan', 'short cut pasta', 'cubed cheddar cheese', 'croutons', 'shredded romaine lettuce', 'grilled or steamed corn', 'cooked bacon, crumbled', 'avocado, diced']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken, cut into bite size chunks': '1', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'tahini or avocado oil mayo': '1/4', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'Worcestershire sauce': '2', 'grated parmesan': '1/3', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'cubed cheddar cheese': '1', 'croutons': '2', 'shredded romaine lettuce': '3', 'grilled or steamed corn': '4', 'cooked bacon, crumbled': '6', 'avocado, diced': '1'}

title: Sheet Pan Jalapeño Pineapple Shrimp Tacos with Cilantro Garlic Sauce
ingredients: ['large shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chipotle chili powder', 'all-spice', 'ground ginger', 'dried thyme', 'cinnamon', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'warm tortillas and smashed avocado, for serving', 'garlic, smashed', 'plain Greek Yogurt or sour cream', 'fresh lime juice', 'chopped green onions', 'fresh cilantro', 'shredded green cabbage', 'jalapeños', 'diced pineapple', 'cilantro, roughly chopped', 'juice from half an orange', 'juice of 1 lime']
ingredients with measurement: {'large shrimp, peeled and deveined': '1 1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'all-spice': '1', 'ground ginger': '1/2', 'dried thyme': '1/2', 'cinnamon': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'warm tortillas and smashed avocado, for serving': 'seasoning', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'plain Greek Yogurt or sour cream': '1/2', 'fresh lime juice': '2-3', 'chopped green onions': '1/4', 'fresh cilantro': '1/2', 'shredded green cabbage': '2-3', 'jalapeños': '1-2', 'diced pineapple': '1', 'cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'juice from half an orange': 'seasoning', 'juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss the shrimp with olive oil, chili powder, all-spice, ginger, thyme, cinnamon, cayenne, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Arrange in a single layer. Add the garlic (for the garlic sauce) and the\xa0jalapeños (for the salsa). Roast 6-8 minutes or until the shrimp is cooked. During the last minute, switch the oven to broil and broil until lightly charred.\xa0Set the shrimp aside.', '3. To make the sauce. Squeeze the garlic cloves out of their skin and add to a blender with the yogurt and lime juice. Blend until smooth. Add the cilantro, green onions, and a pinch of salt. Pulse to combine.', '4. Add the cabbage to a large bowl and toss with 1/3 cup of the garlic sauce.', '5. To make the salsa. De-seed the jalapeño (if desired), then chop and add to a bowl with the pineapple, cilantro, orange juice, lime juice, and a pinch of salt.', '6. Stuff the avocado, slaw, salsa, and shrimp into the warmed tortillas. Top with garlic sauce and additional salsa.']

title: Spicy Zucchini Ricotta Lasagna with Oregano Breadcrumbs
ingredients: ['zucchini or yellow summer squash, sliced 1/8" thick', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'ground Italian chicken sausage or chicken', 'red bell pepper, chopped', 'dried oregano', 'dried thyme', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'red pepper flakes', 'marinara sauce', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'large egg', 'shredded dry mozzarella cheese', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'fresh oregano leaves', 'fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'zucchini or yellow summer squash, sliced 1/8" thick': '3-4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground Italian chicken sausage or chicken': '1', 'red bell pepper, chopped': '1', 'dried oregano': '1', 'dried thyme': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'marinara sauce': '1', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1', 'large egg': '1', 'shredded dry mozzarella cheese': '2', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '1', 'fresh oregano leaves': '2', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375° F. Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.', '2 Thinly slice the zucchini to about 1/8 inch thick. Lay the zucchini flat on a clean kitchen towel and sprinkle with salt. Let site 15 minutes to draw out excess moisture, then pat dry with a towel. Try and get as much water out of the zucchini as possible.', '3. Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large pot over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and brown all over, about 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the bell pepper, oregano, thyme, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Stir in the marinara sauce, then remove from the heat.', '4. In a bowl, combine the ricotta, provolone, and egg.', "5. To assemble, spread 1/2 cup of sauce in the bottom of the baking dish. Layer over the zucchini, then dollop over 1/2 cup of the ricotta cheese, and top with about 1/2 cup mozzarella. Repeat the layering until all ingredients have been used...don't stress about making it look perfect.\xa0Top with mozzarella. Cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Uncover, and bake another 30 minutes, until the cheese is melted and the sauce is bubbly.", '6. Meanwhile, make the breadcrumbs. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil, the breadcrumbs, and oregano over medium heat. Cook, until the breadcrumbs are toasted all over and the oregano is fried, about 4 minutes. Season with salt.', '7. Let the lasagna sit 10-15 minutes before serving. Top with breadcrumbs and fresh basil.']

title: Crispy Italian Chicken and Bacon Salad with Pesto Tahini Dressing and Sourdough Croutons

title: Roasted Tomato Basil and Feta Orzo

title: Spinach and Artichoke Pizza with Cheesy Bread Crust
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'garlic, finely chopped', 'dried basil', 'dried oregano', 'dried thyme', 'crushed fennel seed', 'red pepper flakes', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fresh baby spinach', 'whole milk mozzarella, cubed', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought', 'shredded fontina, gouda, or mozzarella cheese', 'grated parmesan', 'marinated artichokes, drained']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '2', 'garlic, finely chopped': '3', 'dried basil': '1', 'dried oregano': '1', 'dried thyme': '1/2', 'crushed fennel seed': '1/2', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1', 'fresh baby spinach': '16', 'whole milk mozzarella, cubed': '1', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'shredded fontina, gouda, or mozzarella cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan': '1/3', 'marinated artichokes, drained': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Position the oven rack in the upper 1/3 portion of your oven. Preheat the oven to 500° F. for at least 30 minutes before baking, preferably 1-2 hours ahead. If you have a baking stone, start preheating it.', '2. In a skillet, melt together the butter, basil, oregano, thyme, fennel, and red pepper flakes. Cook until the garlic is golden and crisp, 3-4 minutes. Pour the garlic butter out of the skillet and set aside.', '3. Set the same skillet over medium heat. Add the olive oil, baby spinach, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes, until the spinach is wilted, make sure to get all the excess water out.', '4. \xa0On a lightly floured surface, push/roll the pizza dough out until it is pretty thin (about a\xa012-14 inch circle). Place the pizza dough on a lightly oiled sheet pan. Arrange the cubed mozzarella around the edge of the dough.\xa0Fold the edges of the dough over the cheese, pinching to seal the cheese inside.', '5. Spread on the garlic butter, then the spinach. Sprinkle on the shredded cheese and parmesan. Toss the artichokes with a drizzle of olive oil, then arrange them over the pizza.', '6. Slide into the preheated oven and bake for 10 minutes, rotate the pizza, and bake another 3-5 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. Top the pizza with fresh basil. ENJOY!']

title: Crispy Braised Chipotle Beef Tacos
ingredients: ['beef chuck, cut into 3-4 pieces', 'avocado oil, for cooking', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chipotle peppers in adobo', 'canned crushed tomatoes', 'garlic, smashed or grated', 'yellow onion, quartered', 'ancho chile powder', 'dried Mexican oregano', 'ground cumin', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cloves', 'bay leaves', 'cinnamon stick', 'apple cider vinegar', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'jalapeño, chopped', 'chopped onion', 'limes', 'corn tortillas', 'shredded mozzarella or Monterey Jack cheese', 'avocado cream, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'beef chuck, cut into 3-4 pieces': '3 1/2', 'avocado oil, for cooking': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chipotle peppers in adobo': '1', 'canned crushed tomatoes': '1/2', 'garlic, smashed or grated': '6', 'yellow onion, quartered': '1', 'ancho chile powder': '1', 'dried Mexican oregano': '1', 'ground cumin': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cloves': '1/4', 'bay leaves': '2', 'cinnamon stick': '1/2', 'apple cider vinegar': '1/4', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1', 'jalapeño, chopped': '1', 'chopped onion': '1/4', 'limes': 'seasoning', 'corn tortillas': 'seasoning', 'shredded mozzarella or Monterey Jack cheese': '2', 'avocado cream, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 300° F.', '2. Season the beef all over with salt and pepper. Heat a drizzle of oil in a large dutch oven over medium-high heat. Sear the beef all over, 2-3 minutes per side. Turn the heat off.', '3. To make the sauce. In a blender, puree the chipotle peppers, tomatoes, garlic, onion, ancho chile powder, oregano, cumin, paprika, cloves, bay leaves, 2 teaspoons salt, and the apple cider vinegar. Add 1 cup water and blend until smooth. Pour the sauce over the beef. Add 2 cups of water and the cinnamon to the pot. Over medium heat, bring the sauce to a simmer, then cover and transfer the pot to the oven. Cook 3 hours, or until the meat easily shreds.', '4. To make the tacos. Stir together the cilantro, onion, jalapeño, a squeeze of lime juice, and a pinch of salt.', '5. Remove the cinnamon stick and meat from the sauce, shred the meat. Pour the sauce into a shallow bowl, allowing the fat to settle on top.', '6. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Dip the tortillas into the sauce (the fat should be on top) and place in the skillet, sauce side facing down. On one side of the tortilla, layer cheese, then beef. Fold the tortilla over the beef and cook until slightly fried, about 1-2 minutes per side. Serve the tacos with cilantro on top and additional red sauce, plus avocado crema, if desired.']

title: One Skillet Creamy Artichoke Chicken Marsala and Orzo
ingredients: ['chicken cutlets, or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'garlic powder', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'marinated artichokes, drained', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'dry orzo pasta', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'dry marsala wine', 'heavy cream', 'lemon juice']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken cutlets, or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'garlic powder': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'salted butter': '3', 'marinated artichokes, drained': '12', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '3', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'low sodium chicken broth': '1 1/2', 'dry marsala wine': '3/4', 'heavy cream': '3/4', 'lemon juice': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Place the flour and garlic powder in a shallow bowl and dredge the chicken through the flour mix, pressing to adhere.', '2. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet set over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. Add 1 tablespoon butter and allow the butter to brown around the chicken, about 2 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet.', '3. To the skillet, add 2 tablespoons olive oil and the artichokes. Cook undisturbed for 2 minutes or until golden.\xa0Add 2 tablespoons butter, the shallots, garlic, thyme, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Cook 2-3 minutes, until fragrant. Add the orzo. Cook another 2 minutes.', '4. Pour in the wine and broth. Cook 10-12 minutes until the orzo is al dente, then pour in the cream. Add the chicken and lemon juice to the skillet and simmer for 5 minutes or until warmed through.', '5. Serve the chicken and orzo topped with fresh thyme. Eat!']

title: 5 Minute Chocolate Cinnamon Sugar Toast

title: Honey Mustard Pretzel Chicken and Avocado Bacon Salad.

ingredients with measurement: {'eggs beaten': '2', 'boneless chicken tenders': '1', 'finely crushed salted pretzel twists': '1', 'chili powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'smoked paprika': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil, for brushing': 'seasoning', 'mixed greens': '6', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '1', 'shaved parmesan': '1/2', 'avocados, diced': '1-2', 'cooked thick cut bacon, crumbled': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'honey': '1/4', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'dijon mustard': '3', 'tahini': '2', 'apple cider vinegar': '2'}

title: Lemon Brown Butter Salmon and Potatoes with Parmesan Asparagus
ingredients: ['baby potatoes, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salmon filet', 'cajun seasoning', 'lemon zest plus 2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'red wine vinegar', 'arugula', 'fresh basil leaves, roughly torn', 'fresh dill, roughly torn', 'asparagus, ends trimmed', 'grated parmesan', 'salted butter']
ingredients with measurement: {'baby potatoes, halved': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salmon filet': '1 - 1 1/2', 'cajun seasoning': '2', 'lemon zest plus 2 tablespoons lemon juice': '1', 'red wine vinegar': '2', 'arugula': '1', 'fresh basil leaves, roughly torn': '1/2', 'fresh dill, roughly torn': '1/4', 'asparagus, ends trimmed': '1', 'grated parmesan': '1/2', 'salted butter': '4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F. On a large baking sheet, combine the potatoes, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Toss well to coat. Bake for 15 minutes.', '2. Remove the potatoes from the oven. Add the salmon to the center of the pan (if the salmon is large, cut it into smaller portions). Rub 1 tablespoon olive oil and the cajun seasoning. Add the asparagus to the pan and toss with the parmesan. Bake everything together for 10-15 minutes or until the salmon has reached your desired doneness.', '3. In a bowl, whisk together the lemon zest, red wine vinegar, and 1 tablespoon olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Add the arugula, basil, dill, and a pinch of chili flakes. Toss to combine.', '4. Add the butter to a medium pot set over medium heat. Allow the butter to brown, until it smells toasted, about 2-3 minutes. Stir often. Remove from the heat and stir in 1 tablespoon lemon juice.', '5. Serve the salmon, potatoes, and asparagus together with the arugula salad on top. Drizzle the brown butter over the salmon.']

title: Spinach and Artichoke Pita Grilled Cheese

title: Sheet Pan 30 Minute Sticky Apricot Chicken
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'large egg, beaten', 'all-purpose flour, or gluten-free flour', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil, or sesame oil', 'high quality apricot preserves', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'balsamic vinegar', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'red pepper flakes', 'asparagus, or broccoli - chopped', 'fresh basil leaves', 'sesame seeds and rice, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes': '1 1/2', 'large egg, beaten': '1', 'all-purpose flour, or gluten-free flour': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil, or sesame oil': '1', 'high quality apricot preserves': '3/4', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'red pepper flakes': '1/2 - 1', 'asparagus, or broccoli - chopped': '1', 'fresh basil leaves': '1/4', 'sesame seeds and rice, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 475° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease with oil.', '2. Add the chicken, egg, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Toss to combine. Add the flour to another bowl. Dredge the chicken in batches through the flour, tossing to coat. Place the chicken on one side of the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 12 minutes. Flip the chicken, then add the asparagus to the other side of the pan. Toss with 1 tablespoon oil, salt, and pepper. Return to the oven another 5 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Reduce the oven temp to 425° F.', '3. Meanwhile, mix the apricot preserves, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar, garlic, ginger, and red pepper flakes in a glass jar or bowl.', '4. Pour the sauce over the chicken, tossing to combine. Return everything to the oven for 3 minutes, until the sauce coats the chicken, watch close the sauce can burn.', '5. Serve the chicken, asparagus, and sauce over bowls of rice topped with basil and sesame seeds.']

title: Sheet Pan Pesto Chicken and Lemon Butter Potatoes with Whipped Feta
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into 2-3 inch pieces', 'medium shallot, finely chopped', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'zest and juice of 1-2 lemons', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'medium russet potatoes, cut into 2 inch pieces', 'salted butter', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'sesame seeds', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped, and reserve the oil', 'chopped fresh dill or thyme', 'white or regular balsamic vinegar', 'pita/naan and fresh herbs, for serving', 'feta cheese', 'plain greek yogurt', 'extra virgin olive oil']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into 2-3 inch pieces': '2', 'medium shallot, finely chopped': '1', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'zest and juice of 1-2 lemons': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'medium russet potatoes, cut into 2 inch pieces': '3-4', 'salted butter': '2', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '2', 'sesame seeds': '1', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped, and reserve the oil': '1/2', 'chopped fresh dill or thyme': '1', 'white or regular balsamic vinegar': '2', 'pita/naan and fresh herbs, for serving': 'seasoning', 'feta cheese': '8', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F. In a medium bowl, combine the chicken, pesto, shallot, lemon zest, and a pinch each of chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Let sit 15 minutes.', '2.\xa0On a baking sheet, toss the potatoes with olive oil. Season with salt and black pepper. Roast for 20 minutes, or until tender.', '3. Remove the potatoes from the oven. Add the butter, lemon juice, garlic, and sesame seeds, toss to coat, then push the potatoes to one side of the pan. Put the chicken on the other side.\xa0Return the pan to the oven and roast for 20 minutes more, until the chicken is cooked through.', '4. Meanwhile, make the tomato vinaigrette. title: Crispy Black Pepper Turmeric Cauliflower and Garlic Noodles
ingredients: ['large head of cauliflower, cut into florets', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'ground turmeric', 'ground ginger', 'black pepper', 'paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'medium shallots, sliced or chopped', 'raw cashews', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'honey', 'rice noodles', 'salted butter or ghee', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'canned coconut milk', 'zest and juice of 1 lime', 'fresh Thai basil or cilantro, roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'large head of cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'ground ginger': '1', 'black pepper': '1-2', 'paprika': '1/2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'medium shallots, sliced or chopped': '2', 'raw cashews': '1/2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1', 'honey': '1', 'rice noodles': '8', 'salted butter or ghee': '3', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '3-4', 'canned coconut milk': '1', 'zest and juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'fresh Thai basil or cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/2'}

title: Basil Parmesan Pasta with Crispy Chicken, Prosciutto, and Arugula
ingredients: ['chicken cutlets or tenders', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'grated parmesan', 'onion powder', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'spaghetti', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'salted butter', 'fresh basil, finely chopped', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'thinly sliced prosciutto', 'baby arugula', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'chopped fresh parsley']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken cutlets or tenders': '1', 'Panko bread crumbs': '1', 'grated parmesan': '1 1/2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'spaghetti': '1', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '3', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'fresh basil, finely chopped': '1 1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '2', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk': '3/4', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '2', 'thinly sliced prosciutto': '3', 'baby arugula': '2', 'juice from 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh parsley': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Place the Panko, 1/2 cup parmesan, and the onion powder in a shallow bowl. Dredge both sides of the chicken through the Panko, pressing to adhere by using your fist to really make the crumbs stick. Place the chicken on a plate. Set aside.', '2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain.', '3. To make the sauce. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil and the garlic together over medium-high heat. Cook 2-3 minutes until fragrant. Add the butter and stir in the basil. Add a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook another minute, until the basil is fragrant, then pour in the broth and cream. Add the cream cheese. Whisk until smooth. Bring the sauce to a gentle simmer and cook 5-8 minutes, until thickened slightly.', '4. To cook the chicken. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until golden brown, 3-4 minutes. Flip the chicken and cook until golden brown on the other side, 3-4 minutes. Transfer to a cutting board and season with salt. Slice into thin strips. Add the prosciutto to the pan and cook 1 minute to warm through.', '5. To the sauce, stir in 1 cup parmesan. Toss in the pasta and cook 3-5 minutes, then remove from the heat and stir in the parsley.', '6. Toss the arugula with a drizzle of olive oil, a squeeze of lemon, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Divide the pasta between plates and top with slices of chicken, warm prosciutto, and arugula. Twirl and devour…with bread on the side.']

title: Burrata Caesar Salad Pizza

If you have a baking stone, start preheating it.', '2. To make the salad dressing. Combine the olive oil, lemon juice, tahini, dijon, Worcestershire, parmesan, and a pinch each of salt and pepper in a blender and blend until smooth. Taste and adjust the salt and pepper.', '3. Slide into the preheated oven and bake for 10 minutes, pull the pizza out, add the burrata and bake another 3-5 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. title: Cool Ranch Chicken Tostadadillas with Honey Lime Crema
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken beef or turkey', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'poblano pepper, seeded and chopped', 'tomato paste', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt', 'crema, avocado, cabbage, and cilantro. for serving', 'corn tortillas', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'dried parsley', 'smoked paprika', 'chili powder', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'dried chives', 'dried dill', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken beef or turkey': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'poblano pepper, seeded and chopped': '1', 'tomato paste': '2', 'chili powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'ground cumin': '1 1/2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt': '1', 'crema, avocado, cabbage, and cilantro. for serving': 'seasoning', 'corn tortillas': '12', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'dried parsley': '2', 'onion powder': '1', 'dried chives': '1', 'dried dill': '1/2', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the ground meat, onion, and poblano pepper. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks until the chicken is browned, about 5 minutes. Add the tomato paste, chili powder, paprika, cumin, garlic powder, and salt. Add 1 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly around the chicken, about 10 minutes. Keep warm over low heat.', '3. Meanwhile, make the tostadas. Line the corn tortillas up on 2 baking sheets and rub lightly with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake 7 minutes, until crisp. In a small bowl, combine the parsley, paprika, chili powder, onion powder, garlic powder, chives, dill, and 1 teaspoon salt. While warm, sprinkle the "cool ranch" seasoning blend over each tostada.', '4. To make the tostadillas. Evenly divide the Mexican cheese blend between half the tostadas, then place the remaining tostada shells directly on the cheese. Bake 5 minutes, until the cheese is melted.', "5. To assemble, plate each tostadilla and top evenly with mashed avocado and chicken. Top as desired with cabbage, jalapeños, and cilantro. Dollop over the crema. Break 'em up and enjoy!"]

title: Chicken Meatball Pita Bowls with Seasoned Fries and Feta
ingredients: ['russet potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'paprika or smoked paprika', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'flaky sea salt', 'ground chicken', 'small shallot, finely chopped or grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'dried oregano', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fresh pitas or naan, warmed', 'lettuce, herbs, and feta, for serving', 'avocado, halved', 'plain greek yogurt', 'fresh basil', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired', 'juice of 1 lemon']
ingredients with measurement: {'russet potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'paprika or smoked paprika': '1', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'flaky sea salt': 'seasoning', 'ground chicken': '1', 'small shallot, finely chopped or grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'dried oregano': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh pitas or naan, warmed': '4', 'lettuce, herbs, and feta, for serving': 'seasoning', 'avocado, halved': '1', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/4', 'fresh basil': '1/2', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired': '1', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. Toss the potatoes, olives oil, and a pinch of salt together on a large baking sheet. Spread the fries in an even layer. Do not overcrowd the pan. Bake for 15-20 minutes, then flip and bake for 15 minutes more.', '3. Meanwhile, make the meatballs. Add the chicken, shallot, garlic, oregano, paprika, cumin, and a pinch of salt and pepper to a bowl. Mix until just combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil, roll the meat into rounded tablespoon-size balls (will make 14-15 meatballs). Place on a parchment lined baking sheet. The mix will be wet, but it will firm up in the oven. Bake for 15 minutes or until the meatballs are crisp and cooked through.', '4. Finish the fries. In a small bowl, combine the paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and cayenne pepper. Remove the fries from the oven and immediately toss with the seasonings. Season to taste with salt.', '5. To make the avocado sauce. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt.', '6. To serve, spread the avocado onto plates. Add the pita, lettuce, feta, fries, and meatballs. Sprinkle with sea salt.']

title: One Pan Baked Cheesy Basil Pasta
ingredients: ['chopped sun-dried tomatoes, oil reserved and drained', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'dried basil', 'dried oregano', 'parsley', 'dried dill', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'halved kalamata olives', 'sliced pepperoncini', 'short cut pasta', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'red bell peppers, very thinly sliced', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'chopped sun-dried tomatoes, oil reserved and drained': '1/3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'dried basil': '1', 'dried oregano': '1', 'parsley': '1', 'dried dill': '2', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1', 'halved kalamata olives': '1/3', 'sliced pepperoncini': '2', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'red bell peppers, very thinly sliced': '2-3', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. Drain the sun-dried tomato oil out into a 9×13 inch baking dish. Add the olive oil, basil, oregano, parsley, dill, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Toss in the chopped sun-dried tomatoes, olives, pepperoncini. Add the dry pasta and toss with the oil, making sure the pasta gets fully coated in oil and herbs. Pour over 2 1/2 cups water. Stir to combine. Push down on the pasta to submerge it.', '3. Add the mozzarella and cheddar, then layer on the bell peppers and parmesan. It will seem like a lot of peppers, but they cook down in the oven.', '4. Rub the underside of a piece of foil with oil. Tightly cover the baking dish with the foil, oiled side facing down. Bake for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake another 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly. Remove from the oven and top with fresh basil.']

title: Roasted Turmeric Chicken Pitas with Garlic Lemon Tahini
ingredients: ['boneless skinless, chicken breasts (or thighs) cut into bite-size pieces', 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'smoked or sweet paprika', 'ground cumin', 'ground cardamom', 'ground turmeric', 'ground cinnamon', 'cayenne pepper', 'juice from half a lemon', 'garlic cloves finely, chopped or grated', 'kosher salt black pepper', 'fresh naan or pitas, warmed', 'pickled red onion, lettuce, cucumbers, and parsley, for serving', 'tahini', 'dijon mustard', 'garlic, grated', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless, chicken breasts (or thighs) cut into bite-size pieces': '1', 'extra-virgin olive oil': '3', 'smoked or sweet paprika': '2', 'ground cumin': '2', 'ground cardamom': '1/2', 'ground turmeric': '½', 'ground cinnamon': '⅛', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4- ½', 'juice from half a lemon': 'seasoning', 'garlic cloves finely, chopped or grated': '4', 'kosher salt black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh naan or pitas, warmed': '4', 'pickled red onion, lettuce, cucumbers, and parsley, for serving': 'seasoning', 'tahini': '1/2', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'honey': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the olive oil, chicken, paprika, cumin, cardamom, turmeric, cinnamon, cayenne, lemon, garlic, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Let marinate for 15 minutes at room temperature or up to overnight in the refrigerator.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Arrange the chicken on a baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes, toss and bake another 5-10 minutes, or until cooked through. Switch the oven to broil. Broil 1-2 minutes, until the chicken chars on the edge. *Watch closely!', '3. Meanwhile, make the tahini. Combine all ingredients and 1/4 cup water in a blender and blend until smooth. If needed, add water to thin the sauce as desired. Season to taste with salt.', '4. To assemble, stuff/spread each pita with tahini, then lettuce, and cucumber. Add the chicken, red onion, avocado, and parsley. Drizzle over more tahini and harissa (recipe in notes).']

title: Broccoli Cheddar Potato Pierogi
ingredients: ['all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt', 'salted butter, melted', 'plain full-fat greek yogurt', 'large egg', 'Russet potatoes, peeled and quartered', 'broccoli florets', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'dried thyme', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves']
ingredients with measurement: {'all-purpose flour': '2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'salted butter, melted': '2', 'plain full-fat greek yogurt': '1', 'large egg': '1', 'Russet potatoes, peeled and quartered': '3', 'broccoli florets': '2', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '2', 'dried thyme': '1', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '4', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dough. In a medium bowl, combine the flour, salt, butter, yogurt, and egg. Mix until combined. Knead the dough for 2-3 minutes. Cover and let sit 30 minutes.', '2. To make the filling.\xa0Bring the potatoes to a boil in a large pot of cold water. Salt the water and cook until the potatoes are tender, about 20 to 30 minutes. During the last 10 minutes, add the broccoli', '3. Drain the potatoes and broccoli. Pull the broccoli out and set on a cutting board. Return the potatoes to the pot and mash over low heat, adding the butter, cheddar cheese, cream cheese, thyme, garlic, and onion powder. Chop the broccoli and mix in with the potatoes. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', '4. Roll the dough out onto a floured surface to 1/8 inch thickness. Using a biscuit cutter, cut out 3-inch circles.\xa0Spoon 2 teaspoons of filling into the center of each round. Brush the edges with water and fold half of the dough over the filling to enclose it. Press down the edges to seal, pressing out all the air. Be sure to keep the dough covered as you work to prevent from drying out. At this point, if desired, the\xa0pierogi can be flash-frozen on a baking sheet for 30 minutes, then transferred to a freezer bag and frozen for up to 3 months.', '5. When ready to cook, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pierogi in batches for 2-3 minutes, or until they float. Drain.', '6. To make the butter sauce, melt 1 tablespoon butter in a large skillet. Add the onions and cook 5 minutes, until softened. Season with salt and pepper and continue cooking another 5-8 minutes, until the onions are golden. Add the remaining butter and thyme and cook 2-3 minutes, until the butter is lightly browned.\xa0Remove from the heat.', '7. Drop the pierogi into the sauce, gently tossing to combine. Spoon the pierogi and onions onto plates. Top with cheddar and thyme. EAT!']

title: Pesto Pizza with Feta Stuffed Crust
ingredients: ['fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'garlic, grated', 'lemon zest', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought', 'basil pesto, homemade or store bought', 'green olives', 'roasted red peppers', 'red pepper flakes', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese', 'pepperoni, sliced']
ingredients with measurement: {'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh oregano, chopped': '1/4', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'lemon zest': '2', 'crumbled feta cheese': '4', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella': '1', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought': '3/4', 'basil pesto, homemade or store bought': '1/3', 'green olives': '1/2', 'roasted red peppers': '1', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese': '1/2', 'pepperoni, sliced': '3'}
instructions: ['1. Position the oven rack in the upper 1/3 portion of your oven. Preheat the oven to 500° F. for at least 30 minutes before baking, preferably 1-2 hours ahead. If you have a baking stone, start preheating it.', '2. To make the herb seasoning, combine the basil, oregano, grated garlic, lemon zest, and a pinch of red pepper flakes.', '3. Combine the feta, 1/3 cup mozzarella, and 2 tablespoons of the herb seasoning in a bowl.', '4. On a lightly floured surface, push/roll the pizza dough out until it is pretty thin (about a\xa012-14 inch circle). Place the pizza dough on a lightly oiled sheet pan. Arrange the feta cheese mix around the edge of the dough.\xa0Fold the edges of the dough over the cheese, pinching to seal the cheese inside.', '5. Spread on the pesto and olives. Sprinkle on 2/3 cup mozzarella, the fontina, and parmesan. Add the red peppers and pepperoni. Sprinkle the remaining herb seasoning over top.', '6. Slide into the preheated oven and bake for 10 minutes, rotate the pizza, and bake another 3-5 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. Top the pizza with fresh basil. ENJOY!']

title: Sheet Pan Sticky Gochujang Chicken Meatballs
ingredients: ['ground turkey or chicken', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'Gochujang (Korean chili paste)', 'green onions, finely chopped', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'large head broccoli, cut into florets', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'honey', 'rice vinegar', 'Gochujang (Korean chili paste)', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, grated', 'toasted sesame oil', 'plain Greek yogurt or avocado oil mayo', 'rice, sesame seeds, chiles, and Kimchi, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground turkey or chicken': '1', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '1/3', 'Gochujang (Korean chili paste)': '1-2', 'green onions, finely chopped': '3', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'large head broccoli, cut into florets': '1', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'honey': '2', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'toasted sesame oil': '1', 'plain Greek yogurt or avocado oil mayo': '1/4', 'rice, sesame seeds, chiles, and Kimchi, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '2. To make the meatballs. Add the chicken, soy sauce, Gochujang, green onions, ginger, and garlic, to a bowl. Mix until just combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil, and roll the meat into rounded tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-16 meatballs). Place on the prepared baking sheet. The mix will be wet, but it will firm up in the oven. Add the broccoli to the other side of the baking sheet and toss with 1 tablespoon oil, salt, and pepper. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15 minutes or until the meatballs are crisp and cooked through.', '3. Meanwhile, make the sticky Gochujang sauce. In a small pot, combine the soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, Gochujang, ginger, garlic, sesame oil, and 1/4 cup water. Bring the sauce to a boil for 5 minutes, until the sauce thickens and reduces by about 1/4. Remove from the heat.', '4. Remove the broccoli from the baking sheet. Pour about half the sauce over the meatballs, tossing to combine. Return to the oven for 2-3 minutes, until the sauce coats the meatballs.', '5. Combine 2-3 tablespoons of the remaining sticky Gochujang sauce from step 3 with the yogurt.', '6. Serve the meatballs and sauce over bowls of rice topped with additional green onions, and sesame seeds. Serve the broccoli on the side.']

title: Crispy Queso Fundido Taquitos
ingredients: ['ground Mexican chorizo', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'Monterey Jack cheese, cubed', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'poblano, seeded, and finely chopped', 'chipotle chile in adobo, finely chopped', 'corn tortillas, warmed', 'yogurt, cilantro, salsa, shredded lettuce, and pickled onions, for serving', 'avocados, halved', 'fresh cilantro', 'garlic, grated', 'juice from 2 limes', 'flaky salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground Mexican chorizo': '1/2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1', 'Monterey Jack cheese, cubed': '1', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1/2', 'poblano, seeded, and finely chopped': '1', 'chipotle chile in adobo, finely chopped': '1', 'corn tortillas, warmed': '16-20', 'yogurt, cilantro, salsa, shredded lettuce, and pickled onions, for serving': 'seasoning', 'avocados, halved': '2', 'fresh cilantro': '1/2', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'juice from 2 limes': 'seasoning', 'flaky salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. In a large skillet over medium-high heat cook the chorizo and onion, breaking up the meat as it cooks until the chorizo is browned and cooked through, about 8-10 minutes. Remove from the heat. Stir in the poblano pepper, and chipotle pepper, then remove from the heat. Drain off any excess grease.', '3. In a bowl, combine all the cheeses.', '4. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds to 1 minute in the microwave, until pliable. On a baking sheet, rub the tortillas with olive oil. Spoon 1-2 tablespoons of the cheese mixture down the middle of the tortilla, add a sprinkle of chorizo mixture then roll up and place seam-side down on the baking sheet. Take the chorizo mix and stuff it into either end of the taquito to better enclose the cheese. Transfer to the oven and bake for 5-8 minutes, then flip and cook another 5 minutes more, or until the cheese has melted and the tortillas are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile, make the crema. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt.', '5. Serve the taquitos topped with avocado, pico de gallo, and any other desired toppings.']

title: Party Size Spanakopita Melt
ingredients: ['fresh baby spinach', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'small shallot, chopped', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'red pepper flakes', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'loaf ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise', 'provolone cheese', 'shredded mozzarella', 'salted butter', 'raw sesame seeds']
ingredients with measurement: {'fresh baby spinach': '12-16', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'small shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '2', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/3', 'fresh dill, chopped': '1/3', 'fresh oregano, chopped': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'crumbled feta cheese': '3/4', 'loaf ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise': '1', 'provolone cheese': '6', 'shredded mozzarella': '1/2', 'salted butter': '2', 'raw sesame seeds': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the shallot and garlic and cook for 3-4 minutes, until the shallot is softened and fragrant. Stir in the spinach, basil, dill, oregano, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Cook another 5-8 minutes, until the spinach is wilted. Remove from the heat and stir in the lemon zest and feta cheese.', '3. Lay the bottom piece of ciabatta bread cut side facing up on a baking sheet. Layer the spinach on top. Add the provolone and mozzarella. Grab the top piece of bread and pull out some of the insides to create a little more space. Place the bread over all the cheese. Rub the top of the bread with butter, then sprinkle on the sesame seeds.', '4. Wrap the sandwich in foil. Bake 20 minutes, until the cheese melts. Remove the foil and return to the oven and bake another 10-15 minutes more, until the bread is toasted.', '5. Remove from the oven and let sit for 3-4 minutes. Slice into 4-6 larger or 8 smaller sandwiches. Serve with a drizzle of honey and chili flakes. Enjoy!']

title: Slow Cooker Chipotle Chicken and Avocado Rice Soup
ingredients: ['medium yellow onion, chopped', 'jalapeños, seeded if desired, and chopped', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'boneless skinless, chicken breasts', 'chipotle chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'ground cinnamon', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'fire-roasted diced tomatoes', 'cooked white or brown rice', 'juice of 2 limes, plus more for serving', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving', 'avocados, chopped', 'crumbed feta cheese and tortilla chips, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'jalapeños, seeded if desired, and chopped': '1-2', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '4', 'boneless skinless, chicken breasts': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'ground cumin': '2', 'ground cinnamon': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '6', 'fire-roasted diced tomatoes': '1', 'cooked white or brown rice': '2', 'juice of 2 limes, plus more for serving': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'avocados, chopped': '2', 'crumbed feta cheese and tortilla chips, for serving': 'seasoning'}

title: Sheet Pan Roasted Lemon Garlic Butter Salmon with Feta and Olives
ingredients: ['baby potatoes, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'garlic, 2 finely chopped, plus 4 whole cloves', 'lemons, 1 halved and 1 sliced', 'salmon fillets', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'smoked paprika', 'red pepper flakes', 'salted butter, sliced into 6 pieces', 'fresh parsley, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'green olives, roughly chopped', 'champagne vinegar', 'fish sauce', 'feta cheese, broken into chunks', 'baby arugula, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'baby potatoes, halved': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic, 2 finely chopped, plus 4 whole cloves': '6', 'lemons, 1 halved and 1 sliced': '2', 'salmon fillets': '4', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1/4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'salted butter, sliced into 6 pieces': '4', 'fresh parsley, chopped': '1/2', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/2', 'green olives, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'champagne vinegar': '2', 'fish sauce': '1', 'feta cheese, broken into chunks': '4', 'baby arugula, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F. On a rimmed baking sheet, toss the potatoes with 1 tablespoons olive oil. Season with salt and black pepper. Arrange the lemon halves and smashed garlic cloves around the potatoes. Bake 20 minutes, or until tender.', '2.\xa0In a shallow bowl, combine 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 cloves chopped garlic, 2 tablespoons oregano, the paprika, the red pepper flakes, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Add the salmon and toss to coat.', '3. Remove the potatoes from the oven and push them to one side of the pan. Put the salmon on the other side, add a couple pats of butter to each filet.\xa0Arrange the lemon slices around the salmon. Return the pan to oven and bake for 10 to 20 minutes, until the salmon reaches desired doneness.', '4. To make the dressing. Combine the remaining 1/3 cup olive oil, the parsley, 2 tablespoons oregano, the basil, olives, vinegar, and fish sauce (if using).', '5. Remove the garlic cloves from the baking sheet. Finely chop/mash the garlic into a paste, stir the garlic into the dressing. Season with crushed red pepper and salt.', '6. To serve, divide the salmon, potatoes, and lemon slices between plates. Gently crumble the feta around the salmon, then spoon the dressing over everything. Add a handful of arugula. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Creamy Roasted Red Pepper Tortellini
ingredients: ['roasted red peppers, drained', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'shallots, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'tomato paste', 'red pepper flakes', 'dried oregano', 'vodka', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk', 'fresh baby spinach, chopped', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped', 'grated Parmesan cheese, plus more for serving', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fresh or frozen cheese tortellini', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature']
ingredients with measurement: {'roasted red peppers, drained': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'tomato paste': '2', 'red pepper flakes': '1-2', 'dried oregano': '1', 'vodka': '1/4', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk': '3/4', 'fresh baby spinach, chopped': '2', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'grated Parmesan cheese, plus more for serving': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh or frozen cheese tortellini': '1', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil for cooking the tortellini. Now add the red peppers to a food processor or blender.', '2. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil a large skillet over medium-low heat. Add the shallots and garlic. Cook until the shallots begin to soften, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and add the mix to the food processor or blender with the red peppers. Puree until smooth.', '3. Set the same skillet over medium heat. Add 2 tablespoons olive oil, the tomato paste, oregano, and red pepper flakes, cook 4 minutes, until thickened. Stir in the vodka, cook another 2 minutes. Stir in the red pepper sauce, cream, parmesan, spinach, and basil. Season with salt and pepper.', '4. Cook the tortellini according to package directions until al dente. Drain, then toss with the red pepper sauce.', '5. Divide the tortellini between plates and top with burrata and fresh basil. Eat and enjoy immediately.']

title: Roasted Broccoli Pasta Carbonara with Crispy Prosciutto and Whipped Ricotta
ingredients: ['broccoli florets roughly chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'red pepper flakes', 'prosciutto torn', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'large eggs, at room temperature and beaten', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh basil, finely chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'pasta', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'whole milk ricotta cheese, whipped in the food processor, if desired']
ingredients with measurement: {'broccoli florets roughly chopped': '2-3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'prosciutto torn': '3', 'zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'large eggs, at room temperature and beaten': '3', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'fresh basil, finely chopped': '1/4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'pasta': '1', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2', 'whole milk ricotta cheese, whipped in the food processor, if desired': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. On a baking sheet, toss together the broccoli, olive oil, garlic, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Bake 10 minutes, remove from the oven. Arrange the prosciutto around the broccoli. Bake another 8-10 minutes, until the prosciutto is crispy. One the baking sheet, toss the hot broccoli with the lemon zest.', '2. Meanwhile, whisk together the eggs and parmesan.', '3. Boil the pasta until al dente. Before draining, scoop out 1 cup of pasta water, then drain the pasta and add the pasta back to the hot pot. Immediately\xa0add the egg/cheese mixture, tossing quickly (to ensure the eggs do not scramble). Toss until the eggs thicken and create a sauce. Add basil, thyme, and butter, tossing more to combine. Thin the sauce with the reserved pasta water until it reaches your desired consistency.', '4. Spread the ricotta into the bottom of each individual serving bowl. Spoon the pasta over the cheese.\xa0Top with broccoli and prosciutto. Twirl the pasta up with the ricotta...EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Crispy Cauliflower Tinga Tacos with Honey Lime Avocado Crema
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil, plus more for rubbing', 'large head cauliflower, cut into small florets', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt', 'red enchilada sauce', 'corn tortillas, warmed', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'salsa, shredded lettuce, and pickled onions for serving', 'large avocado, halved', 'fresh cilantro', 'honey', 'garlic, grated', 'juice from 2 limes', 'kosher or flaky salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for rubbing': '2', 'large head cauliflower, cut into small florets': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped': '2-3', 'dried oregano': '1/2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'red enchilada sauce': '1/2', 'corn tortillas, warmed': '8-12', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'salsa, shredded lettuce, and pickled onions for serving': 'seasoning', 'large avocado, halved': '1', 'fresh cilantro': '1/2', 'honey': '1-2', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'juice from 2 limes': 'seasoning', 'kosher or flaky salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the cauliflower and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower is charring, about 5 minutes. Add the chipotle peppers, enchilada sauce, oregano, salt, and 1/3 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '3. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds to 1 minute in the microwave, until pliable. On a baking sheet, rub the tortillas with olive oil. Lay each flat and then layer evenly with cheese and cauliflower. Fold the other half of the tortilla over the filling, gently pushing to adhere (see above photo). Transfer to the oven and bake for 5-8 minutes, then flip and cook another 5 minutes more, or until the cheese has melted and the tortillas are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile, make the Honey Lime Avocado Crema. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt.', '5. Serve the tacos topped with avocado, lettuce, limes, and any other desired toppings.']

title: Crispy Sesame Falafel Melts with Garlicky Green Tahini
ingredients: ['tahini', 'fresh cilantro, parsley, dill, or a mix', 'garlic, grated', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'honey', 'chopped veggies, such as carrots, cauliflower, broccoli, or a mix', 'chickpeas, drained', 'all-purpose flour', 'raw sesame seeds', 'garlic, grated', 'ground cumin', 'fresh cilantro, parsley, or a mix', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil, or avocado oil, for cooking', 'shredded gouda or Havarti cheese', 'fresh naan or pitas, warmed', 'pickled red onion, lettuce, and herbs, for serving', 'harissa sauce', 'toasted sesame oil', 'smoked paprika']
ingredients with measurement: {'tahini': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro, parsley, dill, or a mix': '1/2', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'honey': '1', 'chopped veggies, such as carrots, cauliflower, broccoli, or a mix': '1', 'chickpeas, drained': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '1/2', 'raw sesame seeds': '1/4', 'ground cumin': '1', 'fresh cilantro, parsley, or a mix': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil, or avocado oil, for cooking': 'seasoning', 'shredded gouda or Havarti cheese': '3/4', 'fresh naan or pitas, warmed': '6', 'pickled red onion, lettuce, and herbs, for serving': 'seasoning', 'harissa sauce': '1/3', 'toasted sesame oil': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the tahini. Combine all ingredients and 1/4 cup water in a blender and blend until smooth. If needed, add water to thin the sauce as desired. Season to taste with salt.', '2. To make the falafel. Add the veggies to a food processor and pulse until finely chopped. Add the chickpeas, flour, sesame seeds, garlic, cumin, cilantro, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Pulse until the mixture is combined and mostly smooth. If the mix is dry, add 1 tablespoon water at a time until it holds a ball. Roll the dough into rounded tablespoon size balls, then gently flatten them down into 1/2 inch patties.', '3. Preheat the the broiler. Heat the olive oil in an oven-safe skillet set over medium heat. Add the falafel and cook 3-4 minutes per side, until deeply golden and crispy. Remove from the heat. Add cheese to each, then place the pan in the oven for 1-2 minutes to melt the cheese. Watch closely.', '4. To make the harissa oil. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar. Season to taste with salt.', '5. To assemble, spread the tahini on warmed naan, add lettuce, the falafel, and a spoonful of harissa oil. Top as desired with herbs, onions, and any amounts of additional sauce. Enjoy!']

title: Folded Crispy Buffalo Chicken Wraps
ingredients: ['cooked shredded chicken', 'plain greek yogurt', 'buffalo sauce', 'chopped fresh chives', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'whole wheat or gluten-free tortillas', 'shredded romaine lettuce', 'jalapeño or poblano pepper, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'olive oil, for cooking', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'pickled jalapeños chopped + 2 tablespoons brine', 'juice from 1 lime', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'cooked shredded chicken': '1', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/4', 'buffalo sauce': '1/3', 'chopped fresh chives': '2', 'dried parsley': '1', 'dried dill': '1', 'whole wheat or gluten-free tortillas': '4', 'shredded romaine lettuce': '2', 'jalapeño or poblano pepper, chopped': '1-2', 'green onions, chopped': '3', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2', 'olive oil, for cooking': 'seasoning', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'pickled jalapeños chopped + 2 tablespoons brine': '1/4', 'juice from 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the chicken, yogurt, buffalo sauce, chives, parsley, and dill.', '2. \xa0To make the ranch. Combine all ingredients in a bowl.', '3. To assemble, cut down from the center of the tortilla to the edge (see above photo). Spread the chicken in the bottom left corner, then add a handful of the lettuce, jalapeño/poblano pepper, and green onions on the top left corner. Spread the ranch on the top right corner, and the cheese on the bottom right corner (see photos for visuals). Fold the buffalo chicken over the lettuce. Then, working clock-wise, folding that quarter over the ranch. And finally, fold that quarter over the cheese.', '4. Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a skillet, add 1 wrap and cook 2-3 minutes per side until crisp and golden brown. Serve warm with extra buffalo sauce, ranch, and lettuce.']

title: 25 Minute Wonton Soup with Sesame Chili Oil
ingredients: ['sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'baby bok choy, halved, or 1 bunch kale', 'medium shallots, chopped', 'sliced shiitake mushrooms', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, peeled and grated', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'low-sodium soy sauce  or tamari', 'rice vinegar', 'fresh or frozen wontons/dumplings, or potstickers', 'green onions and toasted sesame seeds, for serving', 'toasted sesame oil', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'low-sodium soy sauce  or tamari', 'balsamic vinegar']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'baby bok choy, halved, or 1 bunch kale': '4', 'medium shallots, chopped': '2', 'sliced shiitake mushrooms': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh ginger, peeled and grated': '1', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '6', 'low-sodium soy sauce  or tamari': '1', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'fresh or frozen wontons/dumplings, or potstickers': '20-30', 'green onions and toasted sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning', 'toasted sesame oil': '1/4', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1-2', 'balsamic vinegar': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add the bok choy and cook 3-4 minutes until charred on the edges. Transfer to a plate.', '2. To the same Dutch oven, add 1 tablespoon oil, the mushrooms, shallots, garlic, and ginger. Cook 3-5 minutes, until fragrant. Stir in the broth and bring to a boil over high heat. Add the wontons and cook until they float, 2-3 minutes. Stir in the bok choy, soy sauce, and rice vinegar. Remove from the heat.', '3. To make the chili oil: combine everything in a small bowl.', '4. Divide the bok choy between bowls, then ladle the soup over. Top each bowl with green onions. Serve the chili oil on the side.']

title: Smoky Potato and Kale Soup
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'smoked Spanish chorizo, regular chorizo, or smoked sausage', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, chopped or grated', 'smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'Yukon gold or russet potatoes, chopped', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'Tuscan or curly kale, roughly chopped', 'whole milk, heavy cream, or canned coconut milk', 'grated Manchego cheese, sharp cheddar, or parmesan, plus more for serving', 'fresh oregano, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'smoked Spanish chorizo, regular chorizo, or smoked sausage': '3/4', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped or grated': '6', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4- 1/2', 'Yukon gold or russet potatoes, chopped': '4', 'low sodium chicken broth': '6-8', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'Tuscan or curly kale, roughly chopped': '4-6', 'whole milk, heavy cream, or canned coconut milk': '1/4', 'grated Manchego cheese, sharp cheddar, or parmesan, plus more for serving': '1/4', 'fresh oregano, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chorizo and onions, and brown all over, about 5 to 8 minutes.\xa0Add the garlic, paprika, and cayenne, and cook another 2 minutes. Stir in the potatoes, toss to coat. Add the broth and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Simmer over medium heat for 15-20 minutes, until the potatoes are tender.', '2. Remove about 1/2 cup of the potatoes from the soup and either mash or puree them in a blender, then sir them back into the soup along with the kale, milk, and Manchego. Cook until the kale is wilted, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '3. Serve the soup topped with fresh oregano, if desired. Enjoy with crusty bread.']

title: 30 Minute Spicy Coconut Butter Chicken
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite-size chunks', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garam masala', 'cumin', 'turmeric', 'cayenne pepper, use to your taste', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'large yellow onion, chopped', 'crushed red pepper flakes, use to your taste', 'tomato paste', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'fresh cilantro roughly, chopped', 'steamed rice and naan, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite-size chunks': '2', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '6', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'garam masala': '2', 'cumin': '2', 'turmeric': '1', 'cayenne pepper, use to your taste': '1-2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '4', 'large yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes, use to your taste': '1-2', 'tomato paste': '1/2', 'full-fat coconut milk': '1', 'fresh cilantro roughly, chopped': '1/2', 'steamed rice and naan, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. in a bowl, toss together the chicken, yogurt, 3 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon ginger, 2 teaspoons garam masala, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, 1/2 - 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, and 1 teaspoon salt. Let sit 5-10 minutes.', '2. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and sear on both sides until browned, about 2 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon butter and toss to coat the chicken. Remove the chicken from the skillet to a plate.', '3. To the skillet, add the onion and cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add 2 tablespoons butter, 3 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon ginger, 1 tablespoon garam masala, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, 1/2 - 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, and the chili flakes. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until very fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the tomato paste and continue cooking another 3-4 minutes.', '4. Reduce the heat to low.\xa0Add 1 cup water and the coconut milk. Stir to combine, bring the sauce to a simmer, cook 5 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. Stir in 1 tablespoon butter. If the sauce seems thick, thin with 1/2 to 1 cup additional coconut milk. Add the chicken and any juices on the pan and cook, stirring occasionally, until the sauce thickens slightly, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro. Season with salt and pepper.', '5. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of rice with fresh naan. Enjoy!']

title: Creamy Bacon Tortellini with Charred Broccoli
ingredients: ['fresh cheese tortellini', 'thick-cut slices bacon, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'heavy cream or canned full fat coconut milk', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'grated Parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'fresh cheese tortellini': '1', 'thick-cut slices bacon, chopped': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'chopped fresh thyme': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/3', 'heavy cream or canned full fat coconut milk': '1', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '4', 'grated Parmesan cheese': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the tortellini according to package directions until al dente. Drain.', '2. Meanwhile, cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain onto a paper towel. Add the broccoli and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the broccoli is crisping on the edges, 3 to 4 minutes.\xa0Toss the broccoli, add the olive oil, and cook another 2-3 minutes, until crisp. Remove the broccoli from the skillet to a plate.', '3. To the same skillet, melt the butter over medium heat, cooking until the butter begins to brown, about 3-4 minutes.\xa0Reduce the heat to low, add the garlic, oregano, thyme, and a pinch of crushed red pepper. Cook one minute, then pour in the wine. Simmer 2-3 minutes. Add the cream and cream cheese. Whisk until smooth. Bring the sauce to a gentle simmer and cook 5 minutes, until thickened slightly. Stir in the parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Toss in the tortellini and cook 2-3 minutes, then remove from the heat.', '4. Divide the tortellini between plates and top with charred broccoli, and bacon. Eat and enjoy immediately.']

title: Slow Cooker Red Wine Braised Short Rib Pasta
ingredients: ['thick-cut bacon, chopped', 'bone-in beef short ribs, chicken breast, or thighs', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'medium yellow onions, chopped', 'garlic, chopped or grated', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon', 'tomato paste', 'ground allspice', 'bay leaves', 'parmesan rind, plus parmesan, for serving', 'dry pasta', 'fresh basil or parsley, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick-cut bacon, chopped': '4', 'bone-in beef short ribs, chicken breast, or thighs': '4-5', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'medium yellow onions, chopped': '2', 'garlic, chopped or grated': '8', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon': '2', 'tomato paste': '2', 'ground allspice': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'parmesan rind, plus parmesan, for serving': '1', 'dry pasta': '1', 'fresh basil or parsley, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your slow cooker, combine the wine, 2 cups water, the tomato paste, onion, garlic, allspice, and bay leaves. Season heavily with salt and pepper.', '2. Season the short ribs or chicken with salt and pepper. In a large skillet, cook the bacon until crisp. Remove from the skillet, drain excess grease. Add the bacon to the slow cooker. Going back to the same skillet, sear the ribs on both sides over medium-high heat. Transfer the ribs to the slow cooker.\xa0Gently toss everything to combine. Add the parmesan rind. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 4-6 hours.', '3. Just before serving, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pasta according to package directions, until al dente. Reserve 1 cup cooking water, then drain', '4. Remove the bay leaves and parmesan rind. Shred the meat, discard the bones, and toss the meat with the sauce. If needed, thin the sauce with pasta cooking water. Serve the sauce over pasta. Top with lots of parmesan and fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: Creamy Balsamic Mushroom Chicken Marsala
ingredients: ['chicken cutlets, or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'garlic powder', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced', 'shallots, chopped', 'garlic, chopped or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'balsamic vinegar', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'dry marsala wine', 'heavy cream', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken cutlets, or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/3', 'garlic powder': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'salted butter': '3', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced': '3', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'garlic, chopped or grated': '3', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'balsamic vinegar': '3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '1', 'dry marsala wine': '3/4', 'heavy cream': '3/4', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Place the flour and garlic powder in a shallow bowl and dredge the chicken through the flour mix, pressing to adhere.', '2. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet set over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. Add 1 tablespoon butter and allow the butter to brown around the chicken, about 2 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet.', '3. To the skillet, add 2 tablespoons olive oil and the mushrooms. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden.\xa0Add 2 tablespoons butter, the shallots, garlic, thyme, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Cook 4-5 minutes, until fragrant. Add the balsamic vinegar. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until the mushrooms have caramelized. Spoon half the mushrooms out of the skillet and onto the plate with the chicken.', '4. Pour in the wine and broth. Cook 10-15 minutes until reduced slightly, then pour in the cream. Add the chicken to the skillet and simmer for 5-10 minutes or until warmed through and thickened slightly. Spoon the reserved mushrooms over the chicken.', '5. Serve the chicken and sauce over mashed potatoes, pasta, or steamed rice. Top with fresh thyme or parsley.']

title: 30 Minute Spicy Sesame Noodles with Ginger Chicken
ingredients: ['peanut or sesame oil', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'raw peanuts, roughly chopped', 'orange or clementine peel', 'Chinese egg noodles or ramen noodles', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'pomegranate juice', 'honey', 'raw sesame seeds', 'ground chicken', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'roughly chopped kale or green cabbage', 'green onions and pomegranate, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'peanut or sesame oil': '1/3', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1-2', 'raw peanuts, roughly chopped': '1/3', 'orange or clementine peel': '2-3', 'Chinese egg noodles or ramen noodles': '8', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/2', 'pomegranate juice': '3', 'honey': '2', 'raw sesame seeds': '2', 'ground chicken': '3/4', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced': '3', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'roughly chopped kale or green cabbage': '2', 'green onions and pomegranate, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the chili oil. In a large skillet, heat 1/3 cup peanut or sesame oil, and the peanuts over medium heat. Cook, stirring occasionally until the peanuts turn golden, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and very carefully transfer the oil to a heatproof bowl or glass jar.\xa0Stir in the red pepper flakes and orange peel.', '2. Meanwhile, combine the soy sauce, pomegranate juice (if using), honey, and 1/3 cup water.', '3. Cook the noodles according to package directions.\xa0Drain and set aside.', '4. Place the skillet used to make the chili oil, over medium-high heat. Add 2 tablespoons peanut or sesame oil and the chicken. Season with black pepper and brown all over, breaking the chicken up as it cooks, about 5 minutes. Add the mushrooms, ginger, and garlic, and cook another 2-3 minutes. Slowly pour in 1/2 of the soy sauce mixture. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook until the sauce coats the chicken and the meat begins to caramelize and get crispy, about 5 minutes. Add the remaining soy sauce mixture, the greens, and sesame seeds. Bring the mixture to a simmer.', '5. Stir in the noodles and 2 tablespoons chili oil. Remove from the heat. Serve the noodles warm, topped with additional chili oil and green onions. Enjoy!']

title: Creamy Gnocchi Soup with Rosemary Bacon
