title: 4 Cheese Sage Pesto Florentine Lasagna
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chopped fresh sage leaves', 'fresh chopped rosemary', 'crushed fennel seed', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth', 'ground nutmeg', 'shredded Gruyère or fontina cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'whole milk ricotta', 'shredded provolone', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained', 'basil pesto', 'large egg', 'box no-boil lasagna noodles']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'chopped fresh sage leaves': '2', 'fresh chopped rosemary': '2', 'crushed fennel seed': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk': '2', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth': '2', 'ground nutmeg': '1/4', 'shredded Gruyère or fontina cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'whole milk ricotta': '2', 'shredded provolone': '2', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained': '2', 'basil pesto': '1/4', 'large egg': '1', 'box no-boil lasagna noodles': '1'}
instructions: ['1.Preheat the oven to 375° F. Butter a 9x13 inch pan.', '2. In a medium saucepan, melt together the butter, garlic, sage, rosemary, fennel, and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Cook 3-4 minutes, until the butter is lightly browning. Whisk in the flour and cook for 1 minute. Add the milk and broth. Season with salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil. Stir in the Gruyère/fontina cheese, 1/2 cup of parmesan cheese, and the nutmeg. Stir until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth. Remove from the heat.', '3. In a medium bowl combine the ricotta, provolone, spinach, pesto, and egg. Season with pepper.', "4. Spread 1/4 of the cheese sauce in the bottom of the prepared baking dish. Top with 3-4 lasagna sheets. Spread with 1/2 the ricotta cheese mixture and another 1/4 of the cheese sauce. Repeat the layering. Repeat the layering until all the sauce has been used...don't stress about making it perfect. Top with a 1/2 cup of parmesan.", '5. Bake covered for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake another 15-20 minutes, until the top has bubbled up and browned a bit. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy!']

title: Rosemary Butter Mushroom and Cheese Ravioli.

title: One Pot Baked Spinach and Artichoke Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['salted butter, at room temperature, plus more for greasing', 'box short-cut pasta, such as macaroni', 'whole milk', 'package cream cheese, cubed', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper', 'Ground cayenne pepper', 'packed fresh baby spinach, chopped', 'marinated artichokes, drained and roughly chopped', 'crushed Ritz crackers (about 1 sleeve)', 'garlic powder']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter, at room temperature, plus more for greasing': '6', 'box short-cut pasta, such as macaroni': '1', 'whole milk': '2', 'package cream cheese, cubed': '1', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '3', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper': 'seasoning', 'Ground cayenne pepper': 'seasoning', 'packed fresh baby spinach, chopped': '2', 'marinated artichokes, drained and roughly chopped': '1', 'crushed Ritz crackers (about 1 sleeve)': '1½', 'garlic powder': '¾'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.', '2. In a large saucepan, bring 4 cups of salted water to a boil over high heat. Add the pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes. Stir in the milk and cream cheese and cook until the cream cheese has melted and the pasta is al dente, about 5 minutes more.', '3. Remove the pan from the heat and stir in 2 cups of the cheddar and 3 tablespoons of the butter. Season with salt, pepper, and cayenne. Stir in the spinach and artichokes. If the sauce feels too thick, add ¼ cup of milk or water to thin it.', '4. Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish. Top with the remaining 1 cup of cheddar.', '5. In a medium bowl, stir together the crackers, the remaining 3 tablespoons of butter, and the garlic powder. Sprinkle the crumbs evenly over the mac and cheese.', '6. Bake until the sauce is bubbling and the crumbs are golden, about 20 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes and serve. Store any leftovers refrigerated in an airtight container for up to 3 days.']

title: Creamy French Onion and Mushroom Soup.
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'garlic minced or grated', 'cremini or wild mushrooms, sliced', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'honey', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'bay leaves', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'heavy cream', 'french bread', 'shredded Gruyère cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced': '4', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1 1/4', 'garlic minced or grated': '3', 'cremini or wild mushrooms, sliced': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'honey': '1', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '6-8', 'Worcestershire sauce': '2', 'bay leaves': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'heavy cream': '1/2', 'french bread': '6', 'shredded Gruyère cheese': '2'}
instructions: ["1. Melt together the butter, onions, and honey in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring occasionally until softened, about 10 minutes. At this point, you want to slowly add 3/4 cup of the wine, 1/4 cup at a time, until the wine cooks into the onions. Continue to cook another 10-15 minutes until you've used the 3/4 cup of wine and the onions are deeply caramelized.", '2. Add the garlic, mushrooms, thyme, and sage. Season with salt and pepper, cook another 3-4 minutes. Add the remaining 1/2 cup wine, the broth, Worcestershire sauce, bay leaves, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Increase the heat to medium-high and return the soup to a simmer, simmer 10 minutes, then stir in the cream and cook another 5-10 minutes. Remove the bay leaves and discard. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', '3. Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Arrange the bread on a baking sheet and toast for 10-15 minutes, until very dry. Switch the oven to broil.', '4. Ladle the soup into oven safe bowls. Add a slice of bread to each, and top evenly with cheese. Place each soup bowl on a baking sheet and transfer to the oven, broil until bubbly and golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Top with fresh thyme. Eat!']

title: Baked Buffalo Chicken Egg Rolls with Cilantro Lime Ranch
ingredients: ['cooked shredded chicken', 'plain greek yogurt', 'buffalo sauce', 'chopped fresh chives', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'crumbled blue cheese', 'square egg roll wrappers', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped', 'chopped fresh chives', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'juice from 2 limes']
ingredients with measurement: {'cooked shredded chicken': '1 1/2', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/3', 'buffalo sauce': '1/2', 'chopped fresh chives': '1', 'dried parsley': '2', 'dried dill': '2', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'crumbled blue cheese': '1/4', 'square egg roll wrappers': '20-22', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped': '3/4', 'juice from 2 limes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Lightly grease 2 baking sheets.', '2. In a bowl, combine the chicken, yogurt, buffalo sauce, chives, parsley, dill, onion powder, garlic powder, and a pinch of salt. Stir in the cheeses.', '3. \xa0To assemble, spoon 2 tablespoons of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edges of the wrapper, then roll up and place on the baking sheet. Brush each roll lightly with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, then flip and cook another 8-10 minutes more, or until the rolls are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile, make the ranch. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and shake or stir until creamy.', '5. Serve the egg rolls with fresh herbs and plenty of ranch for dipping.']

title: Oven Fried Coconut Shrimp with Thai Pineapple Chili Sauce
ingredients: ['eggs, beaten', 'large shrimp, tail on, peeled and deveined', 'shredded unsweetened coconut', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'all purpose flour', 'raw sesame seeds', 'paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'ketchup', 'garlic, grated', 'finely chopped pineapple', 'zest and juice from 1 lime, plus more for serving', 'Thai basil or cilantro, for serving', 'honey mustard or aioli, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'eggs, beaten': '2', 'large shrimp, tail on, peeled and deveined': '2', 'shredded unsweetened coconut': '1 1/2', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '1/2', 'all purpose flour': '2', 'raw sesame seeds': '2', 'paprika': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': 'seasoning', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1/2', 'ketchup': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'finely chopped pineapple': '1/2', 'zest and juice from 1 lime, plus more for serving': 'seasoning', 'Thai basil or cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning', 'honey mustard or aioli, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs. Add the shrimp and toss well to coat.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Rub 2 baking sheets with oil.', '3. To a medium-sized bowl, add the coconut, Panko, flour, sesame seeds, paprika, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Stir to combine.', '4. Remove each shrimp from the egg, and dredge through the crumbs, pressing gently to adhere. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat until all the shrimp have been used. Make sure not to crowd your pan, if necessary use two baking sheets. Lightly brush/drizzle the shrimp with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 8-12 minutes, until the shrimp is cooked and the breading crisp.', '5. Meanwhile, make the chili sauce by combining all the ingredients in a bowl.', '6. Serve the shrimp topped with Thai basil, limes, and the pineapple chili sauce for dipping. Add creamy honey mustard or aioli for a little double-dip action. Enjoy!']

title: One Pot 4 Cheese Caprese Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'garlic, grated', 'crushed Ritz crackers', 'your favorite short cut pasta', 'cream cheese, cubed', 'milk', 'sharp white cheddar cheese', 'shredded Havarti or fontina cheese', 'Brie, rind removed and chopped', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'mustard powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'mozzarella cheese', 'regular or heirloom tomatoes, sliced', 'fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'crushed Ritz crackers': '1', 'your favorite short cut pasta': '1', 'cream cheese, cubed': '2', 'milk': '2', 'sharp white cheddar cheese': '1', 'shredded Havarti or fontina cheese': '1', 'Brie, rind removed and chopped': '4-6', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/4', 'mustard powder': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '1', 'mozzarella cheese': '1', 'regular or heirloom tomatoes, sliced': '1-2', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375°F. Grease a 9×13-inch baking dish.', '2. In a large pot, bring 4 cups of water to a boil over high heat. Add 1 teaspoon salt and the pasta. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes. Do not drain the water. Stir in the milk, cream cheese, mustard, cayenne, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook until the cream cheese has melted and the pasta is al dente, about 4-5 minutes.', '2.\xa0Add the cheddar, Havarti, brie, and 3 tablespoons butter. Stir until melted and creamy. Remove from the heat. Stir in the pesto and cherry tomatoes.', '3. Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish. Top with the mozzarella. Lay on the tomato slices. Season with salt and pepper.', '4. In a medium bowl, stir together the crackers, the remaining 3 tablespoons of butter, and the garlic. Sprinkle the crumbs evenly over the mac and cheese. Bake until the sauce is bubbling and the crumbs are golden, about 20 minutes. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Cheesy Zucchini Chicken and Rice Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'small/medium zucchini, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'basmati or jasmine rice', 'dry orzo pasta', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'cayenne pepper', 'shredded Havarti cheese', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'everything bagel spice', 'chopped fresh chives', 'fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'small/medium zucchini, chopped': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'basmati or jasmine rice': '1 1/2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1/2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'shredded Havarti cheese': '3/4', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '3/4', 'everything bagel spice': '2-4', 'chopped fresh chives': '1', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the zucchini and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the zucchini is golden, 5-8 minutes. Remove the zucchini from the skillet and set aside.', '3. To the skillet, add the remaining oil and the onion. Cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Stir in the chicken and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the chicken is seared, 2-3 minutes. Add the butter, garlic, rice, orzo, and thyme, and cook until golden and toasted, 2-3 minutes. Add the broth and bring to a boil over high heat. Add the zucchini back to the skillet. Add the cayenne and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, cover, and reduce heat to low. Cook, covered for 15-20 minutes, until the rice is mostly cooked.', '4. Once the rice is cooked, stir in 1/2 cup of the Havarti and 1/2 cup of the cheddar. If needed, transfer the rice to an oven-safe casserole dish. Scatter the remaining 1/4 cup of each cheese overtop the casserole.\xa0Sprinkle on the everything spice and chives.', '5. Transfer to the oven and bake 10-15 minutes, until the cheese is melted. Switch the oven to broil and broil 1-2 minutes, until the cheese on top is becoming crispy. Serve warm with fresh basil.']

title: Prosciutto Balsamic Peach Chicken with Burrata and Basil.
ingredients: ['chicken cutlets or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fig preserves/jam', 'thin slices prosciutto', 'small shallots, halved', 'garlic cloves, smashed', 'peaches, cut into 10-12 wedges', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'balsamic vinegar', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken cutlets or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fig preserves/jam': '4', 'thin slices prosciutto': '8', 'small shallots, halved': '2', 'garlic cloves, smashed': '4', 'peaches, cut into 10-12 wedges': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'balsamic vinegar': '1/2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/4', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '2', 'fresh basil': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Grease an oven-safe skillet with olive oil.', '2. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Spread each cutlet with 1 tsp fig preserves, then wrap 2 pieces of prosciutto around each cutlet. Transfer the chicken to the prepared skillet. Arrange the shallots, peaches, and thyme around the chicken. Drizzle olive oil over the peaches, season with salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 15-20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked.', '3. Switch the oven to broil Remove the peaches from the skillet to a plate. Return the chicken to the oven and broil for 1-2 minutes, until the prosciutto is crisp.\xa0WATCH CLOSELY.\xa0Remove from the oven, place the chicken on the plate with the peaches.', '4. Place the skillet with the shallots and garlic over medium heat. Add the butter and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Add the balsamic vinegar and wine. Bring to a boil over high heat. Boil 3-5 minutes, until reduced by half. Slide the chicken and peaches back into the skillet, simmer 1 minute. Remove from the heat.', '5. Serve the chicken topped with peaches, burrata, and fresh basil. Drizzle over any remaining pan sauce. Serve alongside orzo and crusty bread for soaking up that sauce. Enjoy!']

title: Cherry Tomato Pesto Polenta with Fried Halloumi
ingredients: ['dry quick-cooking polenta', 'salted butter', 'fresh grated parmesan cheese', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'halloumi cheese, sliced into 1/4 inch pieces', 'cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, smashed', 'shallot, thinly sliced', 'mixed fresh herbs, such as oregano, thyme, and dill', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'balsamic vinegar', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped', 'fresh chopped chives, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'dry quick-cooking polenta': '1 1/2', 'salted butter': '3', 'fresh grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'halloumi cheese, sliced into 1/4 inch pieces': '8', 'cherry tomatoes': '4', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'shallot, thinly sliced': '1', 'mixed fresh herbs, such as oregano, thyme, and dill': '1/2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'balsamic vinegar': '3', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'fresh chopped chives, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the polenta. In a medium saucepan, bring 4 cups water to a boil. Slowly whisk in the polenta, stirring until the polenta is soft and thick, about 3-5 minutes. Stir in the butter, parmesan, the pesto, and season with salt and pepper. Turn the heat off, cover the pot, and let the polenta sit 5 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, cook the halloumi. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the halloumi and cook until golden, about 3 minutes per side. Remove from skillet.', '3. To the same skillet, add the remaining 3 tablespoons oil. When the oil shimmers, add the tomatoes, garlic, shallot, herbs, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Cook until the tomatoes begin to pop, about 4-5 minutes. Remove from the heat and add the balsamic vinegar and basil.', '4. Divide the polenta between bowls. Spoon the tomatoes over top, then add the Halloumi. Drizzle with additional pesto and top with fresh basil and chives. Enjoy!']

title: Crispy Sesame Ginger Potstickers with Chive Chili Sauce
ingredients: ['sesame oil', 'shallots, chopped', 'medium zucchini chopped', 'chopped kale, spinach, or bok choy', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'black pepper', 'round dumpling or wonton wrappers', 'raw sesame seeds', 'toasted sesame oil', 'chili garlic sauce', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'honey', 'red pepper flakes', 'finely chopped fresh chives', 'roasted peanuts', 'creamy garlic special sauce, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil': '2', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'medium zucchini chopped': '3', 'chopped kale, spinach, or bok choy': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'round dumpling or wonton wrappers': '20-22', 'raw sesame seeds': '1/3', 'toasted sesame oil': '1/4', 'chili garlic sauce': '2', 'honey': '2', 'red pepper flakes': '1-2', 'finely chopped fresh chives': '1/4', 'roasted peanuts': '1/4', 'creamy garlic special sauce, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and cook until fragrant and lightly caramelized, 2 minutes. Add the zucchini, kale, ginger, and garlic, and cook, stirring occasionally until the zucchini has cooked down, about 5 minutes. Add the soy sauce and a large pinch of pepper. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until the vegetables have soaked up the so sauce. Remove from the heat and let cool.', '2. To assemble, spoon 1 tablespoon of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edges of the wrapper.\xa0Fold the edges of the wrapper up around the filling and pinch in the edges to seal.\xa0Repeat with the remaining wrappers.', '3. Place the sesame seeds in a shallow bowl.  Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Boil the potsticker for 1-2 minutes, until they float. Drain and then dredge in the sesame seeds.', '4. Heat a few tablespoons of oil in a large skillet set over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the dumplings and cook until the bottoms are light golden brown, about 2-3 minutes. Once crispy, remove from the pan. Serve warm with the sauces.', '5. To make the sauce, combine all ingredients in a medium bowl. Serve alongside the dumplings.']

title: 15 Minute Garlic Butter Ramen Noodles.
ingredients: ['brown rice ramen noodles', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh grated ginger', 'small or 1 medium zucchini, grated', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped', 'soft boiled or fried eggs', 'toasted sesame seeds']
ingredients with measurement: {'brown rice ramen noodles': '2-3', 'salted butter': '6', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'small or 1 medium zucchini, grated': '2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'soft boiled or fried eggs': '4', 'toasted sesame seeds': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Cook the noodles according to package directions. Drain.', '2. Meanwhile, heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the butter and garlic. Cook until the garlic is golden and caramelized, about 2-3 minutes.\xa0Stir in the ginger, cooking another minute. Stir in the zucchini, cooking another 2-3 minutes, until the zucchini wilts into the butter. Stir in the ramen noodles, soy sauce, and basil. Gently toss to combine. Remove from the heat.', '3. Divide the noodles among bowls and top with sesame seeds, basil, and eggs, if desired. Eat immediately...enjoy!']

title: Browned Butter Scallops and Burst Tomato Basil Pasta
ingredients: ['angel hair or linguine', 'large scallops, patted dry', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, smashed', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'salted butter', 'corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon', 'fresh grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped', 'ball burrata cheese, at room temperature']

title: Roasted Tomato Cheddar Tart with Ranch Seasoning
ingredients: ['heirloom tomatoes, sliced', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed', 'crème fraîche, plain Greek yogurt, or sour cream', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh basil, for serving', 'chopped fresh parsley', 'chopped fresh chives', 'chopped fresh dill', 'garlic, grated', 'cayenne pepper', 'each kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'heirloom tomatoes, sliced': '3-4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed': '1', 'crème fraîche, plain Greek yogurt, or sour cream': '2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': 'seasoning', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh parsley': '1/4', 'chopped fresh chives': '1/4', 'chopped fresh dill': '1/4', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'each kosher salt and black pepper': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. Arrange the tomatoes on a cutting board and sprinkle with salt. Let sit 15 minutes to draw out excess moisture.', '3. Meanwhile, make the ranch seasoning. Combine all ingredients in a bowl.', '4. title: Saucy Thai Summer Noodle Stir Fry with Sesame Peanuts
ingredients: ['wide rice noodles', 'sesame or extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'raw peanuts', 'raw sesame seeds', 'chili flakes', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'fish sauce', 'Thai red curry paste', 'ketchup', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, thinly sliced', 'red or orange bell peppers, thinly sliced', 'fresh Thai or regular basil, roughly torn', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'limes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'wide rice noodles': '8', 'sesame or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'honey': '1/4', 'raw peanuts': '1/2', 'raw sesame seeds': '2', 'chili flakes': '1/2', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced': '1', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '1/2', 'fish sauce': '1', 'Thai red curry paste': '2-3', 'ketchup': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, thinly sliced': '1', 'red or orange bell peppers, thinly sliced': '2', 'fresh Thai or regular basil, roughly torn': '1', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/3', 'limes, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Cook the rice noodles according to package directions.\xa0Drain.', '2. To make the peanuts. Heat the 1 tablespoon oil, 1 tablespoon honey, the peanuts, sesame seeds, and chili flakes in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook until lightly toasted and caramelized, 3-4 minutes. Watch closely. Spoon the peanuts out of the skillet onto a parchment-lined plate. Sprinkle with salt. Set aside.', '3. To make the sauce. Combine the remaining 1/4 cup honey, the soy sauce, fish sauce, curry paste, and ketchup.', '4. Wipe the skillet clean. Heat the oil over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken, season with pepper, and brown all over, until it becomes crispy, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and ginger, cook another 2-3 minutes, until the garlic is fragrant. Pour in 1/3 of the sauce and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook until the sauce coats the chicken, 2-3 minutes. Add the zucchini and bell peppers, cook another 5 minutes, until the vegetables have softened. Pour in the remaining sauce and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Stir in the noodles, basil, and cilantro. Toss to combine, cooking another 5 minutes until the sauce coats the noodles.', '5. Serve the noodles topped with sesame peanuts, additional basil, and lime juice.']

title: Brown Butter Corn and Feta Orzo with Crispy Prosciutto
ingredients: ['dry orzo pasta', 'prosciutto, torn', 'salted butter', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'shallot, finely chopped', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh lemon juice', 'champagne or apple cider vinegar', 'honey', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped', 'fresh chopped chives', 'grilled or steamed corn, kernels removed from the cobb', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'avocados, sliced']
ingredients with measurement: {'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'prosciutto, torn': '3', 'salted butter': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'shallot, finely chopped': '1', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh lemon juice': '2', 'champagne or apple cider vinegar': '2', 'honey': '2', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'fresh chopped chives': '1/4', 'grilled or steamed corn, kernels removed from the cobb': '4', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '2', 'crumbled feta cheese': '8', 'avocados, sliced': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pasta to al dente, according to package directions. Drain and add the pasta right back to the pot.', '2. Meanwhile, cook the prosciutto in a large skillet set over medium heat until crispy, about 2 minutes per side. Remove the prosciutto from the skillet.', '3. To the skillet, add the butter. Allow the butter to brown until it smells toasted and is a deep golden color, about 3-4 minutes. Stir in the olive oil, shallot, jalapeño, and thyme. Cook 1-2 minutes, then remove from the heat. Pour the browned butter over the hot orzo. Toss to combine.', '4. To the orzo, add the basil, chives, lemon juice, vinegar, and honey. Season with salt and pepper and toss. Stir in the corn, tomatoes, and feta. Top the pasta with crispy prosciutto and avocado. Serve warm or at room temp.']

title: Thai Basil Sesame Cashew Chicken Chicken.
ingredients: ['sesame or extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'raw cashews', 'chili powder', 'turmeric', 'zest of 1 lime', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced', 'corn starch or flour', 'black pepper', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'fish sauce', 'chili paste (sambal oelek)', 'ketchup', 'raw sesame seeds', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'red or orange bell peppers, thinly sliced', 'fresh Thai or regular basil, roughly torn', 'steamed white or brown rice, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'honey': '1/4', 'raw cashews': '1/2', 'chili powder': '1/2', 'turmeric': '1/2', 'zest of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced': '1', 'corn starch or flour': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '1/2', 'fish sauce': '1', 'chili paste (sambal oelek)': '1-2', 'ketchup': '2', 'raw sesame seeds': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'red or orange bell peppers, thinly sliced': '2', 'fresh Thai or regular basil, roughly torn': '1', 'steamed white or brown rice, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the cashews. Heat 1 tablespoon oil, 1 tablespoon honey, the cashews, chili, powder, and turmeric in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook until lightly toasted and caramelized, 3-4 minutes. Watch closely. Spoon the cashews out of the skillet onto a parchment-lined plate. Sprinkle with lime zest and salt. Set aside.', '2. In a medium bowl, toss together the chicken, cornstarch, and a pinch of black pepper.', '3. To make the sauce. Combine the remaining 1/4 cup honey, the soy sauce, fish sauce, chili paste, ketchup, and sesame seeds.', '4. Wipe the skillet clean. Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and brown all over, until it becomes crispy, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic, ginger, and peppers, cook another 2-3 minutes, until the garlic is fragrant. Pour in the sauce and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook until the sauce coats the chicken, about 5 minutes.', '5. Remove from the heat and stir in the basil. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of rice. Top with cashews, additional basil, and cucumbers, if desired. Enjoy!']

title: Browned Garlic Butter Creamed Corn Ravioli
ingredients: ['cheese ravioli, homemade or store bought', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'ears corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'medium shallot, chopped', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh chopped thyme, plus more for serving', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'heavy cream, canned coconut milk, or whole milk', 'grated parmesan or Asiago cheese', 'fresh basil, plus more for serving', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese or crumbled blue cheese', 'grated parmesan', 'kosher salt black pepper', 'fresh pasta dough']
ingredients with measurement: {'cheese ravioli, homemade or store bought': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ears corn, kernels removed from the cob': '3-4', 'medium shallot, chopped': '1', 'salted butter': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh chopped thyme, plus more for serving': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'heavy cream, canned coconut milk, or whole milk': '1/3', 'grated parmesan or Asiago cheese': '1/3', 'fresh basil, plus more for serving': '1/3', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded fontina cheese or crumbled blue cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan': '1/2', 'kosher salt black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh pasta dough': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the ravioli according to package directions until al dente. Drain the ravioli.', '2. Meanwhile, add the olive oil to a large skillet set over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, the add the shallots and corn. Cook 5 minutes or until the corn is golden. Add the butter, garlic, thyme, and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the butter begins to brown and the corn begins to crisp, about 3-4 minutes.\xa0Season with salt, pepper, and crushed red pepper flakes. Remove 1-2 large spoonfuls of the corn and butter from the skillet for topping, set aside.', '3. Reduce the heat to low. Pour in the wine and simmer 2 minutes. Add the cream and parmesan, cook another few minutes until warmed through. Drop the ravioli into the sauce, gently tossing to combine. Remove from the heat and add the basil.', '4. Divide the ravioli between plates and top with the reserved corn plus fresh basil and thyme.']

title: Grilled Chicken Shawarma with Golden Butter Fries and Garlic Sauce
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite size chunks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'ground turmeric', 'garlic, grated', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'shallots, halved', 'plain Greek yogurt or avocado mayo', 'mixed herbs, such as mint and dill, chopped', 'russet potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'ground turmeric', 'cayenne pepper', 'garlic, skin on and smashed', 'kosher salt', 'salted butter']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite size chunks': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'garlic, grated': '6', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shallots, halved': '4', 'plain Greek yogurt or avocado mayo': '1', 'mixed herbs, such as mint and dill, chopped': '1/2', 'russet potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks': '4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4-1/2', 'garlic, skin on and smashed': '4', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the chicken, 1/4 cup olive oil, the paprika, cumin, turmeric, 4 cloves garlic, lemon juice, lemon zest, crushed red pepper, and a large pinch of salt. Toss to coat. Marinate for 15 minutes or up to overnight in the fridge.', '2. Meanwhile, make the fries. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Place the potatoes on a large baking sheet and toss with olive oil, turmeric, cayenne, smashed garlic cloves and a large pinch of salt. Spread the fries in an even layer. Do not overcrowd the pan, if needed, divide the fries between 2 baking sheets. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, then flip and bake for 15 minutes more. Add the butter, toss, and return to the oven for another 5 minutes. You want the potatoes to be tender, yet crispy.', '3. To make the garlic sauce, combine the yogurt, 2 cloves grated garlic (see note), and 2-3 tablespoons lemon juice. Season with salt. Taste, adding more of the lemon as desired.', '4. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat. Take skewers and thread the chicken pieces on.\xa0Grill the skewers until lightly charred and cooked through, turning them occasionally throughout cooking, about 10 to 12 minutes total.\xa0During the same time, grill the shallots for 2-3 minutes per side. Alternately, you can roast the chicken at 400 degrees for 20-30 minutes.', '5. In a bowl, combine the remaining 3 tablespoons olive oil, the mixed herbs, and a pinch of salt. Add the shallots, tossing to coat.', '6. Serve the chicken topped with garlic sauce and herb oil. Add the fries on the side with naan. Enjoy!']

title: Greek Salmon with Lemon Feta and Orzo Summer Salad.
ingredients: ['salmon fillets', 'balsamic vinegar', 'smoked paprika', 'chopped fresh oregano (or 1 tablespoon dried oregano)', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'lemons, sliced and seeds removed - use to your taste', 'feta cheese, crumbled', 'fresh basil, dill, and or mint, chopped', 'cooked orzo', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh basil, dill, and or chives, chopped', 'roasted red pepper, chopped', 'chickpeas', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'green olives', 'cucumber', 'avocado, diced']
ingredients with measurement: {'salmon fillets': '4', 'balsamic vinegar': '1', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'chopped fresh oregano (or 1 tablespoon dried oregano)': '2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'lemons, sliced and seeds removed - use to your taste': '1-2', 'feta cheese, crumbled': '8', 'fresh basil, dill, and or mint, chopped': '1/2', 'cooked orzo': '3', 'fresh basil, dill, and or chives, chopped': '1', 'roasted red pepper, chopped': '1', 'chickpeas': '1', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '2', 'green olives': '1/2', 'cucumber': '1/2', 'avocado, diced': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Place the salmon in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Add 3 tablespoons olive oil, the balsamic vinegar, paprika, oregano, shallot, garlic, and a pinch each of crushed red pepper, salt, and pepper. Rub the seasonings and oil evenly into flesh. Toss the lemon slices into the oil.', '2. To make the salad. Add the orzo, olive oil, juice of 1 lemon, herbs, and a pinch each of crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper to a large serving bowl. Add the chickpeas, red peppers, tomatoes, olives, and avocado, toss to combine.', '3. Heat your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium high heat. Place the salmon on the grill, skin side down. Add the lemon slices. Cover and cook until skin is lightly charred, 4-5 minutes, flip the salmon and lemons, grill another 3-4 minutes until opaque. Remove everything from the grill.', '4. Finely chop the lemon slices and mix them with the herbs, crumbled feta, and 3 tablespoons olive oil. Add a couple of spoonfuls of the feta to the orzo salad.', '5. Divide the salad between plates. Add the salmon and sprinkle with lemon feta. Top with lots of fresh herbs, and an extra squeeze of lemon, if desired. Enjoy!']

title: Mac and Cheese Stuffed Oven Fried Zucchini Bites
ingredients: ['elbow pasta', 'salted butter', 'all-purpose flour', 'whole milk', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'shredded havarti cheese', 'mustard powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'panko bread crumbs', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'paprika', 'large eggs, beaten', 'medium zucchini, cut into 1/4 inch rounds', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling']
ingredients with measurement: {'elbow pasta': '1/2', 'salted butter': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '4', 'whole milk': '1 1/2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/4', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1/2', 'shredded havarti cheese': '1/2', 'mustard powder': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'panko bread crumbs': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'paprika': '1/2', 'large eggs, beaten': '3', 'medium zucchini, cut into 1/4 inch rounds': '2-3', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Whisk in 2 tablespoons flour. Reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 1 minute, stirring to avoid burning—it will bubble. Gradually whisk in the milk and 1 cup of water, then stir in the macaroni. Increase the heat to medium-high and bring the mixture to a boil. Stir frequently until the macaroni is just al dente, 8 to 10 minutes. If the sauce thicken too quickly, add 1/2 additional water.', '2. When the macaroni is al dente, remove the pan from the heat and stir in the cheddar, fontina, Havarti, mustard, and cayenne. Season with salt and pepper. Stir until the cheeses have fully melted. Let cool. Transfer to the fridge to chill 2 hours or place in the freezer 30-45 minutes, until cold.', '3. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.', '4. Place the panko, parmesan, 2 tablespoons flour, and the paprika in a shallow bowl. Add the eggs to a separate bowl. Scoop out 1 tablespoon of mac and cheese and pack it into a ball. Sandwich the mac and cheese between 2 zucchini slices, secure with 2 toothpicks.', '5. Dredge the stuffed zucchini bites through the egg, and then through the panko mix, tossing to coat entirely. Place onto the prepared baking sheet. Repeat until all the bites are breaded. Make sure not to crowd your pans.', "6. Brush/drizzling the bites with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden and crisp. Some of the bite may break in half, it's OK, they will still be delicious. Serve while hot with your favorite dipping sauces and or fresh herbs."]

title: Pesto Chicken Caesar Salad with Tomatoes and Burrata
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling', 'torn ciabatta bread', 'garlic, smashed', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite size chunks', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper', 'shredded romaine lettuce', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh herbs, for serving, such as chives, thyme, and basil', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'juice of 2 lemons', 'tahini', 'dijon mustard', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'garlic, grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'grated parmesan']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling': '2', 'torn ciabatta bread': '2', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite size chunks': '1', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shredded romaine lettuce': '6', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '2', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'fresh herbs, for serving, such as chives, thyme, and basil': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'juice of 2 lemons': 'seasoning', 'tahini': '1/4', 'dijon mustard': '2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'grated parmesan': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. To make the croutons. Heat the olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the bread and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally until golden and toasted all over, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and season with salt. Slide bread crumbs onto a plate, discard the garlic.', '2.To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Taste and adjust the salt and pepper.', '3. To make the chicken. In a bowl, combine the chicken, pesto, crushed red pepper flakes, and a large pinch of salt. Set your grill, grill pan or skillet to medium-high heat. Take skewers and thread the chicken pieces on.\xa0Alternately, you can cook the chicken in a skillet until browned all over.', '4. Grill the skewers until lightly charred and cooked through, turning them occasionally throughout cooking, about 10 to 12 minutes total.', '6. Assemble the salad. Add the romaine, tomatoes, croutons, chicken, croutons, and dressing. Toss to combine. Once the salad has been tossed, top with burrata, drizzle with oil, season with salt, pepper, and fresh herbs. Serve immediately.']

title: Spicy Coconut Basil Chicken Curry with Garden Vegetables.
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced', 'yellow curry powder', 'ground turmeric', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'zucchini or summer squash, diced', 'sweet corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'medium shallots, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'coconut milk', 'juice and zest from 1/2 a lemon', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'fresh basil, roughly torn', 'cooked basmati rice', 'toasted sesame seeds']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced': '1', 'yellow curry powder': '1 1/2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4-1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'zucchini or summer squash, diced': '2', 'sweet corn, kernels removed from the cob': '2', 'medium shallots, chopped': '2-3', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'coconut milk': '1', 'juice and zest from 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh basil, roughly torn': '1/4', 'cooked basmati rice': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a medium bowl, toss together the chicken, curry powder, turmeric, cayenne, 1 tablespoon oil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '2. Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and brown all over, about 5 minutes. Add the zucchini, corn, shallots, garlic, and ginger. Season with crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook the veggies another 5-10 minutes or until they just begin to soften.', '3. Stir in the coconut milk and 1/3-1/2 cup water. Stir to combine, bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, cook 5-10 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. If the sauce thickens too much, add additional water to thin. Remove from the heat and stir in the lemon juice and zest, cilantro, and basil.', '4. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and spoon the curry overtop. Top with sesame seeds and fresh herbs. Enjoy!']

title: Chipotle BBQ Shrimp Tacos with Creamy Ranch Slaw.
ingredients: ['sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'juice from 2 limes', 'kosher salt', 'shredded cabbage', 'chopped fresh chives', 'large shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'chipotle chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'warmed corn or flour tortillas, for serving', 'mango, diced', 'avocado, diced', 'jalapeńo, seeded and chopped', 'juice and zest from 1 lime']

title: Garden Greens Goddess Pizza.
ingredients: ['pizza dough, homemade or store-bought', 'basil pesto', 'chopped or shredded kale', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'creamy goat cheese, crumbled', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'zucchini or summer squash, shaved into ribbons', 'fresh basil leaves, roughly torn', 'fresh basil', 'fresh dill or mint', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'roasted shelled pistachios', 'shredded pecorino or parmesan cheese', 'juice of 1 lemon']
ingredients with measurement: {'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'basil pesto': '1/2', 'chopped or shredded kale': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'creamy goat cheese, crumbled': '6', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1/2', 'zucchini or summer squash, shaved into ribbons': '1', 'fresh basil leaves, roughly torn': '1/2', 'fresh basil': '2', 'fresh dill or mint': '1/2', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired': '1', 'roasted shelled pistachios': '3', 'shredded pecorino or parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Grease a large baking sheet with olive oil.', '2. Make the pesto, if using homemade. In a blender or food processor, combine all ingredients and pulse until smooth. Taste and add salt as needed. Keep stored in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.', '3. On a lightly floured surface, push/roll the dough out until it is pretty thin (about a 10-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to the prepared baking sheet.', '4. Spread the dough with pesto, top evenly with kale, and drizzle with olive oil. Season lightly with salt and a pinch of crushed red pepper flakes. Top with crumbled goat cheese and fontina cheese. Arrange the zucchini ribbons over the cheese, drizzle lightly with olive oil and season with salt.', '5. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. Top the pizza with fresh basil and crushed red pepper flakes. ENJOY!']

title: Skillet Cheesy Pizza Chicken
ingredients: ['plain Greek yogurt or buttermilk', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'shredded parmesan cheese', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'dry mozzarella cheese, torn', 'fresh basil, plus more for serving', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'dried oregano', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'tomato paste', 'vodka', 'fresh cherry tomatoes', 'pepperoni']
ingredients with measurement: {'plain Greek yogurt or buttermilk': '1/4', 'Panko bread crumbs': '1 1/3', 'shredded parmesan cheese': '2/3', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'dry mozzarella cheese, torn': '8', 'fresh basil, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'dried oregano': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'tomato paste': '2', 'vodka': '1/2', 'fresh cherry tomatoes': '2 1/2', 'pepperoni': '3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Place the yogurt in shallow bowl. Add the Panko and parmesan to a separate shallow bowl. Season the crumbs with salt and pepper.', '2. Slice the chicken through the middle horizontally to within a 1/2 inch of the other side. Open the two sides and spread them out like an open book.\xa0Layer a handful of mozzarella on 1 side, then place a basil leaf over the cheese. Close the chicken sides like a book, covering the filling (see above photos). Dredge both sides of the chicken through the yogurt and then through the Panko, pressing gently to adhere. Place the chicken on a plate.', '3. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and cook until the bottom side is golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Carefully flip the chicken and cook until golden brown on the other side, 3-4 minutes. Transfer to a plate and season with salt.', '4. To the skillet, add the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil, the garlic, oregano, and crushed red pepper flakes. Cook until the garlic is fragrant, about 2 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, stir in the tomato paste. Add the vodka, 1/2 cup water, and 1 1/2 cups of cherry tomatoes, cook 5-8 minutes, then remove from the heat.', '5. Place the chicken on top of the cherry tomatoes. Arrange the remaining cheese around the chicken. Top with pepperoni slices. Transfer to the oven and bake 10 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through and the cheese is melted.', '6. Serve the chicken topped with the remaining cherry tomatoes and fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: 30 Minute Sticky Thai Meatballs with Sesame Noodles
ingredients: ['cornstarch', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'sambal oelek', 'zest and juice of 1 lime, plus more for serving', 'ground chicken, pork, or turkey', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'black pepper', 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'medium shallots, sliced or chopped', 'red or orange bell peppers, chopped', 'raw peanuts', 'fresh basil and or cilantro, roughly torn', 'rice noodles', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'diced mango or mango chili sauce, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'cornstarch': '1', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/3', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'honey': '2', 'sambal oelek': '2-3', 'zest and juice of 1 lime, plus more for serving': 'seasoning', 'ground chicken, pork, or turkey': '1', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra-virgin olive oil': '3', 'medium shallots, sliced or chopped': '2', 'red or orange bell peppers, chopped': '2', 'raw peanuts': '1/4', 'fresh basil and or cilantro, roughly torn': '1/2', 'rice noodles': '8', 'toasted sesame seeds': '1', 'diced mango or mango chili sauce, for serving': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a glass jar, whisk together 1/3 cup cold water and the cornstarch. Add the soy sauce, rice vinegar, honey, chili paste, lime zest, and lime juice.', '2. Add the chicken, ginger, garlic, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Mix until combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-20 meatballs).', '3. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add 2 tablespoons oil. When the oil shimmers, add the meatballs and sear until crisp, about 4-5 minutes, turning them 2-3 times. Remove the meatballs from the skillet. To the skillet, add the shallots, peppers, and peanuts, cook another 2-3 minutes, until the peppers begin to char. Pour in the honey/soy sauce mix. Add back the meatballs. Bring the sauce to a boil over medium-high heat and cook until the sauce thickens slightly, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the basil.', '4. Meanwhile, cook rice noodles according to packaged directions. Drain and toss with a couple drizzles of olive oil and the sesame seeds.', '5. To serve, divide the noodles among bowls and top with meatballs. Serve with additional herbs, limes, and mango chili sauce (if desired). Enjoy']

title: Cauliflower Gnocchi with Crispy Zucchini and Whipped Goat Cheese
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh basil, finely chopped', 'cauliflower or potato gnocchi, homemade or store-bought', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, thinly sliced', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'lemon zest and 1 tablespoon juice', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'goat cheese or feta cheese', 'fresh basil, dill, and or chives, for serving', 'cauliflower florets', 'all-purpose flour, use more as needed', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '1', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '2', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'fresh basil, finely chopped': '1/2', 'cauliflower or potato gnocchi, homemade or store-bought': '1', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, thinly sliced': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'lemon zest and 1 tablespoon juice': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'goat cheese or feta cheese': '8', 'fresh basil, dill, and or chives, for serving': 'seasoning', 'cauliflower florets': '4-5', 'all-purpose flour, use more as needed': '3/4-1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '3/4', 'kosher salt': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add 2 tablespoons olive oil, the garlic, the breadcrumbs, and basil. Cook, stirring occasionally until the breadcrumbs are toasted all over, about 3 minutes. Add the cheese and cook another 2 minutes, until fried. Remove the breadcrumbs from the skillet. Season with salt and pepper. Set the breadcrumbs aside.', '2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the gnocchi until they float to the top and are cooked through, about 3-4 minutes. Drain.', '3. Place the skillet back over medium heat. Add the remaining 1/4 cup olive oil and the shallots. Cook until the shallots begin to caramelize, about 5 minutes.\xa0Add the zucchini and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally until the zucchini has caramelized and is golden brown, 5-8 minutes. Add the butter, the thyme, lemon zest, and red pepper flakes. Cook until the butter begins to brown, 3-4 minutes.\xa0Drop the gnocchi into the sauce, gently tossing to combine. Remove from the heat.', '4. To make the goat cheese, combine the goat cheese, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and the lemon juice in a food processor and pulse until smooth and creamy. The cheese can be kept in the fridge for up to 3 days.', '5. Spread the goat cheese into the bottom of each individual serving bowl. Spoon the gnocchi and sauce over the cheese. Top with breadcrumbs and herbs. Scoop the gnocchi up with the goat cheese and the sauce. EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Crockpot Carne Asada Tacos with Cilantro Lime Garlic Sauce
ingredients: ['flank steak', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chipotle chili powder', 'onion powder', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'zest and juice of 1 lime', 'Mexican beer, such as Negra Modelo', 'honey', 'warmed corn or flour tortillas,', 'avocado, feta cheese, jalapeños, pickled onion, and shredded lettuce, for serving', 'potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chipotle chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt', 'zest and juice of 1 lime', 'garlic, grated', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped', 'green onions, finely chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'flank steak': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'chipotle chili powder': '1', 'onion powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'zest and juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'Mexican beer, such as Negra Modelo': '1/2', 'honey': '1', 'warmed corn or flour tortillas,': 'seasoning', 'avocado, feta cheese, jalapeños, pickled onion, and shredded lettuce, for serving': 'seasoning', 'potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks': '4', 'garlic powder': '1', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped': '1/2', 'green onions, finely chopped': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your slow cooker, combine the steak, garlic, chili powder, onion powder, paprika, pinch of salt, olive oil, lime juice and zest. Rub the seasonings into the steak. Add the beer. Cover and cook on low for 6 hours or on high for 3-4 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the steak from the sauce to a baking sheet. Let rest 10 minutes. Lightly shred. Add 1/2 cup of the cooking liquid, then drizzle on the honey. Transfer to the broiler. Broil for 2-5 minutes, until the streak caramelizes. Watch closely! Toss with additional cooking liquid, if desired.', '3. Meanwhile, make the fries. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '4. Place the potatoes on a large baking sheet and toss with olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic powder, and a large pinch of salt. Spread the fries in an even layer. Do not overcrowd the pan, if needed, divide the fries between 2 baking sheets. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, then flip and bake for 15 minutes more.', '5. To make the sauce. Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix until combined. Season with salt.', '6. Stuff the carne asada into the warmed tortillas. Top as desired with cilantro, lettuce, avocado, fries, cheese, and additional sauce. Enjoy!']

title: Lebanese Chicken with Charred Lemon Cauliflower.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'tomato paste', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'zest and juice of 1/2 a lemon', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite size chunks', 'large head of cauliflower, cut into florets', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'lemons, 1 quartered, 1 juiced', 'fresh parsley, cilantro, and or dill, chopped', 'green olives, roughly chopped', 'red wine vinegar', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'toasted pumpkin seeds and/or sunflower seeds', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'garlic, grated']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'tomato paste': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '6', 'zest and juice of 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite size chunks': '2', 'large head of cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'lemons, 1 quartered, 1 juiced': '2', 'fresh parsley, cilantro, and or dill, chopped': '1', 'green olives, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'red wine vinegar': '2', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '2', 'toasted pumpkin seeds and/or sunflower seeds': '1/2', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1', 'garlic, grated': '1-2'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the olive oil, tomato paste, paprika, garlic, lemon juice, lemon zest, crushed red pepper, and a large pinch of salt. Add the chicken and toss to coat. Marinate for 15 minutes or up to overnight in the fridge.', '2. Meanwhile, make the cauliflower. Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the cauliflower, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Arrange the lemons around the cauliflower. Transfer to the oven and roast for 10-15 minutes, or until tender and charred.', '3. Remove the charred lemon slices from the baking sheet. Finely chop the lemons, rind and all, discarding any of the seeds. Add half of the chopped lemon to a salad bowl. Add the parsley/cilantro, olives, red wine vinegar, and remaining 1/3 cup olive oil. Season with salt and crushed red pepper flakes. Add the cauliflower, cucumbers, and seeds, and toss well.', '4. To make the yogurt, combine the yogurt, grated garlic, and 2-3 tablespoons lemon juice. Season with salt. Taste, adding more of the lemon as desired.', '5. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat. Take skewers and thread the chicken pieces on.\xa0Grill the skewers until lightly charred and cooked through, turning them occasionally throughout cooking, about 10 to 12 minutes total.\xa0Alternately, you can roast the chicken at 400 degrees for 20-30 minutes.', '6. To serve, spread the yogurt sauce onto plates. Add the cauliflower salad and chicken. Top with fresh herbs and serve with naan. Enjoy!']

title: Thai Black Pepper Chicken and Garlic Noodles
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced', 'corn starch or flour', 'ground turmeric', 'ground ginger', 'black pepper, using more or less to your taste', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'rice noodles', 'medium shallots, sliced or chopped', 'small heads broccoli, chopped', 'raw cashews', 'zest and juice of 1 lime', 'fresh basil or cilantro, roughly chopped', 'salted butter', 'garlic finely chopped or grated', 'canned coconut milk']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced': '1', 'corn starch or flour': '2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'ground ginger': '1', 'black pepper, using more or less to your taste': '1-2', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'honey': '1/4', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'rice noodles': '8', 'medium shallots, sliced or chopped': '2', 'small heads broccoli, chopped': '2', 'raw cashews': '1/2', 'zest and juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'fresh basil or cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'salted butter': '3', 'garlic finely chopped or grated': '3-4', 'canned coconut milk': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. In a medium bowl, toss together the chicken, cornstarch, turmeric, ginger, black pepper, and 1 tablespoon oil.', '2. In a glass jar, combine the honey, soy sauce, rice vinegar, red pepper flakes, and 1/4 cup water.', '3. Cook rice noodles according to packaged directions.', '4. Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and brown all over, until it becomes crispy, about 5 minutes. Add the shallots, broccoli, and cashews, cook another 2-3 minutes, until the broccoli is charring. Pour in the honey/soy sauce mix. Bring the sauce to a boil over medium-high heat and cook until the sauce coats the chicken, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the lime zest, lime juice, and the basil.', '5. Meanwhile, heat a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the butter, garlic, and a pinch of red pepper flakes, if desired. Cook until the garlic begins to caramelize and turn light golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in the coconut milk, cooking 3-5 minutes, until warmed through.\xa0Remove from the heat and toss the noodles with the sauce.', '6. To serve, divide the noodles among bowls and top with chicken. Serve with additional basil and limes. Enjoy!']

title: Lemon Butter Cheese Ravioli with Garlic Basil Breadcrumbs.
