title: Crispy Chicken Tinga Taquitos with Lime Avocado Crema
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chipotle peppers in adobo', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt', 'red enchilada sauce', 'corn tortillas', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'pineapple salsa, shredded lettuce, and pickled onion, for serving', 'avocado, halved', 'fresh cilantro', 'garlic powder', 'pickled jalapeños', 'juice from 2 limes', 'kosher or flaky salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chipotle peppers in adobo': '2-3', 'dried oregano': '1/2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'red enchilada sauce': '1/2', 'corn tortillas': '16-20', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '2', 'pineapple salsa, shredded lettuce, and pickled onion, for serving': 'seasoning', 'avocado, halved': '1', 'fresh cilantro': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/4', 'juice from 2 limes': 'seasoning', 'kosher or flaky salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the ground chicken and onion. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until the chicken is browned, about 5 minutes. Add the chipotle peppers, oregano, and salt. Add the enchilada sauce and 1/4 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly around the chicken, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '3. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds to 1 minute in the microwave, until pliable. On a baking sheet, rub the tortillas with olive oil. Spoon 2 tablespoons of the chicken down the middle of the tortilla. Add a sprinkle of cheese, then roll up and place seam-side down on the baking sheet. Transfer to the oven and bake for 5-8 minutes, then flip and cook another 5 minutes more, or until the cheese has melted and the tortillas are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile, make the Lime Avocado Crema. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt.', '5. Serve the taquitos topped with avocado, pineapple salsa, and any other desired toppings.']

title: Simple Skillet Pesto Cheese Lasagna Roll Ups.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground beef, chicken, or ground spicy Italian sausage', 'red bell pepper, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'crushed San Marzano tomatoes', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'dried fennel seeds', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'uncooked lasagna noodles', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'basil pesto', 'sun-dried tomatoes', 'mozzarella, torn', 'fresh thyme or basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground beef, chicken, or ground spicy Italian sausage': '3/4', 'red bell pepper, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'crushed San Marzano tomatoes': '1', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'dried fennel seeds': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'uncooked lasagna noodles': '12', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'basil pesto': '3/4', 'sun-dried tomatoes': '1/2', 'mozzarella, torn': '4', 'fresh thyme or basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large, oven safe skillet. When the oil shimmers, add the ground meat and brown all over, about 5 to 8 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the bell pepper, garlic, oregano, thyme, fennel, crushed red pepper flakes, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes, until fragrant. Reduce the heat to low. Add the tomatoes and simmer 10 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly.', '3. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and boil the pasta until al dente. Drain and run under cold water to stop the cooking.', '4. In a medium bowl, combine the ricotta, fontina, 1/2 cup pesto, and sun-dried tomatoes.', '5. To assemble, spoon about 2 tablespoons of the cheese mix down the length of the noodle. Roll into a coil and place each seam-side down in the skillet as you go, snuggling the roll into the sauce. Repeat with remaining noodles. Drizzle the remaining 1/4 cup pesto evenly over everything. Add the mozzarella.', '6. Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake 15-20 minutes or until the cheese has melted and is lightly browned on top. Cool 5 minutes before serving. Serve with fresh basil and thyme, if desired. Enjoy!']

title: Baked Hot Honey Mustard Pretzel Chicken Fingers.
ingredients: ['dijon mustard', 'plain yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo', 'honey', 'boneless chicken tenders', 'finely crushed salted pretzel twists', 'each garlic and onion powder', 'smoked paprika', 'black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'ranch dressing', 'honey', 'salted butter', 'cayenne pepper', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'dijon mustard': '1/4', 'plain yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo': '1/4', 'honey': '1/4', 'boneless chicken tenders': '2', 'finely crushed salted pretzel twists': '2', 'each garlic and onion powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1/2', 'black pepper': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': 'seasoning', 'ranch dressing': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '3', 'cayenne pepper': '1', 'chili powder': '1/2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, whisk together the mustard, yogurt, and honey. Add the chicken and toss well to coat.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '3. Add the pretzel crumbs, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika and a pinch of pepper to a medium sized bowl. Stir to combine.', '4. Remove each piece of chicken from the honey mustard, and dredge through the crumbs, pressing gently to adhere. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat until all the chicken has been used. Make sure not to crowd your pan, if necessary use two baking sheets. Lightly brush/drizzle the chicken with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '5. Meanwhile, make the spicy honey sauce. Melt together the honey, butter, cayenne, chili powder, paprika, and a pinch of salt.', "6. Serve the chicken topped with flaky salt and spicy honey sauce for dipping. I'd add a side of ranch too. Enjoy!"]

title: Crispy Rice Bowl with Browned Butter Sweet Potatoes and Herby Green Tahini
ingredients: ['sweet potatoes, sliced in half lengthwise', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'salted butter', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt', 'zest of 1 lime', 'cooked white or brown rice', 'plain yogurt', 'fried or soft boiled eggs, for serving', 'sliced cucumbers and toasted sesame seeds, for serving', 'tahini', 'fresh basil or cilantro', 'chopped fresh chives', 'jalapeño, halved and seeded, if desired', 'apple cider vinegar', 'juice of 1 lemon']
ingredients with measurement: {'sweet potatoes, sliced in half lengthwise': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'honey': '2', 'salted butter': '4', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'zest of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'cooked white or brown rice': '3', 'plain yogurt': '2', 'fried or soft boiled eggs, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sliced cucumbers and toasted sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning', 'tahini': '1/2', 'fresh basil or cilantro': '1', 'chopped fresh chives': '2', 'jalapeño, halved and seeded, if desired': '1', 'apple cider vinegar': '2', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the sweet potatoes, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and a pinch of salt. Arrange the potatoes cut side down. Transfer to the oven and roast for 25 minutes, until for tender. Flip the potatoes over, drizzle on the honey and 2 tablespoons melted butter. Season with red pepper flakes. Return to the oven and roast until the potatoes are caramelized, about 10-15 additional minutes. Spoon the butter over the potatoes and zest the lime over each potato.', '2. Meanwhile, make the rice. Combine 1 cup of the rice with the yogurt.', '3. Melt together the remaining 2 tablespoons butter and 2 tablespoons oil in a 10-inch skillet set over medium heat. When the butter melts, add the yogurt coated rice and level it out with the back of your spoon. Pile the remaining rice into the pan. Cook the rice over medium heat, until you start to see a golden crust begin to form at the sides of the pan, about 15 minutes. Run a spatula along the edges of the pan to release the rice. Carefully flip the rice onto a plate.', '4. To make the sauce. Combine all ingredients and 1/4 cup water in a blender and blend until completely smooth. If needed, add water to thin the sauce to a drizzling consistency.', '5. To serve, divide the rice between bowls. Add the sweet potatoes, eggs, cucumbers, and additional herbs, if desired. Drizzle each bowl with herby green sauce and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Enjoy!']

title: One Skillet Cheesy Cuban Chicken Rice Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'red bell pepper, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'dried oregano', 'ground cumin', 'cayenne pepper', 'Kosher salt and black pepper', 'dry broken spaghetti or angel hair pasta', 'long grain rice', 'tomato paste', 'chopped pepperoncini or dill pickles', 'black beans', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving', 'zest and juice of 1 lime, plus more for serving', 'shredded swiss or mozzarella cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed': '1', 'red bell pepper, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'dried oregano': '2', 'ground cumin': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'dry broken spaghetti or angel hair pasta': '1/2', 'long grain rice': '1', 'tomato paste': '1/4', 'chopped pepperoncini or dill pickles': '2', 'black beans': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'zest and juice of 1 lime, plus more for serving': 'seasoning', 'shredded swiss or mozzarella cheese': '1-2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. In a large oven safe skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook 5 minutes. Stir in the chicken, bell pepper, garlic, oregano, cumin, cayenne, and season with salt and pepper. Cook another 5 minutes until the chicken is browned. Push the chicken and vegetables to one side of the skillet, add the pasta and rice, cook 1-2 minutes, until lightly toasted and golden. Stir in the tomato paste and cook another minute. Add 2 cups of water and the pepperoncini, if using. Bring to a boil. Place the lid on the skillet and turn the heat down to the lowest setting possible. Allow the rice to cook 15 minutes, until most of the liquid has cooked into the rice, but not all of it.', '3. Remove from the heat and stir in the beans, cilantro, lime zest, and lime juice. Sprinkle the cheese over the chicken/rice. Transfer to the oven and bake 10 minutes, until the cheese is melted.', '4. Serve topped as desired with avocado, cilantro, and additional lime. Enjoy!']

title: Slow Cooker Braised Hawaiian Pineapple Chicken Tacos
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breast, thighs, or a pork shoulder/butt', 'pineapple juice', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'honey', 'rice vinegar', 'organic ketchup', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'ground ginger', 'sambal oelek', 'fresh pineapple chunks', 'Gochujang', 'plain Greek yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo', 'juice from 1 lime', 'shredded cabbage', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped', 'warmed tortillas, crunchy Asian noodles and toasted sesame seeds, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breast, thighs, or a pork shoulder/butt': '2', 'pineapple juice': '1/2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/2', 'honey': '1/3', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'organic ketchup': '2', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '6', 'ground ginger': '2', 'sambal oelek': '1-2', 'fresh pineapple chunks': '2', 'Gochujang': '3-4', 'plain Greek yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo': '1/4', 'juice from 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'shredded cabbage': '3', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped': '1', 'warmed tortillas, crunchy Asian noodles and toasted sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your slow cooker, combine the chicken, pineapple juice, soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, ketchup, garlic, ginger, sambal oelek, and 1 cup pineapple chunks. Cover and cook on LOW for 6 hours or on HIGH for 3-4 hours. Once done cooking, switch the slow cooker to high. Cook, uncovered for 30 minutes, to thicken the sauce slightly.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the chicken from the sauce to a baking sheet. Lightly shred, then transfer to the broiler. Broil for 1-2 minutes, until the chicken caramelizes. Watch closely!', '3. Stir the caramelized meat back into the sauce.', '4.\xa0Meanwhile, make the yum yum sauce. Combine the Gochujang sauce with the yogurt and lime juice. Season with salt. This is the "yum yum" sauce.', '5. To make the slaw, add the cabbage, remaining 1 cup pineapple chunks, cilantro, and jalapeño to a bowl with a few spoonfuls of the yum yum sauce and toss to combine. Season with salt.', '6. Stuff the chicken into the warmed tortillas. Top with slaw, additional sauce, then add the crunchy noodles and a sprinkle of sesame seeds. Enjoy!']

title: No Stir Brie Risotto with Lemon Butter Asparagus
ingredients: ['chicken or vegetable broth', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'Japanese sushi rice or arborio rice', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'kosher salt', 'lemon zest, plus 3 tablespoons lemon juice', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'Brie, rind removed and cubed', 'asparagus, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken or vegetable broth': '6', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'salted butter': '5', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'Japanese sushi rice or arborio rice': '2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'lemon zest, plus 3 tablespoons lemon juice': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'Brie, rind removed and cubed': '8', 'asparagus, chopped': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Warm the broth until steaming.', '2. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil and 2 tablespoons butter in a large pot set over medium-high heat. Add 2 cloves garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.\xa0Stir in the rice, cook until lightly golden and toasted, 2-3 minutes. Add the wine and 1 teaspoon salt, continue to cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the wine has absorbed into the rice.\xa0Stir in 5 cups warm broth and bring to a boil over high heat, cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 15 minutes.', '3. Once done cooking, stir in the remaining 1 cup broth, the lemon juice, and parmesan, stirring until thickened, 3-4 minutes. Add the Brie chunks, stir, then remove from the heat. If the risotto thickens up on you, add additional warm broth to thin. It should be creamy, but with just a touch of liquid. Taste, and season with salt.', '4. While the risotto cooks, make the asparagus. Heat the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil and 3 tablespoons butter in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add 1 clove garlic, the lemon zest and thyme, cook until the garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in the asparagus, season with salt and pepper, and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '5. To serve, divide the risotto in bowls and spoon the asparagus over top. Season with fresh pepper. Enjoy!']

title: Potato and Wild Mushroom Burrata Pizza.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'wild mushrooms, roughly torn', 'fresh thyme', 'garlic, smashed', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'pizza dough, at room temperature', 'basil pesto', 'medium potato, very thinly sliced', 'fresh chopped rosemary', 'fresh lemon zest', 'shredded fontina or Havarti cheese', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh lemon micro basil or basil leaves']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'wild mushrooms, roughly torn': '2', 'fresh thyme': '3', 'garlic, smashed': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'pizza dough, at room temperature': '1/2', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'medium potato, very thinly sliced': '1', 'fresh chopped rosemary': '2', 'fresh lemon zest': '2', 'shredded fontina or Havarti cheese': '1', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'fresh lemon micro basil or basil leaves': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the olive oil, mushrooms, thyme, garlic, and a pinch each of salt and crushed red pepper flakes. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15 minutes, until the edges begin to crisp. Watch closely.', '2. Meanwhile, grease a large baking sheet with olive oil. On a lightly floured surface, push/roll the pizza dough out until it is pretty thin (about a\xa010-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to the prepared baking sheet. Spread the dough\xa0with pesto and top evenly with sliced potatoes, rosemary, and lemon zest. Drizzle lightly with olive oil, season with salt and pepper.', '3. Transfer the pizza to the oven and bake for 10 minutes. Remove from the oven and top with the fontina cheese and the roasted mushrooms. Allow the burrata to sit on the pizza and warm throughout, about 5 minutes. Top with basil. Enjoy!']

title: Weeknight Thai Peanut Chicken with Spicy Lime Mango
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts', 'Thai red curry paste', 'ground ginger', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh Thai basil or regular basil chopped', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving', 'full fat coconut milk', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'fish sauce', 'creamy peanut butter', 'juice of 1 lime', 'steamed rice, for serving', 'roasted peanuts and Persian cucumbers, for serving', 'mango, diced', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped', 'juice and zest from 1 lime']

title: Sheet Pan Chipotle Salmon with Cilantro Lime Special Sauce
ingredients: ['small sweet potatoes, cut into 1/4 inch rounds', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'red or orange bell pepper, sliced', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salmon fillets (5-6 ounces)', 'chipotle chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic, minced or grated, to your taste', 'the zest + juice from 1 lime', 'kale, spinach or arugula, roughly torn', 'cooked quinoa or brown rice', 'avocado, tortilla chips, feta cheese, for serving', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired', 'plain greek yogurt, olive oil mayo, or sour cream', 'juice of 1-2 limes, to your taste', 'honey', 'cilantro, roughly chopped', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'small sweet potatoes, cut into 1/4 inch rounds': '2', 'yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'red or orange bell pepper, sliced': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '6', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salmon fillets (5-6 ounces)': '4', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated, to your taste': '2-4', 'the zest + juice from 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'kale, spinach or arugula, roughly torn': '2-3', 'cooked quinoa or brown rice': '2-3', 'avocado, tortilla chips, feta cheese, for serving': 'seasoning', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired': '1', 'plain greek yogurt, olive oil mayo, or sour cream': '1/2', 'juice of 1-2 limes, to your taste': 'seasoning', 'honey': '2', 'cilantro, roughly chopped': '1', 'kosher salt': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. On a rimmed baking sheet, toss the potatoes, onions, bell pepper, and jalapeño pepper with 3 tablespoons olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Roast for about 20 minutes, or until tender.', '2.\xa0Place the salmon on a plate and rub with chipotle chili powder, paprika, garlic, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil, rubbing the seasonings and oil evenly into each filet.', '3. Remove the potatoes from oven and push them to one side of pan. To make the special sauce. De-seed the jalapeño, if desired. To a blender, add the yogurt, roasted\xa0jalapeño, juice of 2 limes, honey, and cilantro. Blend until smooth.\xa0Season with salt.', '5. To serve, toss the greens with 1 tablespoon oil, a squeeze of lime, and a pinch of salt. Divide the quinoa or brown rice between bowls. Top with salmon, potatoes, onions, peppers, kale, and avocado. title: Saucy Tahini Noodles with Honey'd Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: ['small sweet potatoes, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt', 'rice noodles', 'tahini', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'toasted sesame oil', 'honey', 'chili paste', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'juice from 1 lime', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'Tuscan kale spinach or bok choy, chopped', 'sliced cucumbers and toasted sesame seeds, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'small sweet potatoes, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'honey': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'rice noodles': '8', 'tahini': '1/2', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '1/2', 'toasted sesame oil': '2', 'chili paste': '1', 'fresh ginger, grated': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'juice from 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'Tuscan kale spinach or bok choy, chopped': '1', 'sliced cucumbers and toasted sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the sweet potatoes, 2 tablespoons olive oil, honey, crushed red pepper flakes, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Arrange in an even layer. Transfer to the oven and roast for 25-30 minutes, tossing halfway through cooking, until the potatoes are caramelized. During the last 5 minutes of cooking, add the greens to the sheet pan and toss with 1 tablespoon olive oil and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook until wilted.', '2. Meanwhile,\xa0bring a large pot of water to a boil. Cook the noodles according to package directions.', '3. Combine in a food processor the tahini, soy sauce, sesame oil, honey, chili paste, ginger, garlic, and 1/4 cup water. Pulse until combined and smooth, adding additional water as needed to thin the sauce. Pour the sauce over the hot noodles. Add the lime juice, basil, and cilantro, tossing to combine.', '4. Divide the noodles between bowls. Top with sweet potatoes and greens. Sprinkle on sesame seeds and finish with cucumbers. Enjoy warm or at room temp.']

title: Cauliflower Shawarma with Green Tahini and Fried Halloumi

ingredients with measurement: {'cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'chickpeas': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'chipotle chili powder': '1/2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'sesame seeds': '1', 'halloumi cheese, sliced': '8', 'plain hummus, homemade or store-bought': '2', 'naan, arugula, and cucumbers, for serving': 'seasoning', 'tahini': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro': '1/3', 'honey': '2', 'cumin': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning'}

title: Herbed Garlic Butter Scallops with Lemony Feta Dressing.

title: Better Than Takeout Sesame Ginger Chicken Fried Rice
ingredients: ['low sodium soy sauce', 'toasted sesame oil', 'hoisin sauce', 'chili flakes', 'eggs, beaten', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil', 'Kosher salt and black pepper', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, roughly torn', 'bok choy or 2 cups spinach, roughly chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic cloves, minced or grated', 'chicken breasts, cubed', 'cooked, day-old rice', 'fresh basil or cilantro, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'toasted sesame oil': '2', 'hoisin sauce': '2', 'chili flakes': '1-2', 'eggs, beaten': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil': '5', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, roughly torn': '2', 'bok choy or 2 cups spinach, roughly chopped': '4', 'green onions, chopped': '4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '2', 'garlic cloves, minced or grated': '4', 'chicken breasts, cubed': '1/2', 'cooked, day-old rice': '4', 'fresh basil or cilantro, chopped': '½'}
instructions: ['1. To make the sauce. In a small bowl, combine the soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, hoisin sauce, and chili flakes.', '2. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the eggs (if using), season with salt and pepper, and let cook until the edges start to set, 1-2 minutes. Roughly scramble the eggs. Remove from the heat and transfer to a plate.', '3. Return the skillet to medium-high heat. Add 2 tablespoons oil. When the oil shimmers add the mushrooms and cook, stirring occasionally, until the mushrooms are crisping on the edges, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and large pinch of pepper. Stir in the green onions, ginger, garlic, and bok choy. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until the mushrooms are caramelized. Remove from the heat and transfer the mushrooms and greens to the plate with the eggs.', '4. Return the skillet to medium-high heat and add the remaining 2 tablespoons oil. Add the chicken and cook until browned, 5 minutes. Stir in 2 tablespoons of the sauce, cook another 1-2 minutes. Add the rice and cook, stirring occasionally, until toasted, 4 to 5 minutes. Stir in the remaining sauce, toss, cook another 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in the mushroom, bok choy, and eggs. Remove from the heat. Add the basil or cilantro.', '5. Divide the rice amoung bowls and top with additional green onions.']

title: Extra Flaky Broccoli Cheddar Soup Mini Pies
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'small yellow onion, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'roughly chopped broccoli florets', 'cremini mushrooms, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'freshly grated nutmeg', 'cayenne pepper', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded Havarti cheese', 'frozen puff pastry, thawed', 'egg, beaten', 'everything bagel spice, for sprinkling']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'small yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'roughly chopped broccoli florets': '3', 'cremini mushrooms, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'freshly grated nutmeg': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4-1/2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded Havarti cheese': '1/2', 'frozen puff pastry, thawed': '1', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'everything bagel spice, for sprinkling': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add the broccoli, mushrooms (if using), and season with salt and pepper. Continue cooking another 5-10 minutes or until the broccoli begins to char. Add the garlic, thyme, nutmeg, and cayenne, cook another minute.\xa0Remove from the heat.', '3. Stir in the cream cheese, 1 cup cheddar, and Havarti cheese.', '4. Lay the pastry sheets flat on a clean, floured surface. Gently roll the sheets out to stretch slightly. Cut each sheet into 9 squares. Evenly divide the broccoli filling among half of the squares, leaving a 1/4 inch border around the edges. Brush the edges with egg. Lay the remaining 9 squares over the filling and seal the edges by crimping with the back of a fork.', '5. Place the squares on the prepared baking sheet and brush the tops with beaten egg. Make 2 small slits on the top of the pastries. Sprinkle with the remaining 1/2 cup cheddar cheese and the everything spice, if desired. Transfer to the oven and bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.', '6. Serve warm, topped with additional thyme.']

title: 30 Minute Creamy Sesame Miso Ramen with Crispy Mushrooms.

title: Weeknight Cheesy Baked Chipotle Chicken Tacos with Cilantro Lime Ranch.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chipotle chili powder, use to your taste', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'garlic powder', 'crushed red pepper, use to your taste', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'hard shell tacos', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped + 2 tablespoons brine', 'juice from 2 limes', 'kosher salt']

title: Roasted Red Pepper Alla Vodka Pasta with Cheesy Oregano Breadcrumbs.

title: Souper Creamy Golden Rice with Spiced Chickpeas
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'ground turmeric', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'long grain rice, such as jasmine or basmati', 'full fat coconut milk', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth', 'kosher salt, plus more as needed', 'roughly torn greens such, as kale, chard, or spinach', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chickpeas, drained and patted dry', 'garlic, thinly sliced or smashed', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'ground ginger', 'unsweetened flaked coconut', 'raw sesame seeds', 'fresh mint or cilantro', 'toasted naan, Greek yogurt, and red harissa sauce, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '4', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'long grain rice, such as jasmine or basmati': '1 1/2', 'full fat coconut milk': '1', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth': '2-2 1/2', 'kosher salt, plus more as needed': '1', 'roughly torn greens such, as kale, chard, or spinach': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'chickpeas, drained and patted dry': '1', 'garlic, thinly sliced or smashed': '2-4', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'ground ginger': '1/2', 'unsweetened flaked coconut': '1/2', 'raw sesame seeds': '2', 'fresh mint or cilantro': '1/2', 'toasted naan, Greek yogurt, and red harissa sauce, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the rice. Melt the butter, turmeric, and crushed red pepper flakes in a medium pot over high heat. Add the rice and toss to coat. Stir in 1 1/2 cups of broth, the coconut milk, and a pinch of salt and bring to a boil. Add the greens on top of the rice, but do not stir. Place the lid on the pot and turn the heat down to the lowest setting possible. Allow the rice to cook ten minutes on low and then turn the heat off completely. Add the oil, chickpeas, garlic, shallots, ginger, and a pinch of red pepper flakes and salt. Cook, stirring occasionally until the chickpeas are crisped all over, about 8-10 minutes. Add the coconut flakes and sesame seeds, tossing to combine. Cook 2 minutes, until toasted, remove from the heat.', '3. When the rice is cooked, switch the heat onto low, add additional broth 1/2 cup at a time until the rice is creamy, but with just a touch of liquid. Taste, adding salt as needed.', '4. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and spoon the chickpeas overtop. Serve with naan, yogurt, and fresh mint or cilantro. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Korean Chicken Bowls with Sweet Potatoes and Yum Yum Sauce.
ingredients: ['medium sweet potatoes, cut into 1 inch cubes', 'toasted sesame or extra virgin olive oil', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'Gochujang', 'honey', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, grated', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'plain Greek yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo', 'kale, roughly torn', 'juice from 1 lime', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'steamed white or brown rice', 'kimichi, avocado, shredded carrots, green onions, sliced cucumbers, and radishes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium sweet potatoes, cut into 1 inch cubes': '2', 'toasted sesame or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'Gochujang': '3-4', 'honey': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'plain Greek yogurt, sour cream, or olive oil mayo': '1/4', 'kale, roughly torn': '2-3', 'juice from 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'steamed white or brown rice': '3', 'kimichi, avocado, shredded carrots, green onions, sliced cucumbers, and radishes, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. On a rimmed baking sheet, toss the sweet potatoes with 1 tablespoon oil, salt, and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20 minutes.', '2. To make the Gochujang sauce. In a glass jar, combine the soy sauce, Gochujang, honey, ginger, garlic, 1 tablespoon oil, and the sesame seeds.', '3. Add the chicken to a bowl and toss with half of the Gochujang sauce. Remove the potatoes from the oven and slide them to 1 side of the pan. Add the chicken and any sauce left in the bowl to the other side. Return to the oven and continue roasting another 15 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. During the last 2-3 minutes of cooking, switch the oven to broil and broil until the chicken chars on the edges and the sauce sticks to the chicken. Watch closely, the broiler can burn food fast.', '3. Meanwhile, combine 2-3 tablespoons of the remaining Gochujang sauce with the yogurt. Season with salt. This is the "yum yum" sauce. Reserve any remaining Gochujang sauce for serving.', '5. In a bowl, toss the kale with 1 tablespoon oil, the lime juice, and a pinch of salt. Toss in the cilantro.', '6. To serve, divide the rice between bowls. Top with chicken, potatoes, kale, and avocado. Add additional toppings as desired. Serve drizzled with the "Yum Yum" sauce.']

title: Skillet Baked Creamy Pesto Spinach and Artichoke Gnocchi.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'sweet onion, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'dried oregano', 'fennel seed', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'uncooked potato gnocchi', 'fresh baby spinach or roughly torn kale', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'canned full fat coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk', 'basil pesto', 'marinated, quartered artichokes, drained', 'shredded provolone or fontina cheese', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon', 'fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'sweet onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'dried oregano': '1', 'fennel seed': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/4-1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'uncooked potato gnocchi': '1', 'fresh baby spinach or roughly torn kale': '3', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/3', 'canned full fat coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk': '3/4', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'marinated, quartered artichokes, drained': '1', 'shredded provolone or fontina cheese': '1/2', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Heat olive oil in a large oven-safe skillet set over medium-high heat. When the oil is shimmering, add the onion, cooking until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic, oregano, fennel seed, and crushed red pepper flakes, cooking until lightly golden, 2-3 minutes. Stir in the gnocchi, spinach or kale, wine, and 1 cup water. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, cook 3-5 minutes, until the gnocchi is soft. Add the cream, pesto, and artichokes, cooking another 5 minutes. Remove from the heat. Top with cheese.', '3. Transfer to the oven and cook, uncovered for 10 minutes, until the cheese is melted and the sauce is bubbling. Serve topped with lemon zest and juice, and basil, if desired.']

title: Better Than Takeout Garlic Butter Shrimp Pad Thai.
ingredients: ['wide rice noodles', 'low sodium soy sauce, using more or less to taste', 'fish sauce', 'white vinegar', 'honey or maple', 'chili flakes, plus more for serving', 'raw jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'peanut oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'salted butter', 'eggs, beaten', 'bean sprouts or chopped baby bok coy', 'green onions, chopped, plus more for serving', 'roasted peanuts, chopped', 'Thai or regular basil and limes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'wide rice noodles': '8', 'low sodium soy sauce, using more or less to taste': '3-4', 'fish sauce': '2', 'white vinegar': '2', 'honey or maple': '3', 'chili flakes, plus more for serving': '1/4-1', 'raw jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined': '1', 'peanut oil or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '4-6', 'salted butter': '3', 'eggs, beaten': '2-3', 'bean sprouts or chopped baby bok coy': '2', 'green onions, chopped, plus more for serving': '4', 'roasted peanuts, chopped': '1/4', 'Thai or regular basil and limes, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Cook the rice noodles according to packaged directions.', '2. To make the sauce. In a small bowl, combine the soy sauce, fish sauce, vinegar, honey, and chili flakes.', '3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shrimp and sear on both sides until pink, 2-3 minutes. Add the butter, garlic, a pinch of both chili flakes and black pepper. Continue to cook the shrimp in the butter until the garlic begins to caramelize and turn light golden brown, another 1-2 minutes.', '4. Add the noodles and sauce, tossing to combine. Cook until the noodles are warmed through and begin soaking up the sauce, about 1 minute. Push the noodles to one side of the skillet and add the eggs to the other side. Let cook until the edges start to set, 1 minute. Roughly scramble the egg, then toss with the noodles. Remove from the heat. Add the bean sprouts and green onions, toss to combine.', '5. Divide the noodles and shrimp between plates. Top with basil, green onions, peanuts, and chili flakes. Add a squeeze of lime juice.']

title: Crispy Quinoa Burgers Topped with Sweet Potato Fries and Beer Caramelized Onions
ingredients: ['cooked quinoa', 'cannellini beans', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'large egg, beaten', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chipotle chili powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded gruyere cheese', 'burger buns, toasted', 'fried eggs, mashed avocado, and herbs, for serving', 'sweet potatoes, cut into matchsticks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chipotle chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'beer, such as pumpkin, lager, or pilsner']
ingredients with measurement: {'cooked quinoa': '2', 'cannellini beans': '1', 'Panko bread crumbs': '1/2', 'large egg, beaten': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '3/4', 'shredded gruyere cheese': '1/2', 'burger buns, toasted': '6', 'fried eggs, mashed avocado, and herbs, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sweet potatoes, cut into matchsticks': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'smoked paprika': '1/2', 'salted butter': '2', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2', 'beer, such as pumpkin, lager, or pilsner': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a medium bowl, combine the quinoa, mashed beans, Panko, egg, garlic, chili powder, cheese, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Form the mix into 5-6 equal burgers. Place on a plate, cover, and transfer to the fridge.', '2. To make the fries. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Place the sweet potatoes on a large baking sheet and toss with olive oil, chili powder, paprika, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Spread the fries in an even layer. Do not overcrowd the pan, if needed, divide the fries between 2 baking sheets Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, then flip and bake for 15-20 minutes more. You want the sweet potatoes to be tender, yet crisp.', "4. Meanwhile, make the onions. Melt the butter and onions together in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring occasionally until softened, about 5 minutes. At this point, you want to slowly add the beer, 1/4 cup at a time, until the beer cooks into the onions. Continue to cook another 8-10 minutes until you've used all of the beer and the onions are deeply caramelized. Remove the onions from the skillet to a plate.", '5. Cook the burgers in the same skillet, heat a drizzle of oil over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the burgers and cook until golden and crisp, about 5 minutes per side. During the last minute of cooking add the Gruyere cheese, cover, and cook 2-3 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '6. To assemble, place each burger on a bun, top with caramelized onions and sweet potatoes. If desired, add a fried egg, mashed avocado, and fresh herbs. ENJOY.']

title: Roasted Garlic Butter Chicken with Lemon Olive Dressing.
ingredients: ['boneless chicken thighs and or breasts, skin on or off', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, 2 finely chopped + 4 whole cloves', 'fresh parsley, chopped', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'lemons, 1 halved and 1 sliced', 'salted butter, sliced into 6 pieces', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'green olives, roughly chopped', 'apple cider vinegar', 'fish sauce', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'goat cheese broken into chunks']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken thighs and or breasts, skin on or off': '6', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'garlic, 2 finely chopped + 4 whole cloves': '6', 'fresh parsley, chopped': '1', 'fresh oregano, chopped': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'lemons, 1 halved and 1 sliced': '2', 'salted butter, sliced into 6 pieces': '4', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1', 'green olives, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'apple cider vinegar': '2', 'fish sauce': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2-1', 'goat cheese broken into chunks': '4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the chicken, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 finely chopped garlic cloves, 1/4 cup chopped parsley, 2 tablespoons chopped oregano, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Toss well to evenly coat the chicken. Arrange the lemons and smashed garlic cloves around the chicken. Add 1 slice of butter to each piece of chicken. Transfer to the oven and roast for 35-45 minutes, cooking until the chicken is cooked through and the lemons are charred. Keep an eye on the lemon slices and garlic cloves to ensure they are not burning.', '3. To make the dressing. Combine the remaining 1/3 cup olive oil, 3/4 cup parsley, 2 tablespoons oregano, the basil, olives, vinegar, and fish sauce, if using.', '4. Remove the charred lemon slices and garlic cloves from the baking sheet. Finely chop the lemon slices...rind and all, discarding any of the seeds. Add half of the chopped lemon to the dressing. Finely chop/mash the garlic into a paste, stir the garlic into the dressing. Season with crushed red pepper and salt. Taste adding more of the lemon as desired.', '5. Serve each piece of chicken with goat cheese and the dressing spooned over top.']

title: Weeknight Thai Chicken Meatball Khao Soi.
ingredients: ['ground chicken', 'green onions, finely, chopped, plus more for serving', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'black pepper', 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'baby bok choy or 1 bunch kale, chopped', 'Thai red curry paste', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'low-sodium chicken broth', 'fish sauce', 'honey', 'fresh cilantro and Thai or regular basil, chopped, plus more for serving', 'egg or rice noodles', 'sliced limes and thinly sliced shallots, for serving', 'chili oil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken': '1', 'green onions, finely, chopped, plus more for serving': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra-virgin olive oil': '2', 'baby bok choy or 1 bunch kale, chopped': '4', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'full-fat coconut milk': '2', 'low-sodium chicken broth': '3', 'fish sauce': '3', 'honey': '1', 'fresh cilantro and Thai or regular basil, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/4', 'egg or rice noodles': '8', 'sliced limes and thinly sliced shallots, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chili oil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Add the chicken, green onions, ginger, garlic, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Mix until just combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-20 meatballs).', '2. Heat a large pot over medium-high heat and add 2 tablespoons oil. When the oil shimmers, add the meatballs and sear until crisp, about 4-5 minutes, turning them 2-3 times. Toss in the bok choy and cook 2 minutes more, until just charred on the edges. Transfer everything to a plate.', '3. To the same pot, add the remaining 1 tablespoon oil, and the curry paste. Cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Stir in the coconut milk, chicken broth, fish sauce, and honey. Slide the meatballs and bok choy back into the soup. Simmer over medium heat until the meatballs are cooked through, 5-8 minutes. Stir in the herbs.', '4. Meanwhile, cook noodles according to package directions.', '5. Divide the noodles between bowls and ladle the soup over. Top each bowl as desired with basil, green onions, shallots, lime juice, and chili oil.']

title: One Pot Creamy Tuscan Pesto and Artichoke Pasta
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'small shallots, chopped', 'zest from 1 lemon, plus lemon juice for serving', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'dry linguine or similar long cut pasta', 'Tuscan kale, finely chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'canned coconut milk or heavy cream', 'basil pesto', 'marinated artichokes, roughly chopped', 'white beans, drained', 'fresh basil leaves, roughly chopped', 'fresh dill, roughly chopped', 'burrata cheese (about 2-3 balls)', 'toasted pine nuts']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'small shallots, chopped': '2', 'zest from 1 lemon, plus lemon juice for serving': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'dry linguine or similar long cut pasta': '1', 'Tuscan kale, finely chopped': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'canned coconut milk or heavy cream': '1/2', 'basil pesto': '1/2', 'marinated artichokes, roughly chopped': '1', 'white beans, drained': '1', 'fresh basil leaves, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'fresh dill, roughly chopped': '2', 'burrata cheese (about 2-3 balls)': '8', 'toasted pine nuts': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallot and cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes. Stir in the lemon zest and red pepper flakes, cook another minute. Slowly add 4 1/2 cups water, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, the pasta, and kale. Increase the heat to medium-high. Bring the mixture to a boil. Stir frequently until the pasta is al dente, about 10-12 minutes.', '2. Stir in the coconut milk, pesto, artichokes, and beans. Season, to taste with salt and pepper. Cook until warmed throughout and the pasta is creamy. Remove from the heat, stir the basil and dill.', '3. Divide the pasta between plates and break the burrata over each serving of pasta. Top with pine nuts, additional herbs, lemon juice, and pepper. Enjoy!']

title: Persian Inspired Herb and Beef Stew with Rice
ingredients: ['beef chuck, trimmed and cubed', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'ground turmeric', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'lemon zest plus 2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'low sodium beef broth', 'fire roasted diced tomatoes', 'white beans, drained', 'baby spinach', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'fresh parsley, roughly chopped', 'fresh dill, roughly chopped', 'chopped chives', 'cooked basmati rice', 'crumbled feta or goat cheese, for serving', 'fresh mint, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'beef chuck, trimmed and cubed': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'lemon zest plus 2 tablespoons lemon juice': '2', 'low sodium beef broth': '3-4', 'fire roasted diced tomatoes': '1', 'white beans, drained': '1', 'baby spinach': '2', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'fresh parsley, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'fresh dill, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'chopped chives': '1', 'cooked basmati rice': '2', 'crumbled feta or goat cheese, for serving': 'seasoning', 'fresh mint, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Season the beef with salt and pepper. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet, sear the beef on both sides. Remove the beef and transfer to the slow cooker.', '2. To the slow cooker, add the onion, garlic, turmeric, crushed red pepper, lemon zest, lemon juice, 3 cups broth, the tomatoes, and season with salt and pepper. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours. During the last hour of cooking, add the beans, spinach, cilantro, parsley, dill, and chives. If you would like a thinner consistency, add the remaining 1 cup broth.', '3. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and ladle the stew over top. Top with cheese and herbs.']

title: Eggs in Purgatory with Chile Butter and Feta
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'smoked paprika', 'raw sesame seeds', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, smashed', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'Zest and juice from 1 lemon', 'crushed fire roasted tomatoes', 'kosher salt', 'baby spinach', 'large eggs', 'tender herbs such as cilantro, parsley, basil, and dill', 'feta cheese, crumbled', 'sliced crusty bread, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '4', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'smoked paprika': '1/2', 'raw sesame seeds': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'garlic, smashed': '3', 'Zest and juice from 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'crushed fire roasted tomatoes': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'baby spinach': '2', 'large eggs': '4-6', 'tender herbs such as cilantro, parsley, basil, and dill': '1', 'feta cheese, crumbled': '4', 'sliced crusty bread, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the butter. In a large skillet melt together the butter, red pepper flakes, paprika, and sesame seeds. Cook until the butter is browning, 3-5 minutes. Remove from the heat and pour the butter into a bowl.', '2. To make the eggs. Return the skillet to the stove. Heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook 3-5 minutes, until the garlic is fragrant and turning golden brown. Stir in the red pepper flakes and lemon zest, cook another minute. Pour in the tomatoes and season with salt. Stir in the spinach. Turn the heat to medium-low. Simmer, uncovered until the tomatoes thicken into a sauce, 10-12 minutes.', '3. Using the back of a spoon, make 4-6 divots into the sauce, then crack an egg into each divot. Cover and cook until the eggs are set to your liking, 2 to 3 minutes for runnier yolks.', '4. To serve, crumble the feta over the eggs. Top with mixed herbs, lemon juice, and spoon over the chile butter. Serve with plenty of toasted bread.']

title: Chinese Mushroom Dumplings with Sweet Chili Ginger Sesame Sauce.
ingredients: ['sesame oil', 'shallots, chopped', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, chopped', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'roughly chopped spinach or bok choy', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'black pepper', 'dumpling or wonton wrappers', 'raw sesame seeds', 'green onions, chopped, for serving', 'toasted sesame oil', 'chili garlic sauce', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'pomegranate molasses or honey', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'fresh ginger, peeled and grated']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil': '2', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, chopped': '4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'roughly chopped spinach or bok choy': '2', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'dumpling or wonton wrappers': '30-34', 'raw sesame seeds': '1/3', 'green onions, chopped, for serving': '2', 'toasted sesame oil': '1/4', 'chili garlic sauce': '2', 'pomegranate molasses or honey': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1-2', 'fresh ginger, peeled and grated': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and cook until fragrant and lightly caramelized, 2 minutes. Add the mushrooms, ginger, and garlic, and cook, stirring occasionally until the mushrooms have cooked down, about 5 minutes. Add the soy sauce and large pinch of pepper. Stir in the greens. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until the mushrooms are caramelized. Remove from the heat and let cool.', '2. To assemble, spoon 1 tablespoon of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edges of the wrapper.\xa0Fold the edges of the wrapper up around the filling and pinch in the center to seal.\xa0Repeat with the remaining wrappers.', '3. Place the sesame seeds in a shallow bowl. Brush the bottoms of the dumplings with water and then dredge them in the sesame seeds.', '4. Heat a few tablespoons of oil in a large skillet set over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the dumplings and cook until the bottoms are light golden brown, about 2-3 minutes. Carefully pour 1/4 cup of water into the skillet, it will splatter, so stand back. Immediately cover with a tight-fitting lid. Turn heat to medium-low and let the dumplings steam for 5-6 minutes. Serve warm with sauce (see below) and green onions.', '5. To make the sauce, combine all ingredients in a medium bowl. Serve alongside the dumplings.']

title: Healthier Italian Wedding Soup with Lemon and Garlic

title: Crockpot Parmesan White Bean Chicken Soup with Roasted Delicata Squash
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'chicken breasts or thighs', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'celery, chopped', 'fresh thyme + 2 tablespoons thyme leaves', 'fresh rosemary', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'grated parmesan, plus 1 parmesan rind', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'white beans, drained', 'Tuscan kale, roughly chopped', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'short cut pasta, such as orzo', 'delicata squash, halved, seeded and cut into 1/4 inch half circles', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chopped fresh sage']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '2', 'chicken breasts or thighs': '1', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4 to 6', 'celery, chopped': '4', 'fresh thyme + 2 tablespoons thyme leaves': '3', 'fresh rosemary': '2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '6', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '½', 'grated parmesan, plus 1 parmesan rind': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'white beans, drained': '1', 'Tuscan kale, roughly chopped': '1', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'short cut pasta, such as orzo': '1', 'delicata squash, halved, seeded and cut into 1/4 inch half circles': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'chopped fresh sage': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the butter, chicken, shallots, garlic, celery, thyme, rosemary, broth, wine, parmesan rind, and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Season the salt and pepper.\xa0Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or high for 4-5 hours.', '3. Once done cooking, remove the chicken and shred. Stir 1/2 cup grated parmesan, the kale, white beans, and lemon juice, cover and cook another 10 minutes. Remove the parmesan rind. Stir back in the shredded chicken. Taste and season with salt and pepper.', '4. About 30 minutes before serving, make the squash. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. On a baking sheet, toss together the delicata squash, olive oil, 2 tablespoons thyme leaves, sage, 1/2 cup parmesan and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20-25 minutes, flipping halfway through cooking, until the squash is tender.', '5. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to packaged directions, until al dente. Drain.', '6. Divide the pasta among bowls and pour the soup over top. Top each bowl with roasted delicata squash and additional parmesan. Enjoy!']

title: Weeknight 30 Minute Sticky Ginger Sesame Chicken Meatballs
ingredients: ['ground turkey or chicken', 'green onions, finely chopped, plus more for serving', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'black pepper', 'broccoli, cut into florets or 1 winter squash, seeded and sliced into 1/4 inch wedges', 'sesame oil, or extra virgin olive oil', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'pomegranate juice', 'hoisin sauce', 'honey', 'rice vinegar or apple cider vinegar', 'crushed red pepper flakes, using more or less to taste', 'steamed rice, sesame seeds, and pomegranate arils, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground turkey or chicken': '1', 'green onions, finely chopped, plus more for serving': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'broccoli, cut into florets or 1 winter squash, seeded and sliced into 1/4 inch wedges': '1', 'sesame oil, or extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/3', 'pomegranate juice': '1/3', 'hoisin sauce': '3', 'honey': '3', 'rice vinegar or apple cider vinegar': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes, using more or less to taste': '1', 'steamed rice, sesame seeds, and pomegranate arils, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '2. Add the chicken, green onions, ginger, garlic, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Mix until just combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-20 meatballs) placing them on one side of the prepared baking sheet. The mix will be wet, but it will firm up in the oven. Add the broccoli or winter squash (see notes) to the other side of the baking sheet and toss with 1 tablespoon oil, salt, and pepper. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15 minutes or until the meatballs are crisp and cooked through.', '3. Meanwhile, combine the 1 tablespoon oil, the soy sauce, pomegranate juice, hoisin sauce, honey, vinegar, and crushed red pepper flakes in a medium saucepan. Set over medium-high heat and bring the sauce to a boil. Boil 5-8 minutes, until the sauce thickens and reduces by about 1/3. Remove from the heat.', '4. Pour about half the sauce over the meatballs, tossing to combine. Return to the oven for 2-3 minutes, until the sauce coats the meatballs.', '5. Serve the meatballs and sauce over bowls of rice topped with additional green onions, pomegranate arils, and sesame seeds. Serve the broccoli on the side.']

title: Roasted Garlic Spaghetti Squash Lasagna Boats
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling', 'garlic', 'ground spicy Italian chicken sausage or ground chicken', 'small yellow onion, chopped', 'crushed San Marzano tomatoes', 'dried bay leaf', 'dried oregano', 'medium spaghetti squash, halved and seeds removed', 'whole milk or heavy cream', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'grated fresh nutmeg', 'shredded fontina cheese or mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fresh thyme and or fried sage leaves, for serving (optional)']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling': '1', 'garlic': '1', 'ground spicy Italian chicken sausage or ground chicken': '3/4', 'small yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'crushed San Marzano tomatoes': '1', 'dried bay leaf': '1', 'dried oregano': '2', 'medium spaghetti squash, halved and seeds removed': '2', 'whole milk or heavy cream': '1/2', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1/4', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/2', 'grated fresh nutmeg': '1/8', 'shredded fontina cheese or mozzarella cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh thyme and or fried sage leaves, for serving (optional)': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Slice off the top portion of the garlic head to expose some of the cloves. Place the garlic on a piece of foil. Drizzle lightly with olive oil and wrap in foil. Transfer to the oven and roast until cloves are lightly browned and tender, about 20 minutes. Let cool, then squeeze the garlic out into a bowl. Mash the cloves with a fork.', '2. To make the meat sauce. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken sausage and brown all over, about 5 to 8 minutes. Add onion and cook another 2 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the tomatoes, 1 cup water, the   bay leaf, oregano, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Simmer for 15 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. Remove the bay leaf, stir in the roasted garlic. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed.', '3. Meanwhile, poke a few holes into the squash with a fork and place on a plate. Microwave 3 minutes. Let cool slightly, then cut in half lengthwise, scoop out the seeds and discard.', '4. In a medium bowl, mix together the milk, ricotta cheese, nutmeg, and basil. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in 1 cup fontina cheese and 1/2 cup provolone cheese.', '5. Place the squash in a baking dish and season the cut sides with salt and pepper. Sprinkle the remaining fontina cheese into the bottom of each squash, then evenly divide meat sauce among the squash cavities. Now spoon the milk/cheese mix over the meat sauce. Top with the remaining provolone cheese. Cover the squash loosely with foil.', '6. Transfer to the oven and bake 20 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking another 15-20 minutes or until the squash is tender and the cheese is golden brown on top. The squash will seem a little soupy, this is OK.', '7. Let the squash sit 5 minutes, then use a fork to scrape the squash into strands, mixing the meat and cheese with the squash. Serve topped with thyme and sage.']

title: Herby Buttered Mushroom Stroganoff
ingredients: ['uncooked egg noodles', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'large shallot, thinly sliced', 'mixed mushrooms, roughly torn or sliced', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped sage', 'flour', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'dry white wine such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'balsamic vinegar', 'canned coconut milk or heavy cream', 'fresh parsley, roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'uncooked egg noodles': '8', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'large shallot, thinly sliced': '1', 'mixed mushrooms, roughly torn or sliced': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '3', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh chopped sage': '1', 'flour': '2', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '1', 'dry white wine such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'Worcestershire sauce': '1', 'balsamic vinegar': '1', 'canned coconut milk or heavy cream': '1/2', 'fresh parsley, roughly chopped': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the noodles according to package directions until al dente. Drain.', '2. Meanwhile, heat\xa0the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and cook until fragrant, 2-3 minutes. Add the mushrooms and season with salt and pepper. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden. Reduce the heat to medium. Add the butter, garlic, thyme, and sage. Cook, stirring occasionally until the garlic is caramelized and fragrant, about 2-3  minutes. Remove half the mushrooms from the skillet to a plate and set aside.', '3. Sprinkle the flour over the mushrooms and cook, stirring to incorporate, for another minute. Slowly pour in the chicken broth, wine, Worcestershire, balsamic vinegar, and season with salt and pepper. Bring the sauce to a low boil, then reduce the heat to medium, simmer for 5 minutes or until the sauce has thickened slightly. Stir in the milk, cooking another 2-3 minutes.', '4. Add the noodles, reserved mushrooms, and parsley to the sauce, tossing to combine.', '5.  Divide the noodles among plates. Top with fresh thyme and pepper. Enjoy!']

title: French Onion and Apple Grilled Cheese.
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'apple cider', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'prosciutto (optional)', 'sourdough bread', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'shredded gouda or white cheddar cheese', 'honeycrisp apple, thinly sliced']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '3', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'apple cider': '3/4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'prosciutto (optional)': '4', 'sourdough bread': '8', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded gouda or white cheddar cheese': '1 1/2', 'honeycrisp apple, thinly sliced': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onions and cook 3 minutes, until softened. Add half the apple cider, season with salt and pepper and continue cooking another 5 minutes, until the cider has mostly evaporated. Add the remaining cider and cook another 5 minutes or until the onions are golden and caramelized. Add the thyme, sage, and crushed red pepper, cook another minute.\xa0Remove from the heat.', '2. In a large skillet set over medium heat, cook the prosciutto until crisp, about 2 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet.', '3. Brush the outside of each slice of bread with olive oil. On the inside of half of the slices of bread, evenly layer the cheeses, onion, apples, and prosciutto. Add the top piece of bread, olive oil side facing up.', '4. Place the sandwiches, 1-2 at a time, in the skillet and cook until golden on each side, about 3-5 minutes per side.\xa0During the last minute of cooking, add 1/2 tablespoon butter and 2 sage leaves. Repeat with the remaining 2 sandwiches. Serve immediately, topping with the crispy sage. EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Pesto Polenta with Thyme-Roasted Mushrooms and Chickpeas
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'wild mushrooms, roughly torn', 'chickpeas, drained and patted dry', 'fresh thyme', 'garlic, smashed', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'dry instant polenta', 'Land O Lakes® Butter with Olive Oil and Sea Salt', 'kale or baby spinach, chopped', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'wild mushrooms, roughly torn': '1 1/2', 'chickpeas, drained and patted dry': '1', 'fresh thyme': '3', 'garlic, smashed': '6', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'dry instant polenta': '1 1/2', 'Land O Lakes® Butter with Olive Oil and Sea Salt': '3', 'kale or baby spinach, chopped': '1/2', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/3', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F. Position the oven rack in the upper 1/3 ofthe oven.', '2. On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the olive oil, mushrooms, chickpeas, thyme,garlic, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and crushed red pepper flakes.Transfer to the oven and bake for 25-30 minutes. Increase the heat to 475degrees F. Toss the mushrooms and chickpeas, then return to the oven andcontinue baking another 5-10 minutes until crisp on the edges. Watch closely.', '3. Meanwhile, make the polenta. In a medium saucepan, bring 4 cups water to a boilover medium heat. Slowly whisk in the polenta, stirring until the polenta issoft and thick, about 5 minutes. Stir in the butter with olive oil, kale, and 2tablespoons pesto, stirring until the kale has wilted, about 3 minutes. If the polenta thickens too much, thin with additional water.', '4. Divide the polenta between bowls and break the burrata over the polenta. Spoon the mushrooms and chickpeas over tip. Drizzle with addition pesto. Enjoy!']

title: Boneless Honey BBQ Chicken Wings with Spicy Ranch
ingredients: ['boneless chicken tenders or breasts, cut into 2-inch pieces', 'buttermilk', 'finely crushed corn flakes', 'paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil, for brushing', 'of your favorite BBQ sauce', 'honey', 'cayenne pepper', 'dijon mustard', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'buttermilk', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired, and chopped', 'kosher salt', 'chopped fresh chives']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken tenders or breasts, cut into 2-inch pieces': '2', 'buttermilk': '1/2', 'finely crushed corn flakes': '2', 'paprika': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil, for brushing': 'seasoning', 'of your favorite BBQ sauce': '3/4', 'honey': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'dijon mustard': '2', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1', 'dried parsley': '1', 'dried dill': '2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired, and chopped': '1', 'kosher salt': '1', 'chopped fresh chives': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Add the chicken to a bowl. Pour the buttermilk over the chicken. Toss well to coat.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '3. Add the cornflake crumbs, paprika, and a pinch each of salt and pepper to a medium-sized bowl. Stir to combine.', '4. Remove each piece of chicken from the buttermilk, allowing the excess to drip off, then dredge through the crumbs, pressing gently to adhere. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat until all the chicken has been used. Make sure not to crowd your pan, if necessary use two baking sheets. Lightly drizzle or mist the chicken with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '5. Meanwhile, make the honey BBQ sauce. Combine the BBQ sauce, honey, mustard, and cayenne in a glass jar and shake or whisk until smooth and creamy.\xa0Drizzle each piece of chicken with BBQ sauce, then return to the oven for 5 minutes, until warmed.', '6. To make the ranch. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and shake or stir until creamy.', '7. Serve the chicken with fresh chives and spicy ranch for dipping.']

title: Broccoli Cheddar Chicken and Rice Casserole.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'salted butter', 'basmati or jasmine rice', 'dry orzo pasta', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for topping', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped', 'bay leaves', 'garlic powder', 'cayenne pepper, more or less to taste', 'zest of 1/2 a lemon', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '3', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'basmati or jasmine rice': '1 1/2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1/2', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for topping': '2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3 1/2', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped': '3', 'bay leaves': '2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper, more or less to taste': '1/2', 'zest of 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk': '1/2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and carrot and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Stir in the chicken and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the chicken is seared, 2-3 minutes. Add the butter, rice, orzo, and thyme, and cook until golden and toasted, 2-3 minutes. Add the broth and bring to a boil over high heat. Add the broccoli, bay leaves, garlic powder, cayenne, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, cover and reduce heat to low. Cook, covered for 20-25 minutes, until the rice is mostly cooked.', '3. Once the rice is cooked, stir in the lemon zest, milk, and 1/2 cup of cheese. If needed, transfer the rice to an oven-safe casserole dish. Scatter the remaining cheese over top the casserole.', '4. Transfer to the oven and bake 15-20 minutes, until the cheese is melted and just beginning to brown. Serve warm with additional thyme and fresh basil.']
